name: Yuffie
text: Ugh, no good...
text_jp: うう　ダメだ……

name: Cid
text: What’s wrong?
text_jp: なんだ？

name: Yuffie
text: I thought the plane was gonna be fine...
text_jp: 飛行機は大丈夫だと思ったのに……

name: Cid
text: Hey, if you’re gonna puke, do it outside!
text_jp: おい　吐くなら外に吐けよ！

name: Yuffie
text: Urghh~
text_jp: おええ～

name: Barret
text: Yo, Cid!
text_jp: よう　シド

name: Cid
text: What’s up?
text_jp: なんでい

name: Barret
text: Flying around like this—what if Shinra shows up?
text_jp:
こんなふうに飛んでてよ
神羅が来たら　どうすんだ？

name: Cid
text: The sky don’t belong to nobody. Shinra can eat shit for all I care!
text_jp:
空は誰のモンでもねえ
神羅なんか　クソ食らえってなもんだ！

name: Barret
text: Hahahaha! Man, I like you! That’s the spirit!
text_jp:
ハハハハハ！
あんたイイな　そうこなくちゃよ

name: Red XIII
text: Looks like we’re getting pretty close.
text_jp: だいぶ　近づいてきたようだな

name: Cid
text: Yeah, time to land soon.
text_jp: おう　そろそろ降りるぞ

name: Cid
text: COSME_12
text_jp: COSME_12

name: Cid
text: Alright—touchdown!
text_jp: ほーい　到着！

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_14
text_jp: COSME_14

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_15
text_jp: COSME_15

name: Cid
text: COSME_16
text_jp: COSME_16

name: Cid
text: This is as far as I can guide ya.
text_jp: オレに案内できんのは　ここまでだ

name: Cid
text: Can’t get any closer than this, so just hoof it from here!
text_jp:
これ以上は近寄れねえから
あとは　テキトーに歩け！

name: Barret
text: What do we do next time we need a ride?
text_jp: 次に頼むときは　どうすりゃいい？

name: Cid
text: COSME_20
text_jp: COSME_20

name: Cid
text: Send up a smoke signal.
text_jp: 狼煙あげろ

name: Cid
text: If there’s a runway, I’ll do my damnedest.
text_jp: 滑走路があれば　最善を尽くす

name: Cid
text: Thanks for flying with us~!
text_jp: またのご利用を～！

name: Cid
text: COSME_24
text_jp: COSME_24

name: Red XIII
text: I’ll guide you to the valley.
text_jp: 谷まで案内しよう

name: Red XIII
text: That’s Cosmo Canyon—my beautiful, noble hometown.
text_jp:
あれがコスモキャニオン
美しく気高い　私の故郷だ

name: Barret
text: Whoa~ The holy land of planetology’s callin’ me!
text_jp:
はあ～
星命学の聖地が　オレを呼んでるぜ～

name: Aerith
text: This is gonna be fun!
text_jp: 楽しみだね

name: Cait Sith
text: So, I hate to bring this up again, but...
text_jp: せや　話を蒸し返すんやけど

name: Cait Sith
text: Y’all keep goin’ on about Sephiroth bein’ the enemy and all that jazz, right?
text_jp:
みなさん　敵はセフィロスやとかナントカ
ゆーてますよね

name: Cait Sith
text: Assumin’ what y’all say is true—that the great hero ain’t dead—
text_jp:
みなさんのゆーとおり
かの英雄が死んでなかったとして

name: Cait Sith
text: What’s that guy up to these days?
text_jp: あのひと　なにしてるんです？

name: Cloud
text: Seems he’s trying to protect the planet.
text_jp: 星を守るつもりらしい

name: Cait Sith
text: Huh? Sounds like a decent fella to me!
text_jp: なんや　ええ人に聞こえますけど

name: Cloud
text: If it’s to save the planet, he doesn’t care what happens to people. That’s his way.
text_jp:
星を守るためなら　人はどうなってもいい
それが　あいつのやり方だ

name: Cait Sith
text: Well, that’s mighty extreme~ Cities need people, and so does the planet!
text_jp:
そらまた　えらい過激ですな～
人あっての街　人あっての星やのに

name: Barret
text: I’ll bring somethin’ up too—there’s another enemy out there!
text_jp: オレも蒸し返すが　敵はほかにもいるぜ？

name: Barret
text: Not only do they keep gettin’ in our way, but they’re still suckin’ energy outta the planet—the Shinra Company!
text_jp:
オレたちの邪魔をするばかりか　相も変わらず
星からエネルギーをかすめ取る神羅カンパニーだ

name: Cait Sith
text: Eep!
text_jp: ギクッ！

name: Barret
text: We’ll use your connections to the max, but if you double-cross us...
text_jp:
おまえのコネは　最大限に利用させてもらう
だが　もし裏切ったら……

name: Barret
text: It’s the cat-punishment treatment! I don’t let shit slide!
text_jp:
ネコっかわいがりの刑だ！
オレはしつこいぜえ？

name: Cait Sith
text: Scary~!
text_jp: こわ～！

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_43
text_jp: COSME_43

name: Red XIII
text: I’m back~! Nanaki’s home~!
text_jp:
ただいま～
ナナキ　帰りました～！

name: Lookout
text: Nanaki!
text_jp: ナナキ！

name: Lookout
text: Welcome back, Nanaki!
text_jp: おかえりよ　ナナキ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_47
text_jp: COSME_47

name: Lookout
text: Good to see you safe. Really good!
text_jp: 無事でよかった　よかったなあ

name: Barret
text: COSME_49
text_jp: COSME_49

name: Lookout
text: Now, go say hi to Elder Bugenhagen!
text_jp:
さあ　ブーゲンハーゲン様に
ごあいさつをしておいで

name: Lookout
text: COSME_51
text_jp: COSME_51

name: Lookout
text: COSME_52
text_jp: COSME_52

name: Red XIII
text: These folks helped me out a little.
text_jp: あの人たちには　ほんのちょっと世話になったんだ

name: Red XIII
text: They’re not bad people, so let ‘em in!
text_jp: 悪い人たちじゃないから　入れてあげてよ

name: Barret
text: What was that just now?
text_jp: なんだ　いまの？

name: Aerith
text: COSME_56
text_jp: COSME_56

name: Barret
text: "Nanaki’s home~!" he says!
text_jp: ナナキ　かえりました～ってよ

name: Aerith
text: So cute, right?
text_jp: かわいいよね

name: Barret
text: COSME_59
text_jp: COSME_59

name: Lookout
text: Sorry, one moment please.
text_jp: すみません　少々お待ちを

name: Lookout
text: This morning, someone dropped outta the sky.
text_jp: 今朝　空から降ってきましてね

name: Lookout
text: Seems they’re the ones who blew up Midgar’s mako reactor...
text_jp: ミッドガルの魔晄炉爆破犯らしいですが……

name: Lookout
text: COSME_63
text_jp: COSME_63

name: Lookout
text: But you folks don’t seem connected to that.
text_jp: あなたたちは関係なさそうですね

name: Lookout
text: With Nanaki’s introduction, there’s no problem.
text_jp: ナナキの紹介もあるし　問題ありません

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_66
text_jp: COSME_66

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_67
text_jp: COSME_67

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_68
text_jp: COSME_68

name: Lookout
text: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon, the holy land of planetology!
text_jp:
ようこそ　星命学の聖地
コスモキャニオンへ！

name: Red XIII
text: I was born and raised in this beautiful valley.
text_jp: 私はこの美しい谷で生まれ育った

name: Red XIII
text: I was supposed to become a warrior to protect this valley, but I got captured by Shinra...
text_jp:
本来なら　谷を守る戦士になるはずだったが
不覚にも神羅に捕まり……

name: Red XIII
text: I’ve repaid the debt for being saved. Now I think I’ll return to my original path here.
text_jp:
助けてもらった借りは返した
私はここで本来の道に戻ろうと思う

name: Red XIII
text: Thanks for everything up ‘til now. I’m grateful.
text_jp: いままで世話になった　感謝している

name: Aerith
text: It’s gonna feel lonely without you.
text_jp: さびしくなっちゃうな

name: Red XIII
text: Don’t say that~! It’ll make parting even harder!
text_jp:
それを言わないでよ～
別れがつらくなっちゃうよ

name: Red XIII
text: But protecting this valley is my calling.
text_jp: でも　この谷を守ることはオイラの使命なんだ

name: Barret
text: You sneaky bastard, trickin’ us all this time!
text_jp: この野郎　ずっとだましてやがったな

name: Red XIII
text: Lots of folks look down on me, callin’ me a dog or whatever.
text_jp: イヌだなんだと　侮るやからが多くてな

text: Hey, Nanaki!
text_jp: お～い　ナナキ！

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_80
text_jp: COSME_80

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps!
text_jp: じっちゃん！

name: Aerith
text: COSME_82
text_jp: COSME_82

name: Tifa
text: Is that goodbye for now?
text_jp: いまので　お別れ？

name: Barret
text: If he’s in the valley, we’ll get chances to talk, right?
text_jp: 谷にいりゃ　話す機会くらいあんだろ

name: Barret
text: So what’s our goal comin’ here?
text_jp: オレたちがここに来た目的は　なんだ？

name: Barret
text: Let’s brush up on planetology!
text_jp: 星命学の復習といこうぜ！

name: Yuffie
text: Materia, materia~!
text_jp: マッテリア　マッテリア～！

name: Cait Sith
text: Me...
text_jp: ボクは……

name: Cait Sith
text: Heave-ho!
text_jp: よっこらしょっと

name: Cait Sith
text: Guess I’ll just space out for a bit~
text_jp: しばらくボーッとさせてもらいます～

name: Aerith
text: COSME_91
text_jp: COSME_91

name: Aerith
text: Let’s go explore~!
text_jp: 探検　行ってみよ～！

name: Tifa
text: Those Avalanche wanted posters didn’t look like us at all!
text_jp: アバランチの手配書　ぜんぜん似てなかったね

name: Cloud
text: They’ve gotta have some kinda plan.
text_jp: なにか狙いがあるんだろう

name: Aerith
text: Careful, careful!
text_jp: 用心　用心

name: Barret
text: Those Weapons we saw in Corel and Gongaga—
text_jp: コレルやゴンガガで見たウェポン

name: Barret
text: Seein’ ‘em proves the planet’s crisis ain’t just some fantasy—it’s real, and anyone’d believe it!
text_jp:
あれを見りゃ　星の危機が妄想じゃなくて
現実だってこと　誰でも信じるだろ

name: Barret
text: And look at the faces of these planetology folks gathered here—
text_jp:
それに見ろよ　ここに集った
星命学を学ぶ同志の顔を

name: Barret
text: Every single one’s an Avalanche comrade!
text_jp: みーんな　アバランチの仲間だ

name: Barret
text: Shoulda come here way sooner!
text_jp: もっと早くに　来ときゃあよかったぜ

name: Yuffie
text: Treasure, materia, where are ya~? Don’t be shy—come on out~♪
text_jp:
お宝　マテリア　どっこかな～？
恥ずかしがらず～　出ておいで～♪

name: Cait Sith
text: Zzz...Zzz~ Mnya mnya mnya mnya...
text_jp:
す……す～ぴ～
むニャむニャむニャむニャ……

name: Cait Sith
text: Zzz~...Zzz~...

name: Guide
text: May you be with the planet.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Guide
text: Here, planetology learners gather to talk,
text_jp: ここでは星命学の学習者がともに語り合い

name: Guide
text: holding seminars to reaffirm the joy of living with the planet.
text_jp:
星と生きる喜びを再確認するための
セミナーが開かれております

name: Guide
text: Joining the seminars requires an introduction from a proper mentor.
text_jp:
セミナーの参加には
しかるべき　指導者の紹介が必要になります

name: Guide
text: So, I’m sorry about that.
text_jp: ですから　申し訳ありませんね

name: Guide
text: Today, the "Rite of the Stars" is being held, so how about joining that instead?
text_jp:
本日は『星送りの儀』が執り行われますので
そちらに参加されては　いかがでしょう？

name: Guide
text: May you be with the planet.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Guide
text: Planetology seminars are by introduction only.
text_jp: 星命学セミナーは紹介制となっております

name: Guide
text: Today, the "Rite of the Stars" is being held, so how about joining that instead?
text_jp:
本日は『星送りの儀』が執り行われますので
そちらに参加されては　いかがでしょう？

name: Red XIII
text: These are the folks, Gramps!
text_jp: この人たちだよ　じっちゃん！

text: Ho ho ho! Seems Nanaki owes you a lot!
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ
ナナキが　世話になったそうだのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: I’m Bugenhagen.
text_jp: わしは　ブーゲンハーゲン

name: Bugenhagen
text: I know a thing or two about the planet and teach planetology here in Cosmo Canyon.
text_jp:
すこしばかり　星には詳しくてな
コスモキャニオンで　星命学を教えている

name: Red XIII
text: A thing or two? Gramps, is there even anything you don’t know?
text_jp:
すこしだなんて
じっちゃんは知らないことなんて　ないだろ？

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_118
text_jp: COSME_118

name: Bugenhagen
text: Well, I know more than a kid like you, that’s for sure!
text_jp: そりゃ　子供のおまえよりは知っておるわい

name: Red XIII
text: I’m 48 already!
text_jp: オイラだって　もう４８歳だよ

name: Tifa
text: Forty...?
text_jp: よんじゅう？

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_122
text_jp: COSME_122

name: Cloud
text: COSME_123
text_jp: COSME_123

name: Aerith
text: COSME_124
text_jp: COSME_124

name: Bugenhagen
text: Nanaki’s clan is long-lived.
text_jp: ナナキの一族は長命じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: In human terms, he’s about 15 or 16 years old.
text_jp:
人間の寿命に当てはめると
まだ１５～１６歳といったところじゃの

name: Red XIII
text: I’m an adult now! I can protect this valley—and you too, Gramps!
text_jp:
もうオトナだ！
この谷だって　じっちゃん達だって守れる

name: Red XIII
text: I’m not like Dad!
text_jp: オイラは　チチとは違うんだから

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_129
text_jp: COSME_129

name: Bugenhagen
text: Nanaki, have you already said hi to everyone in the valley?
text_jp:
ナナキよ　もう谷の者たちへの挨拶は
すんだのかのう？

name: Red XIII
text: Not yet...I’ll go do that.
text_jp: まだ……行ってくる

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_132
text_jp: COSME_132

name: Bugenhagen
text: Sorry ‘bout that. Feel free to take a look around inside!
text_jp:
失礼したのう
よければ　中も見学してゆくといい

name: Tifa
text: COSME_134
text_jp: COSME_134

name: Aerith
text: COSME_135
text_jp: COSME_135

name: Bugenhagen
text: Seems you’ve toughened Nanaki up. Has he grown stronger from seein’ the outside world?
text_jp:
ナナキを鍛えてくれたそうじゃな
外の世界を知って　たくましくなったかな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! Lots of rare gadgets ‘round here, eh?
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ
めずらしい器械がいっぱいじゃろう

name: Bugenhagen
text: They’re all tools tied to the planet!
text_jp: ぜーんぶ　星とつながる道具じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: That’s a real early mako detector.
text_jp: それは　ごく初期の魔晄探知器じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm...Guess it’s finally reached its limit.
text_jp:
ふ～む……
いよいよ　寿命かのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: It’s a device for recordin’ the planet’s cycles.
text_jp: 星の営みを記録するための器械じゃよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: It’s a delicate piece, so handle it with care!
text_jp:
デリケートな代物だからの
扱いには気をつけるのじゃぞ

name: Bugenhagen
text: A miniature of the planet and its surroundin’ stars.
text_jp: 星とその周辺の星々の縮図じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: You could say the dust pilin’ up is like humanity itself!
text_jp:
さしずめ　積もったホコリが
人間といったところかの

name: Bugenhagen
text: Crystals of the planet’s memories...They hold a shine beyond what the eye can see.
text_jp:
星を巡る記憶の結晶……
目で見える以上の輝きが　そこには秘められておる

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! Touch that, and you’ll cause an avalanche!
text_jp:
ホーホウ！
それに触ると　雪崩を起こすぞぃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho, there’s plenty more!
text_jp: ホッホ　まだまだあるぞぃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: That’s a model of an airflow generator. It moves with wind and creates new currents.
text_jp:
それは　気流発生器の模型じゃ
風力で動き　新たな風の流れを生み出す

name: Bugenhagen
text: Have you already seen the real thing?
text_jp: 実物は　もう見たことがあるかの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Old footage of Nanaki. Back then, he was always up to mischief!
text_jp:
ナナキの昔の映像じゃ
あの頃は　イタズラばかりしておったのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: No rush—save that spot for later!
text_jp: そう急くでない　そこはあとでな

name: Bugenhagen
text: The world’s biggest telescope for observin’ the stars’ cycles!
text_jp:
世界いちの大きさの
星々の営みを観測する望遠鏡じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: The starry sky through this is the best, but the lens is all foggy now.
text_jp:
こいつで見る星空は最高なんじゃが
いまはレンズが曇ってしまっておる

name: Bugenhagen
text: Sorry ‘bout that.
text_jp: すまないのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, what’s this...?
text_jp: ううん　これは……？

name: Aerith
text: COSME_156
text_jp: COSME_156

name: Cloud
text: COSME_157
text_jp: COSME_157

name: Tifa
text: This voice...?
text_jp: この声……？

name: Bugenhagen
text: The planet’s cries—a sorrowful tune. I’ve been hearin’ it a lot lately.
text_jp:
星の悲鳴　悲しげな調べじゃ
最近　よく聞くようになった

name: Bugenhagen
text: It comes up through the pipes from deep underground.
text_jp:
伝声管を伝って
地中深くから聞こえてくるのじゃよ

name: Tifa
text: That’s not the planet’s cries—it’s the voice of the Weapons protectin’ it!
text_jp:
これは星の悲鳴ではありません
星を守るウェポンの声です

name: Bugenhagen
text: You’re awfully certain of that!
text_jp: ずいぶん　ハッキリ言いきるのう

name: Tifa
text: We’ve seen the Weapons!
text_jp: 私たち　ウェポンを見たんです

name: Tifa
text: At Gongaga and Corel’s mako reactors—they were huge...
text_jp:
ゴンガガとコレルの魔晄炉で
すごく大きくて……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! That’s quite an interestin’ tale!
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ！
それは　興味深い話じゃのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: But...mako poisoning’s got all kinda symptoms. Be careful!
text_jp:
が……魔晄中毒の症状は様々じゃ
気をつけるのじゃよ

name: Tifa
text: Huh? Uh...
text_jp: えっ　あの……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho...I see, I see.
text_jp: ホーホウ……そうか　そうか

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_169
text_jp: COSME_169

name: Bugenhagen
text: Seems you folks haven’t properly studied planetology yet.
text_jp:
おまえさんたちは　どうやら
きちんと星命学を学んだことがないようだ

name: Bugenhagen
text: This is a good chance—come with me!
text_jp: 良い機会だ　こちらへ来なさい

name: Bugenhagen
text: This is the Planetology Learner.
text_jp: これは　星命学習器

name: Bugenhagen
text: The latest model’s at Shinra HQ, they say, but this here’s my original!
text_jp:
最新型が神羅本社にあるらしいが
これは　わしが作ったオリジナルじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Let’s get started!
text_jp: では　はじめよう

name: Tifa
text: COSME_175
text_jp: COSME_175

name: Aerith
text: COSME_176
text_jp: COSME_176

name: Aerith
text: COSME_177
text_jp: COSME_177

name: Cloud
text: COSME_178
text_jp: COSME_178

name: Tifa
text: COSME_179
text_jp: COSME_179

name: Aerith
text: Pretty!
text_jp: きれい

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! It’s too early to be amazed!
text_jp: ホーホウ　驚くのはまだ早い

name: Aerith
text: Oh, a shooting star!
text_jp: あっ　流れ星！

name: Bugenhagen
text: The planet, the cosmos, the beings livin’ in it—their workings.
text_jp: 星と宇宙　そこに生きるもの　その仕組み

name: Bugenhagen
text: Knowin’ the flow of life is the foundation of planetology!
text_jp: 命の流れを知ることは　星命学の基本じゃ

name: Cloud
text: COSME_185
text_jp: COSME_185

name: Aerith
text: COSME_186
text_jp: COSME_186

name: Tifa
text: COSME_187
text_jp: COSME_187

name: Bugenhagen
text: This planet’s ours.
text_jp: この星は　わしらの星

name: Bugenhagen
text: Humans were born on this planet, brimmin’ with rich life.
text_jp: 豊かな命に溢れたこの星に　人は生まれた

name: Bugenhagen
text: People live, and eventually, they die.
text_jp: 人は生き　やがていつか死ぬ

name: Bugenhagen
text: But what happens when they die?
text_jp: じゃが　死んだらどうなる？

name: Bugenhagen
text: The body decays and returns to the planet.
text_jp: 体は朽ち　星に帰る

name: Bugenhagen
text: But what about the mind, the heart, the spirit?
text_jp: では　意識　心　精神はどうじゃ？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Truth is, the spirit returns to the planet too!
text_jp: 実は精神も同じく　星に帰るのじゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Spirits that return mix together and race ‘round the planet.
text_jp: 星に帰った精神は混じりあい　星を駆け巡る

name: Bugenhagen
text: They flow, merge, split, becomin’ a swell called the Lifestream.
text_jp:
星を巡り　混じり　分かれ
ライフストリームと呼ばれるうねりとなる

name: Bugenhagen
text: The Lifestream...In other words, the flow of spiritual energy circlin’ the planet!
text_jp:
ライフストリーム……
すなわち星を巡る　精神的エネルギーの流れじゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: For the planet to stay a planet, it needs that spiritual energy.
text_jp:
星が星であるためには
精神エネルギーが必要なんじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: But if that spiritual energy runs out...
text_jp: じゃが　その精神エネルギーがなくなれば

name: Aerith
text: COSME_200
text_jp: COSME_200

name: Tifa
text: COSME_201
text_jp: COSME_201

name: Cloud
text: COSME_202
text_jp: COSME_202

name: Aerith
text: COSME_203
text_jp: COSME_203

name: Bugenhagen
text: That’s the bare basics of planetology!
text_jp: これが　星命学の基礎中の基礎

name: Cloud
text: Mako’s a waste of spiritual energy—that’s a fact, right?
text_jp:
魔晄は　精神エネルギーの浪費
これは事実なんだな？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Exactly.
text_jp: そのとおり

name: Bugenhagen
text: Spiritual energy that’s sucked up and processed can’t fulfill its original purpose anymore.
text_jp:
吸い上げられ　加工された精神エネルギーは
もう本来の役目を果たさない

name: Bugenhagen
text: It gets used up in machines and vanishes.
text_jp: 機械の中で消費され　消えていくのじゃ

name: Tifa
text: Does it really vanish?
text_jp: 本当に　消えるんでしょうか？

name: Tifa
text: Couldn’t it return to the Lifestream and turn into somethin’ else instead?
text_jp:
そうではなくて　ライフストリームに帰って
なにか別のものになるということはありませんか？

name: Bugenhagen
text: A new theory...no, a wild one!
text_jp: 新説……いや　珍説じゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: You’d better join the seminar!
text_jp:
おぬしは　セミナーに参加したほうが
良さそうじゃの

name: Assistant
text: You called?
text_jp: お呼びでしょうか？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Take this young lady to the seminar room!
text_jp: お嬢さんを　セミナー室へ案内してあげなさい

name: Assistant
text: This way, please.
text_jp: こちらへどうぞ

name: Tifa
text: Okay...
text_jp: はい……

name: Aerith
text: Me too!
text_jp: わたしも

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_218
text_jp: COSME_218

name: Cloud
text: Bugenhagen.
text_jp: ブーゲンハーゲン

name: Cloud
text: If the cycle of life fades, the planet breaks and ends.
text_jp:
巡る命が消えれば
星は壊れ　終わる

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_221
text_jp: COSME_221

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_222
text_jp: COSME_222

name: Cloud
text: No way to avoid it?
text_jp: 避ける方法はないのか

name: Cloud
text: Like, say, strengthenin’ the cycle of life?
text_jp: たとえば　巡る命を強くするとか

name: Bugenhagen
text: I don’t know about that!
text_jp: そんなことは知らん！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_226
text_jp: COSME_226

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_227
text_jp: COSME_227

name: Bugenhagen
text: But maybe my planetology’s gettin’ outdated.
text_jp: だが　わしの星命学はもう古いのかもしれん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Never before have folks messed with the planet this deep in history.
text_jp:
これほど　人が星に深く関与する時代など
かつてなかったことだ

name: Bugenhagen
text: The planet and people change.
text_jp: 星も人も変わる

name: Bugenhagen
text: So does planetology.
text_jp: 星命学もな

name: Bugenhagen
text: I’m an old geezer now. It’s a shame I can’t keep up with learnin’.
text_jp:
わしはもうジジイじゃ
学びきれないのは　寂しいのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Not interested in planetology? You oughta join the seminar!
text_jp:
おぬしは星命学に興味ないのか？
セミナーに参加するのが良かろう

name: Barret
text: Check it—today’s the "Star Sending" festival, they say! Let’s go take a peek later!
text_jp:
見ろよ　今日は『星送り』って祭の日らしい
あとでちょっくら　見に行こうぜ

name: Yuffie
text: This, that—everything’s fake! This place is so boring!
text_jp:
あれもこれも　ぜ～んぶニセモノ！
つまんない場所だよね

name: Yuffie
text: Planetology or whatever’s prolly just fake scholars actin’ all high and mighty, huh?
text_jp:
星命学とかってのも　どうせニセモノの学者が
エラそーなこと言ってるだけなんでしょ？

name: Cait Sith
text: How’d these old books survive this long~?
text_jp: こんな古い書物　よう残ってましたな～

name: Cait Sith
text: That nice old paper smell—it’s makin’ me all dreamy!
text_jp:
古い紙のええ香り
なんや　ウットリしてきましたわ

name: Guide
text: May you be with the planet.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Guide
text: I’ve heard from Elder Bugenhagen. Please, go ahead.
text_jp:
ブーゲンハーゲン様から話は聞いております
どうぞ　お進みください

name: Guide
text: The "Rite of the Stars" is about to start.
text_jp: もうすぐ『星送りの儀』が執り行われます

name: Guide
text: It’s the one night a year Cosmo Canyon bonds with the planet.
text_jp:
年にいちど　コスモキャニオンが
星と結ばれる夜です

name: Guide
text: I’m sure there’ll be blessings for you too!
text_jp: あなたにもきっと祝福がありますよ

name: NPC
text: Ever since I was little, I’ve had a big body, but I preferred painting and poetry over hard labor.
text_jp:
私は小さい頃から　体は大きいものの
力仕事より絵画や詩が好きで

name: NPC
text: My father always lamented that I was pathetic, stayin’ indoors all the time.
text_jp:
家の中で過ごす私を　父はいつも
情けないと嘆いていました

name: NPC
text: By his logic, I’d be wastin’ tons of spiritual energy—a burden on the planet.
text_jp:
父の理屈では　私は人一倍
大量の精神エネルギーを浪費している
星のお荷物ということになります

name: NPC
text: But I think differently.
text_jp: でも　違うと思うんです

name: NPC
text: I believe I’ve been entrusted with more spiritual energy than others by the planet,
text_jp:
私は他人より多くの精神エネルギーを
星から預かって

name: NPC
text: refinin’ it with rich intellect and emotion to give back to the planet someday.
text_jp:
豊かな知性と情緒で質を高め
いつか星に返すのです

name: NPC
text: That’s what I believe is the meanin’ of my life.
text_jp:
それが私の
人生の意味だと信じています

name: Host
text: Wonderful!
text_jp: すばらしい！

name: NPC
text: May you be with the planet!
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを！

name: Host
text: Now, who’s speakin’ next?
text_jp: さあ　次は誰が話しますか？

name: NPC
text: I believe there’s another world where my mom and dad are still alive.
text_jp:
わたしは父と母がまだ生きている
もうひとつの世界があると信じています

name: NPC
text: I’ve been studyin’ to figure out how to get there somehow.
text_jp:
どうにかしてその世界に行きたいと考え
勉強を続けているのです

name: NPC
text: And here, I’ve gained incredible teachings.
text_jp:
そして　ここで
素晴らしい教えを授かりました

name: NPC
text: The Lifestream...spiritual energy—I heard its true nature is knowledge and memories.
text_jp:
ライフストリーム……精神エネルギー
その正体は　知識や記憶だと聞きました

name: NPC
text: But it’s kinda vague, right?
text_jp: でも　区別は曖昧ですよね

name: NPC
text: Maybe wishes and dreams are mixed in there too.
text_jp:
もしかすると　願いや夢も
混じり合っているのではないか

name: NPC
text: Maybe spiritual energy doesn’t distinguish between real memories and unfulfilled wishes or dreams.
text_jp:
精神エネルギーは
現実の記憶と実現しなかった願いや夢を
区別しないのではないか

name: NPC
text: When someone happens to touch that energy, could they see another world?
text_jp:
そんなエネルギーに偶然触れた時
人は　別の世界を見るのではないか

name: NPC
text: That’s the conclusion I’ve reached from studyin’ here.
text_jp:
それが　ここでの学びから
辿り着いた解釈です

name: Host
text: Wonderful!
text_jp: すばらしい！

name: NPC
text: May you be with the planet!
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを！

name: Host
text: Keep up your studies from here on out!
text_jp: 今後とも　学びを忘れないでくださいね

name: Host
text: So, who’s speakin’ next? Let me know when you’re ready!
text_jp:
さあ　次は誰が話しますか？
準備ができたら　教えてください

name: Host
text: COSME_267
text_jp: COSME_267

name: Host
text: You over there!
text_jp: そこのあなた

name: Host
text: Tell us about your experience!
text_jp: あなたの体験談を聞かせてください

name: Tifa
text: ...Okay.
text_jp: ……はい

name: Tifa
text: COSME_271
text_jp: COSME_271

name: Tifa
text: I, um...
text_jp: 私　その……

name: Tifa
text: I fell into the Lifestream.
text_jp: ライフストリームに落ちたんです

name: NPC
text: COSME_274
text_jp: COSME_274

name: Tifa
text: Inside the Lifestream, it’s such a beautiful place.
text_jp: ライフストリームの中は　とても美しいところで

name: Tifa
text: It makes you remember all kinda things.
text_jp: いろんなことを思い出すんです

name: Tifa
text: You feel kindness toward someone, or it reconnects you to forgotten feelings.
text_jp:
だれかに優しい気持ちになれたり
忘れていた想いをつないでくれたり

name: Tifa
text: The planet’s core is a warm place.
text_jp: 星の中は　あたたかい場所なんです

name: Tifa
text: But there was a battle there too.
text_jp: でも　そこには戦いもありました

name: Tifa
text: A fight between the planet and an enemy threatenin’ it.
text_jp: 星と星をおびやかす敵との戦いです

name: Tifa
text: I...we have to live with the planet.
text_jp:
私は……私たちは
星とともに生きなくてはなりません

name: Tifa
text: Together with the planet, we’ve gotta face the enemy...the crisis.
text_jp:
星といっしょに
敵に……危機に立ち向かうべきなんです

name: Tifa
text: But I still don’t know how to fight it.
text_jp: でも　戦い方がまだわかりません

name: Tifa
text: I thought I’d figured it out here, but...
text_jp: ここで　わかると思ったんですけど

name: NPC
text: COSME_285
text_jp: COSME_285

name: NPC
text: COSME_286
text_jp: COSME_286

name: Tifa
text: COSME_287
text_jp: COSME_287

name: Tifa
text: I’m not criticizing Planetology or anything. I don’t mean to scare anyone either.
text_jp:
星命学を批判してるわけじゃないんです
怖がらせるつもりもありません

name: Tifa
text: It’s just, uh...
text_jp: ただ　ええと……

name: Tifa
text: COSME_290
text_jp: COSME_290

name: Tifa
text: Sorry, I’m not good at explaining this.
text_jp: ごめんなさい　うまく話せなくて

name: Host
text: No need to worry about it.
text_jp: 気にすることはありませんよ

name: Host
text: We’ll always be here waiting for you.
text_jp:
私たちは　いつでもここで
あなたを待っています

name: Host
text: Keep thinking. The answers only lie at the end of that road.
text_jp:
考えることを続けなさい
答えは　その果てにしかありません

name: Host
text: Now, it’s nearly time for the Sending. Everyone, let’s head to the candles.
text_jp:
さあ　そろそろ星送りの刻限です
みなさん　キャンドルへと向かいましょう

name: Tifa
text: I’ll go on ahead, okay?
text_jp: 先に行ってるね

name: Host
text: Today’s the Day of the Sending.
text_jp: 今日は　星送りの日

name: Host
text: Once a year, we return the souls gathered in the valley to the planet.
text_jp:
年にいちど　谷に吹き寄せられた魂を
星へと帰すのです

name: Host
text: You should join us too.
text_jp: あなたも参加されると良いでしょう

name: Barret
text: I was just talkin’ to the mentor earlier.
text_jp: さっき　メンターと話したんだけどよ

name: Barret
text: He says it’s arrogant for people to try savin’ the planet. "The planet’s future’s up to the planet. If it gets dirty, it’ll clean itself", he says.
text_jp: 人が星を救おうなんて　おこがましいってよ

name: Barret
text: So what? We just sit back? Shut up and study or somethin’?
text_jp:
星の未来は　星が決める
星が汚れたら　星が掃除をするだろうってな

name: Barret
text: Are we supposed to just ignore it? Keep quiet and hit the books?
text_jp:
オレたちは　ほっとけってか？
黙って勉強してろってか

name: NPC
text: Are we supposed to just keep quiet and study?
text_jp: オレたちは黙って勉強してろってか？

name: NPC
text: We should fight.
text_jp: 戦うべきだ

name: NPC
text: What do you wanna do?
text_jp: どうしたいんだ？

name: NPC
text: Study.
text_jp: 勉強しろ

name: Cloud
text: If we don’t fight, nothing’ll change.
text_jp: 戦わなければ　なにも変わらない

name: Barret
text: Right? I’m countin’ on ya, Cloud my man!
text_jp:
だろ？　これからも頼りにしてるぜ
クラウドさんよ

name: Cloud
text: What do you wanna do?
text_jp: あんたは　どうしたいんだ？

name: Barret
text: Ignore it? Hell no! But fightin’ all the time don’t feel right either.
text_jp:
ほっとくなんてできるか！
でもな　戦うだけってのも違う気はしてる

name: Barret
text: How do we protect it, then?
text_jp: 守るためには　どうすりゃいいんだろうな

name: Cloud
text: Learn more here.
text_jp: ここで　もっと学べばいい

name: Barret
text: COSME_314
text_jp: COSME_314

name: Barret
text: Planetology’s just a buncha theories. Got that loud and clear.
text_jp:
星命学は　ただの学問だ
よーくわかったぜ

name: Barret
text: Planetology, Avalanche, Marlene, me...
text_jp: 星命学　アバランチ　マリン　オレ……

name: Barret
text: Wonder what the planet’s sayin’ about it.
text_jp: 星は　なんて言ってんだろうな

name: Cait Sith
text: Compared to the cosmos, humans are tiny little things.
text_jp: 宇宙に比べたら　人間なんてちっぽけな存在

name: Cait Sith
text: I’ve lived my life pushin’ back against folks who say that with smug faces.
text_jp:
そんなことを　したり顔で話す連中に
反発して生きてきましたけど

name: Cait Sith
text: But man, we really are wee, aren’t we?
text_jp: いや～ホンマに　ボクら　ちっさいんやねえ

name: Cait Sith
text: The sky’s huge, and I’m tiny.
text_jp: 空は大きい　ボクは小さい

name: Cait Sith
text: Makes ya think all sorts o’ things, huh?
text_jp: なんや　色々考えてまうわ

name: Yuffie
text: That stuff about dead people returnin’ to the planet?
text_jp: 死んだ人間が星に帰るとかゆーヤツ？

name: Yuffie
text: I don’t believe a single bit of it, not even this much!
text_jp:
ぜんっぜん　これっぽ～っちも
信じてないんだよね　アタシ

name: Yuffie
text: When you’re dead, it’s all poof, right?
text_jp: 死んだらぜーんぶ　パァでしょ？

name: NPC
text: When you’re dead, it’s all poof, right?
text_jp: 死んだらぜんぶ　パァでしょ？

name: NPC
text: Maybe so.
text_jp: そうかもな

name: NPC
text: Why do you think that?
text_jp: どうしてそう思うんだ？

name: NPC
text: You’re right.
text_jp: そのとおり

name: Cloud
text: Maybe so.
text_jp: そうかもな

name: Yuffie
text: Right? That’s why I’m gonna survive no matter what!
text_jp:
でしょ？　だからさ
なにがなんでも生き抜くんだ　アタシは

name: Cloud
text: Why do you think that?
text_jp: どうして　そう思うんだ？

name: Yuffie
text: No reason, really.
text_jp: 理由なんてないよ

name: Yuffie
text: I don’t believe in stuff I haven’t seen myself. That’s it.
text_jp: 自分で見たことないものは信じない　そんだけ

name: Cloud
text: Yuffie, you’re right.
text_jp: ユフィ　正解だ

name: Yuffie
text: Huh? Ugh, askin’ Cloud was a mistake.
text_jp:
はぁ～？　あ～あ
クラウドに聞いたのがマチガイ

name: Yuffie
text: Can’t this thing end already~?
text_jp: はやく終わんないかな～　これ

name: Tifa
text: COSME_338
text_jp: COSME_338

name: Tifa
text: Guess you saw me at my most embarrassing, huh?
text_jp: 恥ずかしいとこ　見られちゃったな

name: NPC
text: Guess you saw me at my most embarrassing, huh?
text_jp: 恥ずかしいとこ　見られちゃったな

name: NPC
text: That was fine.
text_jp: あれでいい

name: NPC
text: Don’t worry about it.
text_jp: 気にするな

name: NPC
text: Laugh it off.
text_jp: 笑ってごまかせ

name: Cloud
text: That was fine.
text_jp: あれでいい

name: Cloud
text: Those who get it, get it. It’s on the listener.
text_jp: わかるヤツにはわかる　聞く側の問題だ

name: Tifa
text: I wanted everyone to understand.
text_jp: みんなにわかってほしかったな

name: Cloud
text: It’s not your fault, Tifa.
text_jp: ティファは悪くない

name: Tifa
text: COSME_348
text_jp: COSME_348

name: Tifa
text: Thanks, Cloud.
text_jp: ありがとう　クラウド

name: Cloud
text: Don’t worry about it.
text_jp: 気にするな

name: Cloud
text: I’m not good at talking either.
text_jp: 話をするのは　俺も得意じゃない

name: Tifa
text: COSME_352
text_jp: COSME_352

name: Tifa
text: Guess we’re both in for a tough time, huh?
text_jp: お互い　苦労しますな

name: Cloud
text: Just laugh it off next time.
text_jp: ああいうときは笑ってごまかせばいい

name: Tifa
text: I’m not good at that either. Maybe I’m too serious?
text_jp:
そういうのも　苦手なんだよね
私　まじめすぎるのかな

name: Tifa
text: The stars are amazing, huh?
text_jp: 星がすごいね

name: Tifa
text: I wanna stay like this a little longer.
text_jp: もうすこし　こうしていたいな

name: Red XIII
text: Back when I was really a kid...
text_jp: オイラが　本当に子供だった頃

name: Red XIII
text: That day, we sat around this fire just like this with Mom and Dad...
text_jp:
あの日もこんなふうに
ハハとチチと　この火を囲んで……

name: Red XIII
text: No...Never mind, it’s nothing.
text_jp: ううん　やっぱりなんでもないや

name: NPC
text: No...Never mind, it’s nothing.
text_jp: やっぱり　なんでもないや

name: NPC
text: I’ll listen if you wanna talk.
text_jp: 話なら聞くぞ

name: NPC
text: Not interested.
text_jp: 興味ない

name: NPC
text: Don’t stop halfway.
text_jp: 途中でやめるな

name: Cloud
text: I’ll listen if you wanna talk.
text_jp: 話なら　聞くぞ

name: Red XIII
text: Talking about Mom makes my chest feel like it’s gonna burst with pride.
text_jp:
ハハの話をすると　オイラの胸は
誇らしい気持ちではち切れそうになるんだ

name: Red XIII
text: But when I think about Dad...
text_jp: でも　チチのことを思い出すと……

name: Red XIII
text: Guess I’ll talk about it another time.
text_jp: やっぱり　また今度話すよ

name: Cloud
text: Not interested.
text_jp: 興味ないね

name: Red XIII
text: I don’t hate that side of you, Cloud.
text_jp:
クラウドのそういうところ
オイラは嫌いじゃないけどね

name: Cloud
text: You started it. Don’t stop halfway.
text_jp: 話し出したのはそっちだ　途中でやめるな

name: Red XIII
text: Cloud, I recently learned a word called "delicacy."
text_jp:
クラウド　私は最近
『デリカシー』という言葉を覚えたんだ

name: Red XIII
text: It’s used like "lacking delicacy" or "not enough delicacy."
text_jp:
デリカシーがないとか　足りないとか
そんな使い方をする

name: Red XIII
text: This one’s for you.
text_jp: この言葉を　君に捧げるよ

name: Red XIII
text: Guess I’ll talk about it another time.
text_jp: やっぱり　また今度話すよ

name: Red XIII
text: The highlight of this festival’s coming up soon.
text_jp: もうすぐ　このお祭りのいちばんの見どころだよ

name: Red XIII
text: Grrrr...
text_jp: グルルル……

name: Aerith
text: COSME_378
text_jp: COSME_378

name: Aerith
text: COSME_379
text_jp: COSME_379

name: Cloud
text: COSME_380
text_jp: COSME_380

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_381
text_jp: COSME_381

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_382
text_jp: COSME_382

name: Aerith
text: I’m an Ancient, a descendant of the Cetra who cultivated this planet long ago.
text_jp:
わたしは　古代種です
大昔にこの星を開拓した　セトラの末裔です

name: Aerith
text: There’s only one other like me left in this world.
text_jp: この世界に　もうひとりしかいません

name: Aerith
text: Because of this blood, I...
text_jp: この血のせいで　わたしは……

name: Aerith
text: Since I was little, I’ve been watched or locked up.
text_jp: 小さい頃から　監視されたり　閉じ込められたり

name: Aerith
text: Feared, or sometimes just ignored.
text_jp: 怖がられたり　たまに無視されたり

name: Aerith
text: There’s not a single good thing about it.
text_jp: いいことなんて　ひとつもない

name: Aerith
text: No matter how much fun I have, thinking about my blood ruins it all.
text_jp:
どんなに楽しいこと続いても
血のことを思うと　だいなし

name: Aerith
text: It’s happened so many times.
text_jp: そんなことが　何度もありました

name: Aerith
text: I’ve longed for a normal life, then given up on it.
text_jp:
普通の生活なんて　できないんだって
あこがれたり　あきらめたり

name: Aerith
text: COSME_392
text_jp: COSME_392

name: Aerith
text: COSME_393
text_jp: COSME_393

name: Aerith
text: COSME_394
text_jp: COSME_394

name: NPC
text: To cheer Aerith up...
text_jp: エアリスを励ますために……

name: NPC
text: Say something.
text_jp: 言葉をかける

name: NPC
text: Smile at her.
text_jp: 笑いかける

name: NPC
text: Step in to stop her.
text_jp: 止めに入る

name: Cloud
text: Hang in there.
text_jp: がんばれ

name: Aerith
text: COSME_400
text_jp: COSME_400

name: Cloud
text: COSME_401
text_jp: COSME_401

name: Aerith
text: COSME_402
text_jp: COSME_402

name: Cloud
text: That’s enough!
text_jp: そこまでだ！

name: Aerith
text: COSME_404
text_jp: COSME_404

name: Cloud
text: COSME_405
text_jp: COSME_405

name: Aerith
text: I’m okay. I’ll keep going.
text_jp: だいじょうぶです　続けます

name: Aerith
text: But because I’m like this, I’ve met comrades, friends.
text_jp:
でも　そんなわたしだからこそ
出会えた仲間がいます　友達がいます

name: Aerith
text: So I’m okay now. It’s paid off.
text_jp: だから　もうだいじょうぶ　報われました

name: Aerith
text: I’m glad I held on.
text_jp: がまんしてきて　よかった

name: Aerith
text: I want to be a good person so we can stay together forever.
text_jp:
ずっと　いっしょにいられるように
良い人でいよう　そう思っています

name: Aerith
text: Even if a normal life’s out of reach...
text_jp: ふつうの人生は　無理でも

name: Aerith
text: COSME_412
text_jp: COSME_412

name: Aerith
text: COSME_413
text_jp: COSME_413

name: Aerith
text: COSME_414
text_jp: COSME_414

name: Planetologist
text: Now, let us send them off.
text_jp: さあ　送るのじゃ

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_416
text_jp: COSME_416

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_417
text_jp: COSME_417

name: Aerith
text: COSME_418
text_jp: COSME_418

name: Aerith
text: Guess they heard me, huh?
text_jp: 聞かれてしまったか

name: Aerith
text: I’ll keep trying, me.
text_jp: がんばるね　わたし

name: Bugenhagen
text: So here you are, Nanaki.
text_jp: ここにいたのか　ナナキよ

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps!
text_jp: じっちゃん

name: Bugenhagen
text: I’ve got something to tell you. Will you all come along too?
text_jp:
おまえに話さねばならぬことがある
おぬしらも来てくれんか

name: Bugenhagen
text: What’d you think of the Sending Ceremony?
text_jp: 星送りの儀は　どう思ったかの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Lately, for some reason, more folks are comin’ just to see the ritual.
text_jp:
最近は　なんだか知らんが
儀式目当ての客が増えてのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ask ‘em what they think, and it’s "Beautiful", "Moving", "Grand", "I cried."
text_jp:
感想をたずねれば
綺麗　感動　壮大　泣けたとか

name: Bugenhagen
text: Well, nine outta ten’ll say somethin’ like that.
text_jp: まあ　１０人いれば９人はそんな感じじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: It’s good their hearts are stirred. The Sending Ceremony’s got that power, and that’s grand.
text_jp:
心が動くのは良いことじゃ
星送りの儀に　その力があることは素晴らしい

name: Bugenhagen
text: But those willin’ to take a step further and study Planetology? Hardly any.
text_jp:
だが　一歩踏み込んで
星命学を学ぼうという者は　まあ～おらん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Dogs, cats, birds, fish, and flowers—
text_jp: 犬や猫　鳥　魚　そして草花

name: Bugenhagen
text: Everyone knows they’re alive.
text_jp: みんな生きとることは　誰でも知っておる

name: Bugenhagen
text: A baby’s born, a flower blooms—Anyone’d feel life’s presence there.
text_jp:
赤ん坊が生まれる　花が芽吹く
そこには誰もが命の存在を感じるはずじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: It’s the same with the planet.
text_jp: 星も同じなんだがのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho...Sorry, I got a bit complainy there.
text_jp: ホッホ……すまんの　ついグチグチと

name: Bugenhagen
text: Age’ll do that—can’t stop the gripin’ and preachin’.
text_jp: 歳をとると　愚痴と説教が止まらんわ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! Well then, shall we get goin’?
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ！
では　行くとするかの

name: Red XIII
text: But this door...
text_jp: でも　この扉って……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Aye, it’s the one I sealed and forbade anyone from enterin’.
text_jp:
さよう　わしが封印し
立ち入りを禁じてきた扉じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: From here, you’ll take a trial.
text_jp: これより　おまえに試験を受けてもらう

name: Red XIII
text: Huh?
text_jp: えっ？

name: Bugenhagen
text: If you wanna be a warrior protectin’ this valley, you can’t avoid it.
text_jp:
この谷を守る戦士になりたければ
避けては通れまい

name: Bugenhagen
text: You ready?
text_jp: 覚悟はできたな？

name: Red XIII
text: Yeah.
text_jp: うん

name: Bugenhagen
text: This trial’ll need your friends’ help too.
text_jp: 試験には　おぬしたちの協力が必要じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: We’re headin’ somewhere a bit dangerous, so let me know when you’re ready.
text_jp:
少しばかり　危険なところへ行くのでな
準備ができたら　声をかけてくれ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Think you’re good to go?
text_jp: 行けそうかな？

name: NPC
text: Will you take on Nanaki’s trial?
text_jp: ナナキの試験に挑みますか？

name: NPC
text: Yes
text_jp: はい

name: NPC
text: No
text_jp: いいえ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Then let’s go.
text_jp: では　行こう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Head deeper and deeper into this cave.
text_jp: この洞窟を　奥へ奥へと進むのじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Did Nanaki tell you about his parents?
text_jp: ナナキから　両親の話は聞いたかな？

name: Cloud
text: No.
text_jp: いや

name: Red XIII
text: Both my parents were warriors who protected the valley.
text_jp:
オイラの両親は
ふたりとも　谷を守る戦士だった

name: Red XIII
text: So when the enemy attacked the valley, Mom fought bravely and gave her life to defend it.
text_jp:
だから　敵が谷に攻め込んで来たとき
ハハは勇敢に戦い　命を懸けて谷を守った

name: Red XIII
text: But my coward of a dad...He ran off on his own.
text_jp:
でも　卑怯者のチチは……
ひとりで逃げ出したんだ

name: Bugenhagen
text: So you still can’t forgive Seto, huh?
text_jp: やはり　セトは許せんか

name: Red XIII
text: Of course not!
text_jp: あたりまえだよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho...Hoo...
text_jp: ホーホウ　ホウ……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホーホウ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: From here on, only the one takin’ the trial and one witness can go forward.
text_jp:
ここから先に進むのは
試験を受ける者と見届ける者　ふたりのみじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: So me and...
text_jp: じゃあ　オイラと……

name: Cloud
text: I’ll go.
text_jp: 俺が行く

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! You’d be no good for Nanaki’s training.
text_jp:
ホーホウホウ
おぬしでは　ナナキの修行にならん

name: Bugenhagen
text: That’s right.
text_jp: そうじゃのお

name: Bugenhagen
text: You’re the right one for this.
text_jp: おぬしが適任じゃな

name: Barret
text: Huh?
text_jp: あん？

name: Red XIII
text: Whaaat?
text_jp: ええ～？

name: Barret
text: You’ve gotten real bold, huh?
text_jp: おまえ　遠慮がなくなったよな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! Get yourselves ready.
text_jp: ホッホウ　準備をしっかりな

name: Red XIII
text: Got it!
text_jp: はーい

name: Bugenhagen
text: Once you’re ready, we’re off!
text_jp: 準備ができたら　出発じゃ！

name: Assistant
text: The cave’s dangerous. Please take utmost care.
text_jp:
洞窟内は危険です
じゅうぶんにお気をつけくださいますよう

name: Assistant
text: May the planet be with you.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Red XIII
text: Make sure you watch me, okay?
text_jp: ちゃんと見ててよ？

name: Barret
text: Yeah, I’ll stare holes into ya!
text_jp: おう　穴があくほどな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホーホウ！

name: Red XIII
text: This place...
text_jp: ここって……

name: Bugenhagen
text: The ones sealed at the valley’s depths—a place swirling with their sorrow.
text_jp:
谷底に封じられし者達
その悲しみの渦巻く場所じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Look at this, Nanaki.
text_jp: これを見よ　ナナキ

name: Red XIII
text: Okay.
text_jp: うん

name: Bugenhagen
text: You should be able to climb it.
text_jp: おまえならば　登れるはずじゃ

name: Barret
text: Man, you’re so damn nimble.
text_jp: ったく　身軽でいいよな

name: Barret
text: Hey, you leavin’ me behind?
text_jp: おい　置いてく気かよ

name: Barret
text: Oi, how far’d you go!?
text_jp: おう　どこまで行きやがった～？

name: Barret
text: This place gives me the creeps.
text_jp: 気味が悪いぜ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Forty-five years ago, a fierce battle unfolded right here.
text_jp:
４０と５年前のことじゃ
苛烈な戦いが　ここで繰り広げられた

name: Red XIII
text: No way...The Gi made it this far in?
text_jp:
まさか　ギ族は
こんなところまで入り込んでいたの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホーホウ！

name: Barret
text: What’s this Gi-whatever you’re talkin’ about?
text_jp: なんだ　そのギなんとかってのはよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: A tribe unknown to anyone outside this valley. Don’t rush— you’ll see soon enough.
text_jp:
この谷の者以外　存在すら知らぬ一族じゃ
まあ　そうあせるでない　じきわかる

name: Barret
text: Oi, old man! Hide somewhere ‘til this is over!
text_jp:
おう　じいさん
片付くまで　どっか隠れとけ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! I’d do that even without ya tellin’ me.
text_jp: ホッホウ　言われんでもそうするわい

name: Barret
text: They dead or what?
text_jp: 死んでんのか？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Those are the Gi.
text_jp: 彼らが　ギ族じゃ

name: Red XIII
text: They’re huge, huh?
text_jp: おっきいんだね

name: Bugenhagen
text: You can’t judge a thing’s essence by its looks alone.
text_jp: 外見だけで　物事の本質を捉えることはできぬ

name: Bugenhagen
text: But...it’s true their power was immense.
text_jp: が……事実　彼らの力は強大だった

name: Red XIII
text: Mom fought these things...
text_jp: こいつらに　ハハは……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Nanaki, here’s your first trial.
text_jp: ナナキよ　最初の試験じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Figure out what happened here in your own way.
text_jp:
ここでなにが起きたのか
おまえなりに探ってみい

name: Red XIII
text: Got it.
text_jp: わかった

name: Gi
text: Seek our relics, carry them, uncover the truth. Only then will the path open.
text_jp:
我らの遺物を探し　運び　真実を解き明かせ
さすれば　道は開けるであろう

name: Gi
text: No, seek the rightful relics...
text_jp: 否　正しき遺物を探せ……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! That’s just a bone.
text_jp: ホーホウ　それはただの骨じゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, this...It’d make a fine toy for you.
text_jp:
ほう　これは……
おまえのオモチャに　ちょうど良さそうじゃの

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho...Ho hoo...
text_jp: ホー……ホーホゥ……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Sorry, I dozed off there.
text_jp: すまぬ　寝てしまったわい

name: Gi
text: Oh, memories of battle...The time of our awakening draws near...
text_jp:
おお　戦いの記憶……
我らが目覚めの時は近い……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, a Gi arrow, eh?
text_jp: ほう　ギ族の矢か

name: Bugenhagen
text: They say the poison on the arrowhead spreads fast, turnin’ ya to stone in no time.
text_jp:
矢尻の先に塗られた毒は　瞬く間に体を巡り
石のように動かなくなってしまうという話じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: A weapon used by the valley folk.
text_jp: 谷の者が使っていた武器じゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: This pattern on the handle—same as the one on your body, ain’t it?
text_jp:
柄に施されたこの文様　おまえの体にも
同じものが描かれているじゃろうて

name: Bugenhagen
text: Memories of souls orbiting the planet, knowledge, crystallized—Commonly called Materia these days.
text_jp:
星を巡る魂の記憶　知識　その結晶
一般的には　マテリアと呼ばれておるようじゃの

name: Gi
text: Seek our relics, carry them, uncover the truth. Only then will the path open.
text_jp:
我らの遺物を探し　運び　真実を解き明かせ
さすれば　道は開けるであろう

name: Gi
text: Oh, our remains, the Gi’s will...
text_jp: おお　我らの亡骸　ギ族の想い……

name: Barret
text: Oi, let go!
text_jp: おい　離せ！

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_518
text_jp: COSME_518

name: Gi
text: Who awakens our suffering!?
text_jp: 我らが苦しみ　呼び覚ますのは誰だ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: That was a Gi spectre.
text_jp: いまのは　ギ族の亡霊じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Even after perishin’ in battle with us, their hatred grew, and now they wander this cave.
text_jp:
我々との戦いで滅びた後も　憎悪が募り
こうして　洞窟をさまよっているのじゃよ

name: Red XIII
text: They’re persistent, huh?
text_jp: しつこいなあ

name: Bugenhagen
text: They’ve got their own reasons. Don’t look down on the defeated.
text_jp:
彼らには　彼らの事情がある
敗者を下に見てはいかん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Even this statue’s here for a reason. Don’t treat it carelessly.
text_jp:
この石像とて　故あってここに存在しておるのじゃ
無下に扱うでない

name: Red XIII
text: Gotcha.
text_jp: は～い

name: Gi
text: Our remains, carry the statue...
text_jp: 我らの亡骸　石像を運べ……

name: Gi
text: Our remains, carry the statue...
text_jp: 我らの亡骸　石像を運べ……

name: Red XIII
text: Is this an altar?
text_jp: ここは　祭壇？

name: Barret
text: Feels more like a cursed chamber, don’t it?
text_jp:
どっちかっつーと
呪いの間って感じじゃねーか？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! That’s a mighty interestin’ take.
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ！
なかなか　面白い見立てじゃの

name: Red XIII
text: This statue...the one from before?
text_jp: この像……さっきの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Everything has meaning.
text_jp: すべてのことに意味はある

name: Bugenhagen
text: Just as everything has no meaning.
text_jp: すべてのことに意味がないのと同じじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: You know what to do, Nanaki.
text_jp: すべきことはわかるな　ナナキ

name: Gi
text: Our remains...Carry the statue and enshrine it at the rightful altar.
text_jp:
我らの亡骸……石像を運び
正しき祭壇にまつれ

name: Gi
text: No, enshrine it at the rightful altar.
text_jp: 否　正しき祭壇にまつれ

name: Gi
text: Oh, will you seal our resentment...?
text_jp: おお　我らの恨み　封じるか……

name: Barret
text: They comin’ or not?
text_jp: 来るか　来んのか？

name: Red XIII
text: Is it over?
text_jp: おわり？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! It’s just beginnin’.
text_jp: ホーホウ　はじまりじゃよ

name: Gi
text: Our remains...Carry the statue and enshrine it at the rightful altar.
text_jp:
我らの亡骸……石像を運び
正しき祭壇にまつれ

name: Gi
text: Oh, will you seal our anger...?
text_jp: おお　我らの怒り　封じるか……

name: Gi
text: Oh, will you seal our sorrow...?
text_jp: おお　我らの悲しみ　封じるか……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Thousands of years ago, this valley’s history began with the arrival of the Gi.
text_jp:
数千年の昔　この谷の歴史は
ギ族の訪れとともに始まった

name: Bugenhagen
text: This altar was built back then to seal the Gi away.
text_jp:
この祭壇は　その頃
ギ族を封じるために作られたものなのじゃよ

name: Red XIII
text: If the Gi were sealed ages ago, why’d they attack the valley that day?
text_jp:
大昔に封印されたはずのギ族が
どうしてあの日　谷を襲ったの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Their truth’s somethin’ only they know.
text_jp: 彼らの真実は　彼らにしかわからん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Let’s go find your truth.
text_jp: 行こう　おまえの真実を探しに

name: Bugenhagen
text: This cave’s the boundary between the Gi and the human world.
text_jp: この洞窟は　ギ族と人の世との境界線

name: Bugenhagen
text: If the Gi broke through here, the valley wouldn’t’ve stood a chance.
text_jp:
ここから　ギ族に攻め込まれたら
谷は　ひとたまりもなかったじゃろうな

name: Red XIII
text: Yeah.
text_jp: そうだね

name: Bugenhagen
text: But one warrior noticed this defenseless cave.
text_jp:
しかし　ある戦士が
この無防備な洞窟に気づいた

name: Red XIII
text: Huh?
text_jp: えっ？

name: Bugenhagen
text: That lone warrior came to this cave. Sure enough, it was crawlin’ with Gi.
text_jp:
戦士はたったひとり　この洞窟へとやってきた
案の定　中はギ族でいっぱいになっておった

name: Bugenhagen
text: Fightin’ off wave after wave of Gi, the warrior ran and ran.
text_jp:
次から次へと襲いかかるギ族と戦い
戦士は走りに走った

name: Red XIII
text: Hey, Gramps, if they were that brave, I’d know about a warrior like that!
text_jp:
ねえ　じっちゃん　そんな勇敢な戦士なら
オイラは知ってるはずだよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホウ

name: Bugenhagen
text: From here on, be extra careful. The evil aura’s gettin’ stronger.
text_jp:
ここから先は　より注意深くな
邪気が強くなっておる

name: Barret
text: COSME_559
text_jp: COSME_559

name: Barret
text: Well, damn, look at this!
text_jp: なんとまあ　こりゃあ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_561
text_jp: COSME_561

name: Bugenhagen
text: Fear slips into your heart in an instant.
text_jp: 怖れは　瞬時に心に入り込む

name: Bugenhagen
text: But don’t let it rule you. You’re your own master.
text_jp:
だが　支配を許すな
おまえの主人は　おまえ自身じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Pass through all the doors ahead, and the trial’s done.
text_jp: 奥に見えておる扉をすべて越えれば　試験終了じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Steel yourself and go.
text_jp: 心してかかるがよい

name: Barret
text: How the hell do we open this?
text_jp: どうやって開けんだ　これ？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Well, Nanaki, what’ll you do?
text_jp: さあナナキ　どうする？

name: Bugenhagen
text: You’ve gotten wise, Nanaki.
text_jp: 賢くなったのう　ナナキ

name: Gi Spectre
text: This presence—I’ll never forget it.
text_jp: この気配　忘れもせんぞ

name: Gi Spectre
text: Our regrets, we’ll settle them now!
text_jp: 我らが無念　いまこそ晴らさん！

name: Gi Spectre
text: Damn treacherous bastards!
text_jp: 忌々しい裏切り者め！

name: Gi Spectre
text: We’ll wipe you out right here!
text_jp: ここで消し去ってくれる！

name: Red XIII
text: Got ‘em!
text_jp: やった！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Well, now, I wonder...
text_jp: さあ　どうだろうか

name: Bugenhagen
text: They’re spectres—their suffering never fades.
text_jp: 彼らは亡霊　苦しみが消えることはない

name: Bugenhagen
text: Let’s go. Our destination’s just ahead.
text_jp: 行くぞ　目的地はもうすぐそこじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: Huh? Another altar?
text_jp: あれ　また祭壇？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! It looks similar, but it’s different. Much, much older—built long, long ago.
text_jp:
ホーホウ　似ているが違う
もっともっと　ずっと古くに作られたものじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: The last altar was made to seal the Gi.
text_jp: 先の祭壇は　ギ族を封印するためのもの

name: Bugenhagen
text: This one was crafted by the Cetra to speak with the Gi.
text_jp:
この祭壇は　セトラが
ギ族と語り合うために作ったものじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: Speak with them? Why? The Gi are enemies, right?
text_jp: 語り合うって　なんで？　ギ族は敵なんだよね

name: Bugenhagen
text: Good and evil, friend and foe—such distinctions are just defined by the times.
text_jp:
善悪や敵味方の区別など
時々の状況が　それを定義するに過ぎん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Now, Nanaki, carve your own path with your strength.
text_jp:
さあ　ナナキ
おまえの力で道を切りひらくのじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_584
text_jp: COSME_584

name: Red XIII
text: Are they...crying?
text_jp: 泣いているの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho...Sorrow, too, keeps changing its shape.
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ……
悲しみもまた　絶えず姿を変えていく

name: Bugenhagen
text: Forty-five years ago, a lone warrior came here and took it all upon themselves.
text_jp:
４５年前　ひとりここまでやってきた戦士は
そのすべてを　一身に引き受けたのじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: This is...
text_jp: これは……

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps!
text_jp: じっちゃん！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Trouble—a whiff of hatred.
text_jp: いかん　憎悪の気配

name: Bugenhagen
text: Be careful, Nanaki!
text_jp: 気をつけるのじゃ　ナナキ！

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_592
text_jp: COSME_592

name: Barret
text: COSME_593
text_jp: COSME_593

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_594
text_jp: COSME_594

name: Barret
text: COSME_595
text_jp: COSME_595

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_596
text_jp: COSME_596

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_597
text_jp: COSME_597

name: Barret
text: COSME_598
text_jp: COSME_598

name: Bugenhagen
text: Their grudge still lingers, huh?
text_jp: 怨念は　いまだ消えずか

name: Bugenhagen
text: You’ve grown strong, Nanaki.
text_jp: ナナキよ　強くなったのう

name: Red XIII
text: Heh, well, yeah!
text_jp: へへ　まあね！

name: Red XIII
text: So, did I pass the warrior trial?
text_jp: 戦士の試験は　これで合格？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! I can’t decide that on my own.
text_jp:
ホーホウホウ！
わしひとりじゃ　決められんのう

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_604
text_jp: COSME_604

name: Bugenhagen
text: Let’s hear that warrior’s opinion too.
text_jp: あの戦士の意見も聞こうではないか

name: Bugenhagen
text: That warrior fought alone here to protect the valley—and even now, he keeps guarding us.
text_jp:
戦士は　ひとりこの地で戦い　谷を守った
そしていまもここで　我々を守り続けている

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps, that’s...
text_jp: じっちゃん　あれって

name: Red XIII
text: That’s Seto? My dad...
text_jp:
あれが　セト？
オイラのチチ……

name: Bugenhagen
text: His body turned to stone from poisoned arrows, but his gallant form stands unbroken, unyielding.
text_jp:
毒矢で体は石になってしまったが
崩れることなく　欠けることなく　あの勇姿じゃ

name: Red XIII
text: Ma...Did mom know?
text_jp: ハハは……母さんは知ってたの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! Aye, she knew.
text_jp: ホーホウホウ　知っておったとも

name: Bugenhagen
text: They both asked me to seal this cave.
text_jp:
わしは　ふたりから
洞窟の封印を頼まれたんじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: Why...
text_jp: なんで……

name: Red XIII
text: Why didn’t you tell me!?
text_jp: なんで　教えてくれなかったの！

name: Bugenhagen
text: If I’d told you, wouldn’t you have come here alone to see him?
text_jp:
教えたら　ひとりでここまで
会いにこようとしたのではないか？

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_616
text_jp: COSME_616

name: Bugenhagen
text: The one thing your parents wanted to protect most—it was none other than...
text_jp:
おまえの両親が　もっとも守りたかったもの
それは　ほかならぬ

name: Bugenhagen
text: You, Nanaki.
text_jp: おまえだよ　ナナキ

name: Red XIII
text: Because I was small and weak?
text_jp: オイラが　小さくて弱かったから？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホウホウ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: That small, powerless Nanaki has grown into a fine warrior.
text_jp:
あの小さく　非力だったナナキが
こうして　立派な戦士に成長した

name: Bugenhagen
text: That’s why I brought you here.
text_jp: だから　ここへ連れてきたのじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_623
text_jp: COSME_623

name: Bugenhagen
text: Nanaki, keep traveling as you are.
text_jp:
ナナキよ
おまえはこのまま　旅を続けなさい

name: Red XIII
text: I’m a warrior of the valley!
text_jp: オイラは谷の戦士だ！

name: Red XIII
text: Like Dad, I’ll stay here forever—
text_jp: チチみたいに　これからずっとこの谷で

name: Bugenhagen
text: Listen, Nanaki.
text_jp: 聞くのじゃ　ナナキ

name: Bugenhagen
text: I didn’t want to believe what Cloud and the others were saying.
text_jp:
クラウドたちの言うことを
わしは信じようとしなかった

name: Bugenhagen
text: Sounded like something those seminar folks’d cook up.
text_jp: セミナーの連中がしそうな話だとな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Even when I see or hear something new, feels like I already know it somehow.
text_jp:
新しいものを見ても　聞いても
なーんか知ってるような気がしてのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: My eyes’ve started missing the chance of great wisdom that might be out there.
text_jp:
偉大な知見が含まれているかもしれん可能性を
わしのこの目は　見過ごすようになってしまった

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps...
text_jp: じっちゃん……

name: Bugenhagen
text: I don’t wanna hold the youngsters back.
text_jp: 若者たちの足を引っ張るのは嫌じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Go, Nanaki! Don’t let this valley stain you with an old man’s colors.
text_jp:
行け　ナナキよ！
この谷で　ジジイ色に染まるな

name: Bugenhagen
text: My eyes are cloudy, my ears clogged—see the world in my stead!
text_jp:
目が曇り　耳も詰まってしまった
わしのかわりに世界を見てくるのじゃ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Take care of Nanaki.
text_jp: ナナキを頼む

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, got it.
text_jp: ああ　わかった

name: Bugenhagen
text: COSME_638
text_jp: COSME_638

name: Bugenhagen
text: You failed the trial—go train and come back!
text_jp: 試験は不合格　修業を積んで出直してこい！

name: Bugenhagen
text: You can do it, right, Nanaki?
text_jp: できるな？　ナナキ

name: Red XIII
text: Of course! ‘Cause...
text_jp: もちろん　だって……

name: Red XIII
text: I’m Nanaki of Cosmo Canyon!
text_jp: オイラは　コスモキャニオンのナナキ！

name: Barret
text: COSME_643
text_jp: COSME_643

name: Barret
text: COSME_644
text_jp: COSME_644

name: Barret
text: COSME_645
text_jp: COSME_645

name: Red XIII
text: The son of the warrior Seto!
text_jp: 戦士セトの息子だ！

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_647
text_jp: COSME_647

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_648
text_jp: COSME_648

name: Aerith
text: COSME_649
text_jp: COSME_649

text: O child of a warrior...
text_jp: 戦士の子よ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_651
text_jp: COSME_651

name: Barret
text: COSME_652
text_jp: COSME_652

name: Gi Nattak
text: My name is Gi Nattak.
text_jp: 我が名は　ギ・ナタタク

name: Gi Nattak
text: O valiant and daring warrior Seto, we wish to entrust our hopes to your kin once more.
text_jp:
勇猛にして果敢な戦士セトよ
そなたの一族に　再び我らの願いを託したい

name: Gi Nattak
text: As expected of Seto—our thanks for your generous heart.
text_jp: さすがセト　寛大な心に感謝する

name: Aerith
text: COSME_656
text_jp: COSME_656

name: Tifa
text: COSME_657
text_jp: COSME_657

name: Gi Nattak
text: Warrior Nanaki, and...
text_jp: 戦士ナナキ　そして……

name: Gi Nattak
text: O child of the Cetra...
text_jp: セトラの民よ

name: Gi Nattak
text: Come with us.
text_jp: ともに来てくれ

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps...
text_jp: じっちゃん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho hooo! Things just got interesting, huh?
text_jp:
ホーホーホーーーウ！
面白いことになってきたのう

name: Barret
text: Reward’s 2,000, yeah?
text_jp: 報酬は２０００だな

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_664
text_jp: COSME_664

name: Cloud
text: COSME_665
text_jp: COSME_665

name: Cloud
text: No charge. Let’s go.
text_jp: タダでいい　行くぞ

name: Bugenhagen
text: That one’s likely a living Gi spirit. Look after Nanaki, will ya?
text_jp:
あやつは　ギ族の生霊じゃろう
ナナキを頼んだぞ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! See, hear, touch—enjoy the world!
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ！
見て聞いて触れて　世界を楽しむのじゃよ

name: Assistant
text: Lord Bugenhagen will be escorted back by us.
text_jp: ブーゲンハーゲン様は　我々が送り届けます

name: Assistant
text: Please, take care.
text_jp: どうぞ　お気をつけて

name: Assistant
text: Please look after Nanaki.
text_jp: ナナキを　よろしくお願いいたします

name: Assistant
text: May the planet be with you.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Yuffie
text: I’ve got no clue what’s goin’ on—what is this?
text_jp: ぜんっぜん状況がわかんないんだけど　これなに？

name: Yuffie
text: I’m a materia hunter, right? Fightin’ for Wutai and all that~
text_jp:
アタシ　マテリアハンターなんだよね
ウータイのために戦ってるんだよね～

name: Cait Sith
text: Could ya quiet down a wee bit? This ain’t exactly a normal situation to stay calm in.
text_jp:
ちょ～っと黙ってくれません？
てか　フツー怖がる状況とちゃいます

name: Yuffie
text: But that Gi guy’s all polite and stuff!
text_jp: だってなんか礼儀正しいじゃん　あのギ族

name: Barret
text: That’s the kinda thing that’s actually the scariest. Don’t let your guard down!
text_jp:
そういうのが　実はいちばん怖えんだ
気ぃ抜くなよ！

name: Gi Nattak
text: We’d like to guide you to our home.
text_jp: 我らの住み処へ案内したい

name: Gi Nattak
text: Come, please board.
text_jp: さあ　お乗りください

name: Yuffie
text: If we go, will there be somethin’ good? Like, an awesome materia or somethin’?
text_jp:
行ったら　なんかいいことある？
すんごいマテリアくれるとか

name: Gi Nattak
text: Quite the coincidence. We, too, seek materia.
text_jp:
奇遇ですな
我々もマテリアを求めているのです

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_682
text_jp: COSME_682

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_683
text_jp: COSME_683

name: Yuffie
text: Alright, hop on, hop on!
text_jp: さあ　乗って乗って！

name: Barret
text: COSME_685
text_jp: COSME_685

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_686
text_jp: COSME_686

name: Barret
text: COSME_687
text_jp: COSME_687

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_688
text_jp: COSME_688

name: Barret
text: COSME_689
text_jp: COSME_689

name: Red XIII
text: I’ll be back, Dad...Gramps.
text_jp: 行ってくるよ　父さん　じっちゃん

name: Yuffie
text: Gross...
text_jp: 気持ち悪い……

name: Red XIII
text: Try matching your body to the boat’s sway.
text_jp: 船の揺れに　体をあわせるといいよ

name: Yuffie
text: Like I can do somethin’ that fancy~
text_jp: んな　器用なことできるか～

name: Tifa
text: After you jumped aboard so eagerly...
text_jp: あんなに勢いよく乗り込んだのに

name: Yuffie
text: It’s for the materia!
text_jp: マテリアのためだもん

name: Gi Nattak
text: Quietly now—the planet is listening.
text_jp: 静かに　星が聞いています

name: Barret
text: Is it bad if they hear?
text_jp: 聞かれちゃ　まずいのか？

name: Gi Nattak
text: If the planet knows, it’ll soon reach the Cetra’s ears.
text_jp:
星が知ると　それはほどなく
セトラの耳に入るのですよ

name: Gi Nattak
text: The Cetra lack a bit of...tolerance, you see.
text_jp: セトラは少々　寛容の精神に欠けますからね

name: Aerith
text: I’m a descendant of the Cetra, though.
text_jp: わたし　セトラの末裔ですけど

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_701
text_jp: COSME_701

name: Aerith
text: COSME_702
text_jp: COSME_702

name: Gi Nattak
text: It seems you’ve only inherited their blood.
text_jp: あなたが継承したのは　血だけのようだ

name: Gi Nattak
text: You’ve left the Cetra’s story behind somewhere, haven’t you?
text_jp: セトラの物語は　どこかに忘れてきましたね

name: Aerith
text: Have I?
text_jp: そうなの？

name: Gi Nattak
text: The days of the Cetra were harsh. Ignorance might let you live longer.
text_jp:
セトラの日々は過酷です
知らない方が長く生きられるでしょう

name: Aerith
text: COSME_707
text_jp: COSME_707

name: Gi Nattak
text: We’ve arrived.
text_jp: 到着です

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_709
text_jp: COSME_709

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_710
text_jp: COSME_710

name: Yuffie
text: No way I’m losin’~!
text_jp: 負けるかあ～！

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_712
text_jp: COSME_712

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_713
text_jp: COSME_713

name: Tifa
text: COSME_714
text_jp: COSME_714

name: Tifa
text: COSME_715
text_jp: COSME_715

name: Gi Nattak
text: Welcome to the Gi’s village.
text_jp: ようこそ　ギ族の里へ

name: Gi
text: People of the planet, you’ve done well to come.
text_jp: 星の民よ　よくぞ来た

name: Barret
text: What the hell was that!?
text_jp: なんだ　いまのは！

name: Gi Nattak
text: The Gi’s consciousness lingers even without flesh—it never fades.
text_jp:
ギの意識は　肉体を無くしても
滅することがありません

name: Gi Nattak
text: The planet won’t accept the consciousness of outsiders like us.
text_jp:
よそ者の我らの意識を
星は受け入れてはくれないのです

name: Barret
text: COSME_721
text_jp: COSME_721

name: Barret
text: That’s a tough spot. I feel for ya.
text_jp: それは難儀なこった　同情するぜ

name: Gi Nattak
text: This statue is a vessel for the Gi who’ve lost their bodies.
text_jp: この像は体を無くした　ギの依り代

name: Gi Nattak
text: Please lend them an ear—they’re starving for someone to listen.
text_jp:
訴えに耳を傾けてやってください
彼らは　聞き手に飢えています

name: Gi Nattak
text: COSME_725
text_jp: COSME_725

name: Aerith
text: The planet won’t accept the outsider Gi.
text_jp: よそ者のギ族を　星は受け入れてくれない

name: Tifa
text: They can’t return to the Lifestream, huh?
text_jp: ライフストリームに帰れないんだね

name: Yuffie
text: So they don’t die? That’s invincible!
text_jp: それって死なないってこと？　無敵じゃん！

name: Cait Sith
text: But it’s not like they’re alive either, aye?
text_jp: 生きてるっちゅーワケでも　ないんでっしゃろ

name: Cait Sith
text: That half-baked state—ain’t it worse than dyin’?
text_jp:
そんな中途ハンパな状態
死ぬより　苦しいんとちゃいます？

name: Yuffie
text: Like you’d know—you’ve never died!
text_jp: 死んだことなんかないクセに

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_732
text_jp: COSME_732

name: Yuffie
text: Wait, are you even alive?
text_jp: っていうか　あんた生きてるの？

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_734
text_jp: COSME_734

name: Cait Sith
text: Half-baked’s me, huh~
text_jp: 中途半端は　ボクでっか～

name: Gi
text: The Gi sought materia...
text_jp: ギは　マテリアを求めたり

name: Yuffie
text: Me too!
text_jp: アタシもだよ

name: Gi Spectre
text: For us, there’s neither death nor life.
text_jp: 我らには　死も生もない

name: Gi Spectre
text: Only eternity.
text_jp: あるのは　永遠のみ

name: Gi Spectre
text: The Gi sought materia...
text_jp: ギは　マテリアを求めたり

name: Gi Spectre
text: The Gi sought materia...
text_jp: ギは　マテリアを求めたり

name: Gi
text: Our fate—not accepted by the planet—we searched for a way to heal ourselves.
text_jp:
星に受け入れられぬ我らのさだめ
我らは　我らを癒す道を探った

name: Yuffie
text: And that’s materia?
text_jp: それが　マテリアなの？

name: Gi
text: The Gi sought a materia of healing...
text_jp: ギは　癒しのマテリアを求めたり

name: Gi Spectre
text: The Cetra abandoned us.
text_jp: セトラは　我らを見捨てた

name: Gi Spectre
text: The Cetra betrayed us.
text_jp: セトラは　我らを裏切った

name: Gi Spectre
text: The Gi sought healing...
text_jp: ギは　癒しを求めたり

name: Gi Spectre
text: The Gi sought healing...
text_jp: ギは　癒しを求めたり

name: Gi
text: Materia...It’d grant us the ultimate healing.
text_jp:
マテリア……
それは　究極の癒しを我らに与える

name: Yuffie
text: Ultimate materia!
text_jp: 究極のマテリア！

name: Yuffie
text: Where? Where is it!?
text_jp: どこ　どこにあんの？

name: Gi
text: The Gi sought ultimate healing in materia...
text_jp: ギは　究極の癒しをマテリアに求めたり

name: Gi
text: The ultimate healing—nothingness. Returning to nothing is our deepest wish.
text_jp:
究極の癒し　すなわち　無
無に帰ることこそ　我々の悲願

name: Yuffie
text: Nothingness is healing? What’s that!?
text_jp: 無になることが　いやし？　ナニソレ

name: Gi
text: The Gi entrusted their wish to pure materia...
text_jp: ギは　無垢なるマテリアに願いを託したり

name: Barret
text: Somethin’s pricklin’ at my chest.
text_jp: なんか　胸のあたりがザラッとするぜ

name: Barret
text: This place don’t feel too good.
text_jp: あんまり　いい感じじゃねえな　ここは

name: Cait Sith
text: For the Gi, healing’s becomin’ nothing.
text_jp: ギ族にとって　癒しは無になること

name: Cait Sith
text: Their wish is to vanish from this planet—or else wipe the planet out with ‘em?
text_jp:
この星から消えるんが願い
せやなかったら　星ごと消す？

name: Yuffie
text: Scary!
text_jp: こわっ！

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_761
text_jp: COSME_761

name: Red XIII
text: Yeah.
text_jp: うん

name: Yuffie
text: Wouldn’t it be better if someone reliable like me managed that materia?
text_jp:
そのマテリア　アタシみたいに
しっかりした人が管理したほうが良くない？

name: Cait Sith
text: I reckon stayin’ outta this’d be smarter.
text_jp: 関わらんほうが得策やと思いますけど

name: Cloud
text: Looks like it’s too late for that.
text_jp: もう遅いようだな

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_766
text_jp: COSME_766

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_767
text_jp: COSME_767

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_768
text_jp: COSME_768

name: Red XIII
text: What’re they gonna ask us to do?
text_jp: オイラたちに　なにを頼む気なんだろう

name: Gi
text: The Gi’s wish stained pure materia black...
text_jp: ギの願いは　無垢なるマテリアを黒く染め抜いた

name: Gi
text: The Gi’s wish stained pure materia black...
text_jp: ギの願いは　無垢なるマテリアを黒く染め抜いた

name: Gi
text: The Gi’s wish—
text_jp: ギの願いは──

name: Barret
text: The Black Materia!?
text_jp: 黒いマテリアかよ

name: Cloud
text: COSME_774
text_jp: COSME_774

name: Gi
text: The Gi’s wish stained pure materia black...
text_jp: ギの願いは　無垢なるマテリアを黒く染め抜いた

name: Cloud
text: Looks like we can’t avoid this materia.
text_jp: このマテリアを　避けては通れないらしい

name: Cloud
text: I won’t play into his hands.
text_jp: あいつの言いなりにはならない

name: Cloud
text: No tellin’ how far we can fool ‘em, but let’s play along.
text_jp: どこまでだませるかわからないが　話を合わせよう

name: Gi Nattak
text: Our homeland, our planet, grew old and faded, becoming part of this planet.
text_jp:
我らギの故郷　我らの星は老いて力尽き
この星の一部となりました

name: Gi Nattak
text: The sky split, the earth cracked, the seas vanished, and time unraveled.
text_jp:
空は割れ　大地は裂け
海は消え　時は乱れ

name: Gi Nattak
text: A handful of Gi survived that chaos and became dwellers of this planet.
text_jp:
その混乱を生きのびた　少数のギが
この星の住人となったのです

name: Gi Nattak
text: But to the planet, the Gi were foreign.
text_jp: しかし星にとって　ギは異物でありました

name: Gi Nattak
text: Even in death, still foreign.
text_jp: 死してもなお異物

name: Gi Nattak
text: We’re not allowed to fade into the planet’s consciousness—the Lifestream.
text_jp:
星の意識　いわゆるライフストリームの中に
消え去ることは許されません

name: Gi Nattak
text: Bound to this land under the planet’s watch...
text_jp: 星が見張る　この土地に縛りつけられ

name: Gi Nattak
text: Unable to live or vanish, enduring a meaningless torment of time.
text_jp:
生きることも　消えることも許されず
無為な時を過ごす苦行

name: Gi Nattak
text: Our deepest wish became liberation from this suffering.
text_jp:
この苦行から解放されることが
我々の悲願になりました

name: Gi Nattak
text: We obtained pure materia nurtured by the planet and poured our clan’s wish into it.
text_jp:
我々は　星が育んだ無垢なるマテリアを手に入れ
一族の願いを注ぎ込んだのです

name: Gi Nattak
text: After an eternity...
text_jp: 長いときの果て……

name: Gi Nattak
text: The materia finally accepted our wish, and we gained the great materia of healing.
text_jp:
マテリアは　ついに願いを受け入れ
我らは大いなる癒しのマテリアを手に入れました

name: Gi Nattak
text: We rejoiced, thinking our wish would finally come true—but that joy was short-lived.
text_jp:
悲願が叶う　ついにその時が来たと
喜んだのも束の間のこと

name: Gi Nattak
text: The hated Cetra invaded this land and stole our treasure.
text_jp:
憎きセトラがこの地に入り込み
我らの宝を奪い取ってしまったのです

name: Gi Nattak
text: We call that jet-black orb the "Black Materia."
text_jp:
我々は　その漆黒の宝珠を
『黒マテリア』と呼んでいます

name: Gi Nattak
text: Please, return the Black Materia to us.
text_jp:
どうか　黒マテリアを
我らの元に返していただきたい

name: Gi Nattak
text: That is the wish we entrust to you.
text_jp: それこそが　あなたがたに託したい我らの願い

name: Gi Nattak
text: If a Cetra descendant aids us, our long-standing grudge might finally fade.
text_jp:
セトラの末裔が協力してくれるのであれば
長きわだかまりも消えてなくなるでしょう

name: Cloud
text: Any leads?
text_jp: 手がかりは？

name: Gi Nattak
text: I’ve heard the Black Materia is hidden in the Cetra’s temple.
text_jp:
黒マテリアは
セトラの神殿に隠されたと聞いています

name: Cait Sith
text: Cetra, Ancients, temple...
text_jp: セトラ　古代種　神殿……

name: Barret
text: Don’t know it, huh?
text_jp: 知らねえか

name: Cait Sith
text: I reckon I do.
text_jp: あの　ボク　わかると思います

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_802
text_jp: COSME_802

name: Gi Nattak
text: O hollow one, can we trust you?
text_jp: 虚ろなる者よ　信じてよいのですか

name: Cait Sith
text: Hey, you!
text_jp: ヘイ・ユー！

name: Cait Sith
text: I’ll read your future, folks! A bright future, a fun future!
text_jp:
みなさんの未来　占うで～！
明るいミライ　ゆかいなミライ

name: Cloud
text: If he says it’s fine, it’s fine. Trust him.
text_jp: こいつが言うなら大丈夫だ　信じていい

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_807
text_jp: COSME_807

name: Gi Nattak
text: Hmm...
text_jp: うむ……

name: Gi Nattak
text: Seems we’ve been found out.
text_jp: どうやら　見つかってしまったようだ

name: Gi Nattak
text: O people of the planet, O brave ones...
text_jp: 星の民よ　勇敢なる者たちよ

name: Gi Nattak
text: Please bring the Black Materia to this land.
text_jp: どうか　黒マテリアをこの地に

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_812
text_jp: COSME_812

name: Aerith
text: Oh, we’re back.
text_jp: あれ　帰ってきた

name: Tifa
text: COSME_814
text_jp: COSME_814

name: Cloud
text: First, let’s head topside.
text_jp: まず　地上に出よう

name: Yuffie
text: Roger that!
text_jp: りょーかい！

name: Red XIII
text: Watch me, Dad.
text_jp: 見ててよ　父さん

name: Assistant
text: You’ve returned safely.
text_jp: 無事にお戻りになられましたね

name: Assistant
text: We’ll guide you to Lord Bugenhagen. This way, please.
text_jp:
ブーゲンハーゲン様の元へ案内いたします
どうぞ　こちらへ

name: Assistant
text: May the planet be with you.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Yuffie
text: Kishishishi! We totally fooled ‘em, huh~
text_jp: キシシシシ！　うまくダマせたよね～

name: Yuffie
text: Those Gi spectres think we’re gonna bring ‘em the materia!
text_jp:
あのギ族の亡霊
アタシたちがマテリア持ってくると思ってるよ

name: Barret
text: They kept ramblin’ ‘bout "great healing" or whatever,
text_jp: 大いなる癒しとかなんとか言ってたが

name: Barret
text: But basically, it’s some damn terrifying materia with insane power.
text_jp:
要するに　とんでもねえ威力の
おっそろしいマテリアってことだ

name: Barret
text: Yeah, no way we’re handin’ it over to them.
text_jp: ああ　ヤツらに渡すワケにはいかねえ

name: Cloud
text: We gotta find it before they do.
text_jp: あいつより　先に見つけないと

name: Tifa
text: Before who?
text_jp: あいつって？

name: Cloud
text: Sephiroth.
text_jp: セフィロスだ

name: Cloud
text: Didn’t you feel his presence?
text_jp: 気配を感じなかったのか？

name: Aerith
text: Yeah...
text_jp: うん……

name: Barret
text: If you say Sephiroth was there, then he was there, man.
text_jp:
セフィロスに関しちゃあ
おまえがそう言うなら　いたんだろうよ

name: Yuffie
text: So, so—Sephiroth’s after the Black Materia too!?
text_jp:
じゃあじゃあ　セフィロスも
黒マテリアを狙ってるってこと？

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, we’d better assume so.
text_jp: ああ　そう考えた方がいい

name: Yuffie
text: Big trouble—we can’t waste time! The Black Materia’s mine!
text_jp:
たいへん　こうしちゃいらんないよ
黒マテリアは　アタシが手に入れるんだから！

name: Aerith
text: Hey, Cait Sith, how do you know about the Cetra temple?
text_jp:
ねえ　ケット・シー
セトラの神殿のこと　どうして知ってるの？

name: Cait Sith
text: Uh, well, er...
text_jp: いや　え～っと……

name: Cait Sith
text: I don’t exactly "know"—more like I’ve got a hunch.
text_jp:
知ってるっちゅーか
心当たりがあるっちゅーか

name: Yuffie
text: Huh~?
text_jp: あ～ん？

name: Cait Sith
text: Way back, I saw it in some company files. If we’ve got a Shinra terminal, I can look it up.
text_jp:
むかし　会社の資料で見たことあるんです
神羅の端末があったら　調べられると思います

name: Cloud
text: Is there a terminal in Cosmo Canyon too?
text_jp: 端末はコスモキャニオンにもあるのか

name: Cait Sith
text: ...Should be! Let’s ask Bugenhagen!
text_jp:
……のハズです
ブーゲンはんに聞いてみましょ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホウホウ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Looks like you made it back safe! That’s a relief, a big relief.
text_jp:
無事に戻ったようだのう
ひと安心　ひと安心

name: Red XIII
text: No need to worry anymore, Gramps! I’m the son of the warrior Seto, after all.
text_jp:
も～心配いらないよ　じっちゃん
オイラは　戦士セトの息子だからね

name: Cait Sith
text: Bugenhagen!
text_jp: ブーゲンはん

name: Cait Sith
text: There’s supposed to be a terminal connected to Shinra’s network set up in this valley somewhere.
text_jp:
この谷にも　神羅のネットワークに繋がる端末を
置かせてもろてるはずなんやけど

name: Cait Sith
text: Where is it at?
text_jp: どこにあります？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho! You mean that terminal, eh?
text_jp: ホーホウ　あの端末のことかの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Sure enough, we had one. It used some rare parts, so I got curious, y’see.
text_jp:
確かにあった
珍しいパーツが使われとったから興味深くてのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Took it apart, and well, there ya go.
text_jp: 分解して　ほら　あのとおり

name: Bugenhagen
text: Now it’s workin’ hard as this valley’s generator!
text_jp: この谷の発電機として　活躍してくれとるわい

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_852
text_jp: COSME_852

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_853
text_jp: COSME_853

name: Red XIII
text: Then, do you know about the Cetra’s temple?
text_jp: じゃあ　セトラの神殿は知ってる？

name: Bugenhagen
text: A temple, you say?
text_jp: 神殿とな？

name: Bugenhagen
text: The Cetra didn’t need gods. They wouldn’t have built somethin’ like a temple, I reckon.
text_jp:
セトラは神など必要としない
神殿など作りはしなかったはずじゃよ

name: Aerith
text: Oh, I see.
text_jp: そうなんだ

name: Bugenhagen
text: It was probably outsiders who called it a temple.
text_jp: 神殿と呼んだのは　おそらく外の人間

name: Bugenhagen
text: There’s a legend that a Cetra structure’s hidden somewhere out there. It’s written in plenty o’ books.
text_jp:
セトラの建造物がどこかに隠されている
という伝説は　多くの書物に残されておる

name: Red XIII
text: As expected of Grandpa!
text_jp: さすがは　じっちゃん！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホーホウ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Its location ain’t clear, though.
text_jp: 場所は　明らかになっとらんがの

name: Red XIII
text: Aw...
text_jp: えー……

name: Bugenhagen
text: The Cetra were a race that walked a harsh path.
text_jp: セトラは過酷な運命を辿った種族

name: Bugenhagen
text: Even if you find it, it’s not a place you can just waltz into, I’d wager.
text_jp:
見つけたところで
容易に足を踏み入れられる場所ではなかろう

name: Cloud
text: COSME_866
text_jp: COSME_866

name: Bugenhagen
text: If you’re goin’, be plenty careful.
text_jp: 行くのならば　じゅうぶんに用心せい

name: Aerith
text: COSME_868
text_jp: COSME_868

name: Tifa
text: COSME_869
text_jp: COSME_869

name: Bugenhagen
text: See it, hear it, touch it. There’s gotta be somethin’ there you can’t get from books.
text_jp:
見て　聞いて　触れて
書物では得られぬものが　そこにあるはずじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: If you make it back safe, tell me all about it, eh?
text_jp: 無事に帰ったら　わしにも話を聞かせておくれ

name: Gatekeeper
text: Master Bugenhagen!
text_jp: ブーゲンハーゲン様！

name: Bugenhagen
text: What’s all this racket about?
text_jp: なんじゃ　騒がしいのう

name: Gatekeeper
text: Another one o’ those black cloaks showed up. What should we do?
text_jp:
また　あの黒いマントが現れまして
いかがいたしましょう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Oh? A friend of yours, maybe?
text_jp: おや　知り合いかな？

name: Cloud
text: Where’s it at?
text_jp: どこにいるんだ？

name: Gatekeeper
text: Uh...at the valley entrance.
text_jp: あの……谷の入口です

name: Red XIII
text: Let’s go check it out, Cloud.
text_jp: 行ってみよう　クラウド

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! The turnin’ of the planet sure is a curious thing.
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ！
星の巡りとは　まことに面白いものじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Gotta close this gate up again, I suppose.
text_jp: この扉は再び閉ざしておかねばのう

name: Gatekeeper
text: The black cloak’s at the valley entrance. Some of our folks should be lookin’ after ‘em by now.
text_jp:
黒マントは　谷の入口です
今は仲間が看病しているはずですよ

name: Gatekeeper
text: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon!
text_jp: ようこそ　コスモキャニオンへ

name: Gatekeeper
text: Go right on through.
text_jp: どうぞ　お通りください

name: Gatekeeper
text: Let us know if you spot any shady characters.
text_jp: 怪しい人物を見かけたら　お知らせください

name: Lookout
text: Nanaki!
text_jp: ナナキ！

name: Red XIII
text: Is that guy okay?
text_jp: その人　大丈夫なの？

name: Lookout
text: Yeah, he’s worn out, but...
text_jp: ああ　衰弱はしているが

name: Lookout
text: We’ve been seein’ a lot of these lately. Some say it’s Mako poisoning, but these symptoms...
text_jp:
最近多いんだ　魔晄中毒だって言う人もいるけど
この症状は……

name: Black-Cloaked Man
text: Nibel...heim...
text_jp: ニブル……ヘイム……

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_891
text_jp: COSME_891

name: Black-Cloaked Man
text: Nibel...heim...
text_jp: ニブル……ヘイム……

name: Barret
text: Nibelheim, huh?
text_jp: ニブルヘイムっていやあ

name: Cloud
text: That’s me and Tifa’s hometown.
text_jp: 俺とティファの故郷だ

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_895
text_jp: COSME_895

name: Cait Sith
text: Nibelheim!
text_jp: ニブルヘイム！

name: Cait Sith
text: If it’s there, then there’s definitely a Shinra terminal!
text_jp: あそこやったら　確実に神羅の端末があります

name: Tifa
text: COSME_898
text_jp: COSME_898

name: Tifa
text: There...was one, I think.
text_jp: あった……とは思うけど

name: Cait Sith
text: Cloud, you said earlier, that it’s fine to trust what I say, right?
text_jp:
クラウドさん　さっき言ってくれたやろ
ボクの言うこと　信じていいって

name: Cait Sith
text: Maybe it was just to get by in the moment.
text_jp: その場しのぎやったかもしれん

name: Cait Sith
text: But I wanna make your words the real deal, Cloud!
text_jp:
でもボクは　クラウドさんの言葉
ホンモンにしたいんです

name: Cloud
text: But...
text_jp: でも……

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_904
text_jp: COSME_904

name: Tifa
text: COSME_905
text_jp: COSME_905

name: Tifa
text: Let’s go check it out.
text_jp: 行ってみよう

name: Cait Sith
text: COSME_907
text_jp: COSME_907

name: Lookout
text: Nibelheim? You mean that Nibelheim?
text_jp:
ニブルヘイムって
あのニブルヘイムですか？

name: Lookout
text: There ain’t no land route connected to it.
text_jp: 陸の道は繋がっていませんよ

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_910
text_jp: COSME_910

name: Barret
text: Then that means...
text_jp: と　くりゃあ

name: Cloud
text: We’re goin’ by air.
text_jp: 空だな

name: Aerith
text: Smoke signals, huh!
text_jp: のろし　だね！

name: Cait Sith
text: Then let’s head back to the airstrip!
text_jp: ほな　飛行場に戻りましょ

name: Lookout
text: We’ll take care of this fella here, so don’t you worry none.
text_jp:
この人の面倒はここで見ますから
どうぞ　ご安心を

name: Black-Cloaked Man
text: Ugh...ahh...
text_jp: うう……ああ……

name: Black-Cloaked Man
text: Nibel...heim...
text_jp: ニブル……ヘイム……

name: Cid
text: Thank you for choosin’ Bronco Air! We sincerely appreciate your business!
text_jp:
ブロンコ航空のご利用
まことに　ありがとうございま～す

name: Cait Sith
text: Cid, my man! Can you take us to Nibelheim?
text_jp:
シドはん
ニブルヘイムまで　お願いできますか？

name: Cid
text: Nibelheim, huh...
text_jp: ニブルか……

name: Cid
text: Well, I’ll figure somethin’ out. With me behind the stick, anywhere’s just a hop away!
text_jp:
まあ　なんとかなんだろ
オレにかかれば　どんな場所でもひとっ飛びよ

name: Chadley
text: Cloud.
text_jp: クラウドさん

name: Chadley
text: It’s faint, but I’ve detected a response from Ancient Matter nearby.
text_jp:
かすかではありますが　近隣に
エンシェントマターの反応を確認しました

name: Chadley
text: It doesn’t seem like the Ancient Matter is actually present at this location, though...
text_jp:
どうやら　その場にエンシェントマターが
あるわけではなさそうですが……

name: Chadley
text: Please investigate further!
text_jp: 調査のほど　よろしくお願いします！

name: Chadley
text: Arrival at the destination confirmed.
text_jp: 目的地への到着を確認

name: Chadley
text: This appears to be one of the Cosmo Canyon ruins.
text_jp:
ここは　コスモキャニオン遺跡群の
ひとつのようですね

name: Yuffie
text: Score!
text_jp: やった！

name: Nayo
text: COSME_929
text_jp: COSME_929

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_930
text_jp: COSME_930

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_931
text_jp: COSME_931

name: Yuffie
text: Materia, materia~!
text_jp: マッテリア　マッテリア～！

name: Yuffie
text: Treasure, materia, where ya at~? Don’t be shy now, come on out~♪
text_jp:
お宝　マテリア　どっこかな～？
恥ずかしがらず～　出ておいで～♪

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_934
text_jp: COSME_934

name: Polk
text: Yuffie!
text_jp: ユフィ！

name: Polk
text: Hey, Yuffie!
text_jp: 別；ユフィ！

name: Yuffie
text: Nayo, Polk, Billy Bob!
text_jp: ナヨ　ポルコ　ビリー・ボー！

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_938
text_jp: COSME_938

name: Nayo
text: COSME_939
text_jp: COSME_939

name: Yuffie
text: You’re all safe!
text_jp: みんな　無事だったんだね

name: Nayo
text: Yeah, and you too...I’m so glad.
text_jp: うん　ユフィも……良かった

name: Yuffie
text: I’m tougher than I look, y’know~?
text_jp: アタシは　しぶといよ～？

name: Polk
text: Haha, true that!
text_jp: あはは　そうだね

name: Billy Bob
text: Hey, where’s Sonon?
text_jp: あれ　ソノンは？

name: Yuffie
text: Huh...?
text_jp: えっ……？

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_946
text_jp: COSME_946

name: Barret
text: Hey, you lot!
text_jp: おい　おまえら！

name: Nayo
text: Oh, it’s the main branch!
text_jp: あっ　分派さん

name: Barret
text: COSME_949
text_jp: COSME_949

name: Yuffie
text: Y-yeah, that’s right!
text_jp: そっ　そうそう！

name: Yuffie
text: These here are the OG Avalanche crew. They’ve helped us out a ton.
text_jp:
こちら　本家アバランチのみなさん
いろいろ世話になったんだ

name: Yuffie
text: And, well, you already know the splinter group folks.
text_jp: んで　ご存知　分派のみなさん

name: Barret
text: COSME_953
text_jp: COSME_953

name: Barret
text: Did you guys hit the Shinra Building? Did ya see our Wedge anywhere?
text_jp:
おまえら　神羅ビルには行ったのか
うちのウェッジ　見なかったか？

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_955
text_jp: COSME_955

name: Polk
text: COSME_956
text_jp: COSME_956

name: Nayo
text: COSME_957
text_jp: COSME_957

name: Barret
text: Anything, just tell me what ya know!
text_jp: なんでもいい　知ってるなら教えてくれ

name: Nayo
text: Sorry, but Wedge...
text_jp: 残念だけど　ウェッジは……

name: Barret
text: Nah, I still wanna hear it.
text_jp: ああ　それでも聞きてえんだ

name: Polk
text: When the Sector 7 plate went down like that, our hearts got all messed up.
text_jp:
七番街のプレートがあんなことになって
僕たちの心はグチャグチャになった

name: Billy Bob
text: Shock, fear, panic.
text_jp: 驚愕　恐怖　萎縮

name: Billy Bob
text: Sadness, anger, hatred.
text_jp: 悲しみ　怒り　憎しみ

name: Billy Bob
text: Our hearts turned into a pile o’ rubble too.
text_jp: 心の中も　ガレキの山さ

name: Polk
text: That’s when we got an offer from the main branch leadership.
text_jp: そんなとき　本家の指導部からの打診があった

name: Polk
text: The plate fall was Shinra’s own doing. Occupy the Shinra Building to stop their next move.
text_jp:
プレート落下は神羅の自作自演
更なる暴挙を防ぐために　神羅ビルを占拠する

name: Polk
text: Weapons and gear provided. All who’ve got the will, gather up—
text_jp:
武器装備は支給
意志ある者よ　集え――

name: Polk
text: Somethin’ like that.
text_jp: そんな感じのね

name: Nayo
text: We felt like we had to join in.
text_jp:
わたしたちには参加する義務がある
そう思ったの

name: Polk
text: Wedge was in the same truck as me.
text_jp: ウェッジは　僕と同じトラックにいた

name: Captain
text: COSME_971
text_jp: COSME_971

name: Captain
text: We’ll infiltrate the Shinra Building from the underground parking lot. Secure each floor and link up with the advance team.
text_jp:
我々は地下駐車場から神羅ビルへ潜入
各階を制圧しつつ　先行中の別部隊と合流する

name: Wedge
text: COSME_973
text_jp: COSME_973

name: Subordinate
text: We’ve lost contact with the Lutia squad.
text_jp: ルティア隊と連絡が取れません

name: Captain
text: COSME_975
text_jp: COSME_975

name: Polk
text: COSME_976
text_jp: COSME_976

name: Wedge
text: COSME_977
