text_jp: COSME_977

name: Subordinate
text: The vanguard might already be—
text_jp: 先発隊は　あるいはすでに――

name: Captain
text: No speculation. Get in touch with Captain Matt first.
text_jp:
憶測はいらん
まずは　マット隊長に連絡を

name: Subordinate
text: COSME_980
text_jp: COSME_980

name: Polk
text: COSME_981
text_jp: COSME_981

name: Wedge
text: COSME_982
text_jp: COSME_982

name: Wedge
text: Up we go, up we go!
text_jp: よいしょ　よいしょっと

name: Polk
text: COSME_984
text_jp: COSME_984

name: Polk
text: COSME_985
text_jp: COSME_985

name: Wedge
text: Wedge from the splinter group, reportin’ in!
text_jp: 分派のウェッジっす

name: Polk
text: Oh, the Seventh Heaven guy!
text_jp: ああ　セブンスヘブンの

name: Wedge
text: COSME_988
text_jp: COSME_988

name: Wedge
text: Here, eat this and rela~ax!
text_jp: さあ　これを食べてリラ～ックス

name: Polk
text: COSME_990
text_jp: COSME_990

name: Polk
text: Thanks!
text_jp: ありがとう

name: Wedge
text: COSME_992
text_jp: COSME_992

name: Wedge
text: COSME_993
text_jp: COSME_993

name: Wedge
text: COSME_994
text_jp: COSME_994

name: Wedge
text: Rela~ax!
text_jp: リラ～ックス

name: Polk
text: COSME_996
text_jp: COSME_996

name: Billy Bob
text: The squad’s goal was to take out the President.
text_jp: 部隊の目的は　プレジデントの暗殺

name: Billy Bob
text: I know, it wasn’t like us at all.
text_jp:
わかってる
ぜんぜん　俺たちらしくない

name: Billy Bob
text: But back then, we were all in.
text_jp: でもあの時は　その気になっていた

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1000
text_jp: COSME_1000

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1001
text_jp: COSME_1001

name: Billy Bob
text: C’mon, get fired up! You’ll get left behind!
text_jp:
ほら　気合い入れろ！
置いてかれるぞ

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1003
text_jp: COSME_1003

name: Wedge
text: Sorry...about that...
text_jp: 申し訳……ないッス……

name: Wedge
text: Ow!
text_jp: いでっ！

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1006
text_jp: COSME_1006

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1007
text_jp: COSME_1007

name: Captain
text: Up ahead’s the executive floor.
text_jp: この先が　重役フロアだ

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1009
text_jp: COSME_1009

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1010
text_jp: COSME_1010

name: Captain
text: The time’s come to take the world back into our hands! Unleash your anger and hatred on ‘em!
text_jp:
遂に我々の手に世界を取り戻すときがきた
怒りと憎しみを　やつらにぶつけてやれ！

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1012
text_jp: COSME_1012

name: Trooper
text: Yeah!
text_jp: おう！

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1014
text_jp: COSME_1014

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1015
text_jp: COSME_1015

name: Wedge
text: I’ve gotta get in touch with my crew no matter what!
text_jp: どうしても　仲間と連絡が取りたいんス

name: Domino
text: COSME_1017
text_jp: COSME_1017

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1018
text_jp: COSME_1018

name: Wedge
text: If I don’t tell ‘em our plan soon, it’s gonna get all crossed up!
text_jp:
早くこっちの作戦を伝えないと
行き違いになるッス！

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1020
text_jp: COSME_1020

name: Domino
text: COSME_1021
text_jp: COSME_1021

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1022
text_jp: COSME_1022

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1023
text_jp: COSME_1023

name: Wedge
text: Then, up top!
text_jp: じゃあ　上で！

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1025
text_jp: COSME_1025

name: Billy Bob
text: That’s as far as our momentum got us.
text_jp: 俺たちの勢いは　そこまでだった

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1027
text_jp: COSME_1027

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1028
text_jp: COSME_1028

name: Radio
text: Captain, please respond!
text_jp: 隊長　応答願います！

name: Radio
text: The heli crew’s wiped out. The backup’s been trashed too, looks like!
text_jp:
ヘリの乗員は全滅
予備機も破壊された模様です！

name: Radio
text: Couldn’t reach the President’s office! Pulling back now—
text_jp:
社長室　到達ならず！
これより撤退を――

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1032
text_jp: COSME_1032

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1033
text_jp: COSME_1033

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1034
text_jp: COSME_1034

name: Resistance Trooper
text: Fall back, fall back!
text_jp: 撤収　撤収だ！

name: Billy Bob
text: Nayo!
text_jp: ナヨ！

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1037
text_jp: COSME_1037

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1038
text_jp: COSME_1038

name: Polk
text: COSME_1039
text_jp: COSME_1039

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1040
text_jp: COSME_1040

name: Polk
text: COSME_1041
text_jp: COSME_1041

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1042
text_jp: COSME_1042

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1043
text_jp: COSME_1043

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1044
text_jp: COSME_1044

name: Polk
text: COSME_1045
text_jp: COSME_1045

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1046
text_jp: COSME_1046

name: Polk
text: COSME_1047
text_jp: COSME_1047

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1048
text_jp: COSME_1048

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1049
text_jp: COSME_1049

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1050
text_jp: COSME_1050

name: Nayo
text: No doubt about it...it was him.
text_jp: 間違いない……あの人でした

name: Barret
text: Thanks.
text_jp: ありがとな

name: Barret
text: COSME_1053
text_jp: COSME_1053

name: Barret
text: Dammit!
text_jp: くそっ！

name: ???
text: It’s okay, man.
text_jp: 大丈夫ッスよ

name: Barret
text: COSME_1056
text_jp: COSME_1056

name: Barret
text: COSME_1057
text_jp: COSME_1057

name: Barret
text: You heard that just now, right? Wedge’s voice—
text_jp:
いま　聞こえたよな？
ウェッジの声――

name: Red XIII
text: Consciousness melts into the Lifestream quick. Even if you heard somethin’, it’s just your imagination.
text_jp:
意識は　ライフストリームにすぐに溶けちゃうんだ
なにか聞こえたとしても　気のせいだね

name: Barret
text: COSME_1060
text_jp: COSME_1060

name: Barret
text: Shut it...
text_jp: うるせえ……

name: Nayo
text: This ruin was a place to give thanks and blessings to the Lifestream, it seems.
text_jp:
この遺跡は　ライフストリームに感謝して
祝福するための場所だったらしいの

name: Nayo
text: We’ve been allowed to volunteer here, helping restore the ruins.
text_jp:
わたしたちは　ここで
遺跡修復のボランティアをさせてもらってる

name: Nayo
text: Hoping we can do something, even just a little, for those who’ve returned to the planet.
text_jp:
星に帰った人たちのために
すこしでも　なにかできればと思って

name: Tifa
text: Hey, I’d like to help out with the restoration here.
text_jp:
ねえ　私　手伝いたいな
ここの修復

name: Barret
text: What do we gotta do, and how?
text_jp: なにを　どうすりゃいいんだ？

name: Nayo
text: Repairing the broken "Fountain of the Planet."
text_jp: 壊れてしまった『星の泉』の修復

name: Nayo
text: The fountain’s the energy source around here, a vent for the Lifestream.
text_jp:
泉は　このあたりのエネルギーの源で
ライフストリームの吹き出し口になってるの

name: Billy Bob
text: A busted Fountain of the Planet has a high Lifestream concentration.
text_jp:
壊れている星の泉は
ライフストリームの濃度が高くて

name: Billy Bob
text: Can’t just stroll in there easy.
text_jp: 容易に立ち入れないんだ

name: Polk
text: So we use a special robot to fix it up,
text_jp:
だから　専用ロボットを使って
修復するんだけど

name: Polk
text: COSME_1072
text_jp: COSME_1072

name: Polk
text: But it’s so dang old, we can’t get the hang of it.
text_jp:
あんまりにも型が古くて
僕たちじゃ　うまく使いこなせなくて

name: Chadley
text: I’ve heard your situation!
text_jp: お話は聞かせていただきました！

name: Chadley
text: If that’s the case, I think I can help out.
text_jp: そういうことなら　ボクがお役に立てるかと

text: Pee-gaga, pi-pi-pi!
text_jp: ピーガガ　ピピピ！

name: Chadley
text: Say hello to Chadley Jr.!
text_jp: 名付けて　チャドリーＪｒ！

name: Chadley
text: Heh heh, looks like I’ve finally got a little brother!
text_jp: ふふ　遂にボクにも弟分ができたようです

name: Chadley
text: Chadley Jr. will follow your orders.
text_jp:
チャドリーＪｒは
みなさんの命令に沿って動きます

name: Chadley
text: Go ahead and give it some instructions!
text_jp: さっそく　指示を出してみてください

name: Chadley Jr.
text: Pee-gagaga!
text_jp: ピーガガガ！

name: NPC
text: Wanna take on "Gambit Gears"?
text_jp: 『ガンビットギアーズ』に挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: <color=yellow>【Gambit Gears Stage 1 Mission Mode】</color> Wanna give it a shot?
text_jp:
【ガンビットギアーズ　ステージ１　ミッションモード】
挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: <color=yellow>【Gambit Gears Stage 2 Mission Mode】</color> Wanna give it a shot?
text_jp:
【ガンビットギアーズ　ステージ２　ミッションモード】
挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: <color=yellow>【Gambit Gears Stage 3 Mission Mode】</color> Wanna give it a shot?
text_jp:
【ガンビットギアーズ　ステージ３　ミッションモード】
挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: <color=yellow>【Gambit Gears Stage 4 Mission Mode】</color> Wanna give it a shot?
text_jp:
【ガンビットギアーズ　ステージ４　ミッションモード】
挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: Yes
text_jp: はい

name: NPC
text: No
text_jp: いいえ

name: Chadley
text: When you’re ready, just call out to Chadley Jr.
text_jp:
では　準備ができたら
チャドリーＪｒに声を掛けてください

name: Chadley Jr.
text: Pee...go...
text_jp: ピー……ゴー……

name: Chadley Jr.
text: Pee-gagaga!
text_jp: ピーガガガ！

name: Chadley Jr.
text: Pee...go...
text_jp: ピー……ゴー……

name: Nayo
text: Places thick with Lifestream are crawlin’ with monsters.
text_jp:
ライフストリームが濃い場所は
モンスターも多いの

name: Nayo
text: I hope we can fix the fountain safe and sound.
text_jp: 無事に泉を直せるといいのだけど

name: Billy Bob
text: Thought that robot was a piece o’ junk, but it’s a whole different beast with the right hands.
text_jp:
ポンコツロボだと思ってたのに
使うヤツが使えば違うもんだな

name: Polk
text: Sorry...haven’t slept right since then. Let me rest a bit.
text_jp:
ごめん……あれ以来まともに寝てなくて
ちょっと休ませてください

name: Survey Team
text: This ruin’s thought to be a facility
text_jp: この遺跡は　谷を巡るライフストリームを

name: Survey Team
text: meant to guide the Lifestream flowin’ ‘round the valley to where it’s supposed to go.
text_jp:
流れるべきところへ導くための施設だったと
考えられています

name: Survey Team
text: What you’re all doin’ will surely become strength for the planet.
text_jp:
みなさんの行いは
必ずや　星の力となることでしょう

name: Survey Team
text: Meeting Lord Nanaki himself? What a stroke of luck!
text_jp:
ナナキ様とお会いできるなんて
なんという幸運でしょう

name: NPC
text: Wanna try again?
text_jp: もういちど　挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: Yes
text_jp: はい

name: NPC
text: No
text_jp: いいえ

name: Tifa
text: Amazing...
text_jp: すごい……

name: Barret
text: COSME_1105
text_jp: COSME_1105

name: Barret
text: Wish they coulda seen this too.
text_jp: あいつらにも　見せたかったぜ

name: Cloud
text: They’re watchin’ from somewhere.
text_jp: どこかで見てるさ

name: Barret
text: Huh? What’s that over there?
text_jp: うん？　なんだありゃ

name: Chadley
text: Looks like there’s another ruin cluster beyond that glow.
text_jp: あの輝きの先にも　遺跡群があるようですね

name: Barret
text: Then we gotta go fix that one up too!
text_jp: んじゃ　そっちも直しに行かねえとな

name: Nayo
text: Can we help out too?
text_jp: わたしたちも　手伝っていい？

name: Barret
text: Yeah, do what ya want.
text_jp: ああ　好きにしろ

name: Barret
text: Squabblin’ over main branch or splinter group out here? The planet’d laugh at us.
text_jp:
こんなところで
分派だ本家だもめたら　星が笑うぜ

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1114
text_jp: COSME_1114

name: Nayo
text: This is the planet’s power...
text_jp: これが　星の力……

name: Billy Bob
text: Time flows real slow here. Might suit me better this way.
text_jp:
ここは時間がゆっくり流れるよな
俺　こっちのほうが合ってるのかも

name: Polk
text: Wedge’s sandwiches were so good...
text_jp: ウェッジのサンドイッチ　美味しかったな……

name: Chadley
text: Cloud.
text_jp: クラウドさん

name: Chadley
text: It’s been a while since I last surveyed the Cosmo area, so let me update you on everything up to now.
text_jp:
コスモエリアの調査は久しぶりですので
あらためて　ここまでの状況をお伝えしますね

name: Chadley
text: The Ancient Matter in the Cosmo area
text_jp: コスモエリアのエンシェントマターは

name: Chadley
text: seems closely tied to the ruins scattered across this land.
text_jp:
この地に点在する遺跡群と
密接な関係があるようです

name: Chadley
text: For now, let’s use Chadley Jr. to push forward with restoring the ruins.
text_jp:
まずは　チャドリーＪｒを使って
遺跡の修復を進めていきましょう

name: Chadley
text: I checked some old texts,
text_jp: 古い文献を調べたところ

name: Chadley
text: and found a legend that says the Cetra sealed an "anomaly" somewhere in these ruins.
text_jp:
これらの遺跡群のどこかに
セトラが『異物』を封印した場所がある

name: Chadley
text: That’s what I confirmed.
text_jp: という伝承を確認しました

name: Red XIII
text: I’ve heard that one too. I thought it was about the Gi tribe, though.
text_jp:
それ　オイラも聞いたことがあるよ
ギ族のことだって思ってたけど

name: Chadley
text: Yes.
text_jp: はい

name: Chadley
text: However, based on the faint traces of unique energy I’ve detected,
text_jp:
ですが　わずかながら検知された
独特なエネルギーから

name: Chadley
text: I suspect these ruins were built to seal away the Ancient Matter.
text_jp:
この遺跡群は　エンシェントマターを封印するために
作られたものなのではないかと推測しました

name: Chadley
text: Let’s start by moving forward with the ruin restoration.
text_jp: まずは　遺跡の修復を進めましょう

name: Chadley
text: I’m sure the planet will guide us toward the Ancient Matter.
text_jp:
きっと星が　ボクたちを
エンシェントマターへと導いてくれるはずです

name: Chadley
text: I’ve developed an additional AI chip for Chadley Jr.
text_jp:
チャドリーＪｒの
追加ＡＩチップを開発しておきました

name: Chadley
text: Please make good use of it!
text_jp: ぜひ　活用してみてください

name: Chadley Jr.
text: Pee-gagaga!
text_jp: ピーガガガ！

name: Barret
text: We got all hyped up once about headin’ to Cosmo Canyon someday, didn’t we?
text_jp:
いつか　コスモキャニオンへ行こうってよ
盛りあがったことがあったよな

name: Tifa
text: Yeah, that was during the cocktail tasting, right?
text_jp: うん　カクテルの試飲会の時だよね

name: Jessie
text: Yup, this one’s the best!
text_jp: うん　やっぱこれがいちばん！

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1138
text_jp: COSME_1138

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1139
text_jp: COSME_1139

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1140
text_jp: COSME_1140

name: Jessie
text: The new cocktail’s officially "Costa del Sol"!
text_jp: 新カクテルは『コスタ・デル・ソル』に決定

name: Biggs
text: You’re drinkin’ too much.
text_jp: 飲み過ぎだって

name: Jessie
text: Heh heh heh, I’m fi~ne, fi~ne!
text_jp: んふふふふ　へーきへーき

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1144
text_jp: COSME_1144

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1145
text_jp: COSME_1145

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1146
text_jp: COSME_1146

name: Biggs
text: I’m pushin’ for this "Cosmo Canyon" one.
text_jp: 俺は　この『コスモキャニオン』を推すね

name: Jessie
text: It’s pretty good, but~ it’s missin’ somethin’, y’know?
text_jp:
イイ線いってるんだけどね～
な～んか　物足りないんだよなあ

name: Wedge
text: Here ya go!
text_jp: おまたせッス！

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1150
text_jp: COSME_1150

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1151
text_jp: COSME_1151

name: Wedge
text: Ta-da! Cosmo Salt!
text_jp: じゃじゃーん　コスモソルトッス！

name: Wedge
text: If it’s gonna be called "Cosmo Canyon", you gotta add some Cosmo Salt!
text_jp:
『コスモキャニオン』を名乗るからには
コスモソルトを入れないと！

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1154
text_jp: COSME_1154

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1155
text_jp: COSME_1155

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1156
text_jp: COSME_1156

name: Wedge
text: Go on, dig in, dig in!
text_jp: さあ　召しませ召しませ！

name: Tifa
text: Cosmo Salt?
text_jp: コスモソルトって？

name: Wedge
text: Rock salt from Cosmo Canyon, the holy land of planetology! It’s super rare, y’know!
text_jp:
星命学の聖地　コスモキャニオンで採れる岩塩ッス
滅多に手に入らないッスよ

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1160
text_jp: COSME_1160

name: Jessie
text: No way...
text_jp: うそ……

name: Jessie
text: How does just adding salt do this?
text_jp: 塩入れただけで　なんで？

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1163
text_jp: COSME_1163

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1164
text_jp: COSME_1164

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1165
text_jp: COSME_1165

name: Tifa
text: You’re right, it’s delicious!
text_jp: ほんとだ　おいしい

name: Biggs
text: The flavor’s totally transformed.
text_jp: 味が生まれ変わったな

name: Tifa
text: But it’s hard to come by, huh? That’s a problem.
text_jp:
ああでも　手に入りにくいんだよね
それは困るなあ

name: Wedge
text: I stocked up big time! We’re good for a while now!
text_jp:
買い占めて来たッス
これで　しばらくは大丈夫！

name: Biggs
text: Just "for a while", huh?
text_jp: あくまでも　しばらくだろ？

name: Biggs
text: If this "Cosmo Canyon" becomes a hit on the menu,
text_jp:
この『コスモキャニオン』が
人気メニューになったら

name: Biggs
text: we’ll run outta salt real quick.
text_jp: 塩　なくなっちまうぞ

name: Wedge
text: Before that happens, we’ll all head to Cosmo Canyon together!
text_jp:
そのまえに　みんなで
コスモキャニオンに行くッスよ

name: Wedge
text: And our souvenir’ll be salt, salt, SALT!
text_jp: んで　お土産は　塩　しお　シオ！

name: Jessie
text: Nice! Cosmo Canyon, the holy land of planetology!
text_jp: いいねえ　星命学の聖地コスモキャニオン！

name: Wedge
text: We’re all goin’ together!
text_jp: みんなで行くッス！

name: Barret
text: You guys...
text_jp: おまえらなあ

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1178
text_jp: COSME_1178

name: Barret
text: We can barely scrape together funds for the cause, and you’re talkin’ about a damn vacation!?
text_jp:
活動資金もままならねえってのに
旅行なんて行けるわきゃねえだろが！

name: Tifa
text: Yup.
text_jp: はい

name: Barret
text: COSME_1181
text_jp: COSME_1181

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1182
text_jp: COSME_1182

name: Barret
text: Well, damn, guess we gotta go now!
text_jp: へえ　こりゃ行くしかねえな

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1184
text_jp: COSME_1184

name: Jessie
text: That’s the spirit! Take us along, Leader!
text_jp:
そうこなくちゃ
連れてってね　リーダー！

name: Wedge
text: To the Leader!
text_jp: リーダーに乾杯ッス！

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1187
text_jp: COSME_1187

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1188
text_jp: COSME_1188

name: Everyone
text: Cheers!
text_jp: カンパーイ！

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1190
text_jp: COSME_1190

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1191
text_jp: COSME_1191

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1192
text_jp: COSME_1192

name: Barret
text: Man, they only get in sync when it’s somethin’ like this.
text_jp: はあ　こんな時だけ調子いいぜ

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1194
text_jp: COSME_1194

name: Tifa
text: We made it, everyone.
text_jp: 来たよ　みんな

name: Barret
text: Took us long enough.
text_jp: 結構　時間かかったぜ

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1197
text_jp: COSME_1197

name: Billy Bob
text: Huh? You’re already done?
text_jp: あれ　もう終わっちゃったんですか？

name: Polk
text: COSME_1199
text_jp: COSME_1199

name: Barret
text: Ages ago.
text_jp: とっくにな

name: Barret
text: C’mon, next one, next one!
text_jp: ほら　次行くぞ次！

name: Polk
text: Ha, uh...y-yeah!
text_jp: だはっ　は……はい！

name: Nayo
text: It’s a ruin now, but I wonder what it felt like when it was first built.
text_jp:
いまは遺跡だけど　完成した頃は
どんな感じだったのかなとか

name: Nayo
text: I’m kinda surprised I’m so curious about it.
text_jp: 意外と興味あって　自分でも驚いているの

name: Billy Bob
text: Seems it fell into ruin along with the Republic, but this area used to be famous for salt.
text_jp:
共和国といっしょに廃れたらしいけど
このあたりは塩の名産地だったんだ

name: Billy Bob
text: So that means this valley was a sea way back when, right?
text_jp:
ってことは　この谷も
大昔は海だったってことだよな？

name: Billy Bob
text: The planet’s somethin’ else, huh...
text_jp: 星って　すごいよなあ……

name: Polk
text: Barret’s punch really fired me up. Next time, I’ll...
text_jp:
バレットの一撃で気合いが入ったよ
次こそは僕も……

name: Chocobo
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Nayo
text: Everyone!
text_jp: みなさん！

name: Barret
text: Oh, they beat us to it this time, huh?
text_jp: おお　今度は先越されちまったか

name: Polk
text: A new monster’s popped up at the Fountain of the Planet. It’s lookin’ pretty dangerous.
text_jp:
星の泉に新手のモンスターが出現して
危険な状況のようです

name: Billy Bob
text: Gives ya the creeps, don’t it?
text_jp: ピピッ～ってくるよな？

name: Chadley
text: Heh heh, sorry to keep you waiting.
text_jp: ふふ　お待たせしました

name: Chadley
text: I’ve prepared an additional AI chip.
text_jp: 追加のＡＩチップを用意しましたので

name: Chadley
text: Keep investigating, but watch out for monster attacks.
text_jp:
モンスターの攻撃に注意しつつ
調査を進めてください

name: Chadley Jr.
text: Pee-gagaga!
text_jp: ピーガガガ！

name: Nayo
text: I wonder if the monsters are drawn to the ruin’s energy too.
text_jp:
モンスターも　遺跡のエネルギーに
引き寄せられてくるのかしら

name: Billy Bob
text: If I’d known this place was so dangerous, I’d’ve prepped a bit more.
text_jp:
こんなに危険な場所だって知ってたら
もうちょっと準備してきたのに

name: Billy Bob
text: "Regret don’t come first"—by the time ya think of it, it’s usually too late.
text_jp:
後悔先に立たずって言葉
思い出すときには　だいたい手遅れなんだよな

name: Polk
text: Sorry...All we can do is cheer you on.
text_jp:
すいません
僕たち　応援くらいしかできなくて

name: Nayo
text: Looks like it went well.
text_jp: うまくいったようね

name: Barret
text: Yeah, kept ya waitin’, huh?
text_jp: おう　待たせたな

name: Polk
text: No...we’re just leanin’ on you guys. Can’t do a damn thing ourselves.
text_jp:
いえ……僕たち　頼ってばかりで
なにもできないですし

name: Polk
text: COSME_1225
text_jp: COSME_1225

name: Barret
text: COSME_1226
text_jp: COSME_1226

name: Biggs
text: May you be with the planet~!
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを～！

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1228
text_jp: COSME_1228

name: Jessie
text: Next up, Wedge’s turn~!
text_jp: はい次　ウェッジの番～

name: Jessie
text: May you be with the planet~!
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを～！

name: Wedge
text: Uh, me~?
text_jp: ええ　オレ～？

name: Biggs
text: Go for it, slum chowhound champ!
text_jp: よっ　スラムの食いだおれ名人！

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1233
text_jp: COSME_1233

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1234
text_jp: COSME_1234

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1235
text_jp: COSME_1235

name: Wedge
text: Uh, well, um...
text_jp: え～っと　その……

name: Jessie
text: Speak up, huh~?
text_jp: 声が小さいぞ～？

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1238
text_jp: COSME_1238

name: Wedge
text: Alright, I’m—!
text_jp: おっ　オレは！

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1240
text_jp: COSME_1240

name: Wedge
text: I...I wanna be more useful to everyone!
text_jp:
オレは……
もっとみんなの役に立ちたいッス

name: Wedge
text: I’m always just holdin’ everybody back.
text_jp: いつも　足引っ張ってばっかりで

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1243
text_jp: COSME_1243

name: Jessie
text: Ugh, again with that? Who’s ever said that to you?
text_jp:
もう～　またそれ？
誰が　いつそんなこと言ったわけ

name: Jessie
text: Me? Biggs? Or maybe—
text_jp:
わたし？　ビッグス？
それとも──

name: Barret
text: COSME_1246
text_jp: COSME_1246

name: Wedge
text: Nobody’s said it! But that’s just ‘cause you’re all too nice...
text_jp:
誰も言わないッス！
でも　それはみんなが優しいからで……

name: Biggs
text: Wedge thinks this guy looks nice to him?
text_jp: ウェッジには　こいつが優しく見えんのか

name: Jessie
text: Hey, you tryin’ to pick a fight?
text_jp: ちょっと　ケンカ売ってんの？

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1250
text_jp: COSME_1250

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1251
text_jp: COSME_1251

name: Biggs
text: See? Not nice at all...
text_jp: ほらみろ　ぜんぜん優しくなんか……

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1253
text_jp: COSME_1253

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1254
text_jp: COSME_1254

name: Biggs
text: Point is, nobody thinks Wedge ain’t pullin’ his weight—
text_jp: つまりだ　ウェッジが役に立ってねえなんて――

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1256
text_jp: COSME_1256

name: Barret
text: Ain’t a soul here thinks you’re useless.
text_jp: 役に立ってねえなんて　誰も思ってねえ

name: Tifa
text: Wedge must’ve been pushin’ himself harder than anyone, wantin’ to do more and more.
text_jp:
ウェッジはきっと　もっともっとって
だれよりも　頑張ってたんだね

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Barret
text: Damn fool should’ve stuck to bein’ greedy just with food.
text_jp:
ったく　欲張んのは
食い意地だけにしとけばいいのによ

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1261
text_jp: COSME_1261

name: Tifa
text: Let’s go.
text_jp: 行こう

name: Nayo
text: I can’t tell who’s helpin’ who anymore. It’s just regrets all over again.
text_jp:
どっちが手伝いなんだかわからないね
もう反省ばっかり

name: Billy Bob
text: Takin’ down new monsters too? Is that robot secretly a fighter?
text_jp:
新手のモンスターまでやっつけちゃうなんて
あのロボも　実は武闘路線？

name: Polk
text: What can I do?
text_jp: 僕にできることって　なんだろう

name: Chocobo
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Barret
text: COSME_1267
text_jp: COSME_1267

name: Barret
text: They still ain’t here yet?
text_jp: あいつらは　まだ来てねえか

name: Chadley
text: Everyone, this is the last ruin.
text_jp: みなさん　ここが最後の遺跡です

name: Chadley
text: Repair the Fountain of the Planet and open the shrine beyond it, and you’ll get the Ancient Matter.
text_jp:
星の泉を修復して　その先にある祠を開けば
エンシェントマターが手に入ります

name: Chadley
text: Final update complete. Take good care of Chadley Jr.!
text_jp:
最終アップデート完了
チャドリーＪｒをよろしくお願いします！

name: Chadley Jr.
text: Pee-gaga, pi-pi-pi-pi!
text_jp: ピーガガ　ピピピピ！

name: Chadley
text: Ancient Matter confirmed.
text_jp: エンシェントマターを確認

name: Chadley
text: COSME_1274
text_jp: COSME_1274

name: Chadley
text: Will I, too, eventually return to the Lifestream someday?
text_jp:
ボクという存在も　いずれ
ライフストリームに帰るときがくるのでしょうか

name: Chadley
text: COSME_1276
text_jp: COSME_1276

name: Barret
text: Huh? ‘Course you will.
text_jp: あん？　当たりまえだろ

name: Chadley
text: COSME_1278
text_jp: COSME_1278

name: Nayo
text: What’s that...?
text_jp: あれは……？

name: Barret
text: A gift from Wedge.
text_jp: ウェッジからの　贈り物だ

name: Barret
text: Thanks, y’all. ‘Cause of you, we’ve settled a lotta things.
text_jp:
ありがとよ　おまえらのおかげで
いろいろと片が付けられた

name: Nayo
text: Oh, we didn’t do anything—
text_jp: そんな　わたしたちはなにも

name: Tifa
text: So, what’s next for you all?
text_jp: みんなは　これからどうするの？

name: Billy Bob
text: Uh, I was thinkin’...Could we maybe join up with the splinter group?
text_jp:
あの～　考えたんだけど
俺たちも　分派の仲間に入れてもらえないかな

name: Nayo
text: Wha— What’re you saying!?
text_jp: ちょっ……なにを言い出すの？

name: Billy Bob
text: I mean, we haven’t heard from the main branch since then. Ain’t it better than sittin’ around doin’ nothin’?
text_jp:
だってよ　あれから本家とも連絡取れてないし
このままなにもしないでいるよりマシだろ？

name: Polk
text: Yeah, but...
text_jp: そうだけど……

name: Billy Bob
text: Right? Let’s team up from now on—
text_jp: ねっ　これからは協力して

name: Barret
text: Don’t get cocky!
text_jp: 調子に乗るんじゃねえよ！

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1290
text_jp: COSME_1290

name: Barret
text: Anyone without resolve’s more useless than a pebble.
text_jp: 覚悟のないやつは　石ころよりも使えねえ

name: Billy Bob
text: Sorry, I just...
text_jp: すまない　俺はただ……

name: Billy Bob
text: COSME_1293
text_jp: COSME_1293

name: Barret
text: I’ll take the sentiment, though.
text_jp: 気持ちだけ　もらっとくぜ

name: Barret
text: Look further ahead, and keep on livin’.
text_jp:
おまえらは　もっと遠くを見て
んで　生き延びろ

name: Wedge
text: I can’t eat anymore...
text_jp: もう　食べられないッス……

name: Barret
text: COSME_1297
text_jp: COSME_1297

name: Barret
text: Looks like it’s the Leader’s turn to shine!
text_jp: 最後は　リーダーの出番だな！

name: Biggs
text: Here he comes, we’ve been waitin’~!
text_jp: よっ　待ってました～

name: Jessie
text: May you be with the planet~!
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを～！

name: Jessie
text: It’s gonna be a long one tonight~!
text_jp: 今日も長いぞ～？

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1302
text_jp: COSME_1302

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1303
text_jp: COSME_1303

name: Barret
text: COSME_1304
text_jp: COSME_1304

name: Barret
text: Alright— We’re comrades who stood up together to save this damn planet!
text_jp:
あ～　オレたちは星を救うため
ともに立ち上がった同志だ

name: Barret
text: We ain’t got cash, and we ain’t got a big crew.
text_jp: 金はねえ　仲間も多いとは言えねえ

name: Barret
text: But in our hearts, the anti-Shinra fire’s blazin’ hotter than anyone’s!
text_jp:
だが　オレたちの心には
反神羅の炎が　メッラメラと！

name: Barret
text: Burnin’ fierce and wild!
text_jp: 誰よりも熱く　燃えさかってる

name: Barret
text: There’ll be sacrifices—plenty of ‘em.
text_jp: 犠牲は少なくねえだろう

name: Barret
text: But we—!
text_jp: だが　オレたちは！

name: Barret
text: Even if it costs our lives, we’ll take down Shinra and protect this planet!
text_jp:
たとえ命にかえても
神羅を打ち倒し　この星を守る！

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1312
text_jp: COSME_1312

name: Barret
text: Steel yourselves and follow me!
text_jp: 腹ぁ決めて　オレについてこい！

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1314
text_jp: COSME_1314

name: Wedge
text: I’ll fight to the end with this gut of mine!
text_jp: この腹とともに　戦い抜くッス！

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1316
text_jp: COSME_1316

name: Barret
text: Hell yeah!
text_jp: おう！

name: Biggs
text: Resolve’s my specialty.
text_jp: 覚悟は得意だ

name: Barret
text: Alright!
text_jp: よっしゃあ！

name: Jessie
text: Alright, let’s drink ourselves silly tonight to kick things off!
text_jp: よ～し　今夜は景気づけに飲み倒そう！

name: Jessie
text: Tifa, add another Cosmo Canyon!
text_jp: ティファ　コスモキャニオン追加ね！

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1322
text_jp: COSME_1322

name: Barret
text: Add it!
text_jp: 追加ね！

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1324
text_jp: COSME_1324

name: Jessie
text: COSME_1325
text_jp: COSME_1325

name: Biggs
text: COSME_1326
text_jp: COSME_1326

name: Wedge
text: COSME_1327
text_jp: COSME_1327

name: Barret
text: COSME_1328
text_jp: COSME_1328

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1329
text_jp: COSME_1329

name: Barret
text: Tifa.
text_jp: ティファ

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1331
text_jp: COSME_1331

name: Barret
text: It’s time to let it go, yeah?
text_jp: もう　吹っ切っていいよな

name: Barret
text: Not forgettin’ them, ‘course—that’d be impossible.
text_jp:
もちろん　あいつらを忘れるわけじゃねえ
そりゃ無理な話だ

name: Barret
text: But the regret? That’s done.
text_jp: でもよ　後悔は　もう終わりだ

name: Tifa
text: Yeah.
text_jp: うん

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1336
text_jp: COSME_1336

name: Barret
text: COSME_1337
text_jp: COSME_1337

name: Barret
text: COSME_1338
text_jp: COSME_1338

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1339
text_jp: COSME_1339

name: Barret
text: Alright, I’m goin’, goin’, GOIN’—!
text_jp: おっしゃあ　オレは行くぜ行くぜ行くぜーーー！

name: Tifa
text: COSME_1341
text_jp: COSME_1341

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1342
text_jp: COSME_1342

name: Nayo
text: Ah, wait!
text_jp: あっ　待って！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1344
text_jp: COSME_1344

name: Nayo
text: You forgot something.
text_jp: 忘れ物

name: Nayo
text: COSME_1346
text_jp: COSME_1346

name: Yuffie
text: Hey, speaking of which, where’s Zhijie? No way—
text_jp:
あれ　そういえばジージェは？
まさか――

name: Nayo
text: We parted ways with Zhijie at Cosmo Canyon. Looked like he had some other business.
text_jp:
ジージェとは　コスモキャニオンで別れたの
なにか別の用事があるみたいだった

name: Nayo
text: I hope he’s okay, though.
text_jp: ジージェも　無事だと良いんだけど

name: Billy Bob
text: I gotta start thinkin’ things through better.
text_jp: 俺　もっとしっかり考えないとダメだよな

name: Polk
text: Um...aren’t you all connected to the liaison group?
text_jp:
あの……みなさんは
連絡会とは繋がってないんですか？

name: Polk
text: With Avalanche’s main branch mixed up in it, things seem to be headin’ in a shady direction.
text_jp:
アバランチの本家も巻き込んで　なんだかいろいろ
きなくさい方向に向かってるみたいで

name: Polk
text: I just hope nothin’ scarier happens.
text_jp: これ以上　怖いことが起きなきゃいいんだけど

name: Chocobo
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Cloud
text: Does it have an owner?
text_jp: 飼い主がいるのか

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Yuffie
text: Ooh, a chocobo farm?
text_jp: おおっ　チョコボファーム？

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1358
text_jp: COSME_1358

text: Shani, you’re back?
text_jp: シシカ　戻ったの？

name: Yuffie
text: Shani? What’s that? Did a chocobo run away or somethin’?
text_jp:
シシカ？　なになに
チョコボが家出でもしたの？

name: Kamaria
text: Oh my, I’m Kamaria, the owner here. Nice to meet ya~!
text_jp:
あらあら　私はキママ
ここの主よ　よろしく～！

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1362
text_jp: COSME_1362

name: Yuffie
text: So, who’s Shani?
text_jp: んで　シシカって？

name: Kamaria
text: Shishika’s my daughter.
text_jp: シシカは　私の娘だよ

name: Kamaria
text: She’s a chocobo racer, but she fell off during a race.
text_jp:
チョコボのレーサーなんだけど
レース中に　チョコボから落ちてね

name: Kamaria
text: COSME_1366
text_jp: COSME_1366

name: Kamaria
text: Ever since, she’s lost all her drive and started skippin’ practice.
text_jp:
それからすっかり　やる気をなくして
練習から逃げるようになったんだ

name: Yuffie
text: Huh, gotcha.
text_jp: ふ～ん

name: Kamaria
text: COSME_1369
text_jp: COSME_1369

name: Kamaria
text: You folks got any chocobo experience?
text_jp: あんたたち　チョコボの経験は？

name: Yuffie
text: Oh, a decent amount!
text_jp: まあまあ　あるよ

name: Kamaria
text: That so? Then feel free to use our training grounds.
text_jp:
そうかい　じゃあ
うちの訓練場を使っておくれよ

name: Kamaria
text: We just built it fresh, but it’s goin’ to waste like this.
text_jp:
せっかく新しく作ったんだけど
これじゃあ　宝の持ち腐れだ

name: Kamaria
text: If someone uses it, it’d ease my mind a little.
text_jp:
誰かが使ってくれたら
私の気も　すこしは収まるってもんだ

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1375
text_jp: COSME_1375

name: Kamaria
text: Ever tried ring-jumping? You glide a chocobo through hoops in the air.
text_jp:
輪くぐりなんてしたことあるかい？
チョコボでふわりと飛んで輪をくぐるんだ

name: Kamaria
text: Not many training grounds can handle somethin’ like that, I reckon.
text_jp:
こんなことができる訓練場は
あまりないと思うね

name: Yuffie
text: Wooow~!
text_jp: わあ～！

name: Yuffie
text: What’s that? Sounds like a blast!
text_jp: なにそれ　楽しそう！

name: Yuffie
text: Cloud, you wanna try it too, right? It’s somethin’ to brag about to the others!
text_jp:
クラウドも　やりたいでしょ？
ほかのみんなに自慢できるし

name: Cloud
text: Sure.
text_jp: いいだろう

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Kamaria
text: Oh, it’s Aponi! You caught her, huh?
text_jp:
おや　アポニじゃないか
捕まえてくれたんだね

name: Kamaria
text: Ride Aponi to the training grounds.
text_jp: 訓練場へは　アポニに乗っていきな

name: Kamaria
text: Even those twisty valleys won’t trip ya up if you leave it to Aponi.
text_jp:
入り組んだ谷も　アポニにまかせておけば
迷わず抜けられるよ

name: Kamaria
text: Alright, first off, catch a wild chocobo. There’s one called "Aponi" around here somewhere.
text_jp:
じゃ　まずは空チョコボの捕獲からだね
その辺に『アポニ』ってチョコボがいるはずだよ

name: Kamaria
text: Ride Aponi to the training grounds.
text_jp: 訓練場へは　アポニに乗っていきな

name: Kamaria
text: Even those twisty valleys won’t trip ya up if you leave it to Aponi.
text_jp:
入り組んだ谷も　アポニにまかせておけば
迷わず抜けられるよ

name: Kamaria
text: Ride Aponi to the training grounds.
text_jp: 訓練場へは　アポニに乗っていきな

name: Kamaria
text: Even those twisty valleys won’t trip ya up if you leave it to Aponi.
text_jp:
入り組んだ谷も　アポニにまかせておけば
迷わず抜けられるよ

name: Kamaria
text: I get how Shani feels.
text_jp: シシカの気持ちはわかってるんだ

name: Kamaria
text: Gettin’ thrown off by Aponi, who she grew up with like a sister? Must’ve been a shock.
text_jp:
姉妹みたいに育ったアポニに
振り落とされたんだもの　ショックだろうよ

name: Kamaria
text: A good mom’d wrap her up gentle-like, but...
text_jp:
シシカを優しく包みこむのが
いい母親なんだろうけど

name: Kamaria
text: Every time I see her face, I can’t help but start preachin’.
text_jp: 顔を見ると　つい説教しちゃうんだよねえ

name: Yuffie
text: Look!
text_jp: 見て！

name: Yuffie
text: That’s gotta be Aponi!
text_jp: きっと　あの子がアポニだよ

name: Cloud
text: Nice to meet ya, Aponi.
text_jp: よろしくな　アポニ

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Yuffie
text: Alrighty then, to the training grounds we go!
text_jp: んじゃ　訓練場まで　いざゆかん！

name: Cloud
text: Yuffie, chocobos don’t get motion sickness, do they?
text_jp: ユフィ　チョコボは酔わないのか？

name: Yuffie
text: Yeah, I don’t get motion sickness! The chocobo and I are practically one!
text_jp:
そう　酔わないの
チョコボとアタシは一心同体みたいな

name: Cloud
text: Got it.
text_jp: なるほど

name: Yuffie
text: Wonder how it’s different from Shinra’s vehicles?
text_jp: 神羅の乗り物と　なにが違うんだろうね

name: Yuffie
text: If they studied it properly, they’d figure out the mystery of motion sickness!
text_jp:
ちゃんと研究すれば
乗り物酔いのナゾが解明されるのに

name: Cloud
text: Can’t count on Shinra for that.
text_jp: 神羅には　期待できないな

name: Yuffie
text: Yup!
text_jp: そうだね

name: Yuffie
text: Chocobo~ I’m a chocobo~ You’re a chocobo~ And you’re a chocobo too~♪
text_jp:
チョッコボ　アタシはチョコボ～
アナタもチョコボ～　キ～ミもチョコボ～♪

name: Yuffie
text: Chocobo~ I’m a chocobo~ You’re a chocobo~ And you’re a chocobo too~♪
text_jp:
チョッコボ　アタシはチョコボ～
アナタもチョコボ～　キ～ミもチョコボ～♪

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Shani
text: Aponi...You followed me all the way out here again.
text_jp:
アポニ……
また　こんなところまで追いかけてきて

name: Yuffie
text: Oh? Could that be Shani?
text_jp: おろ　もしかして　シシカ？

name: Shani
text: COSME_1412
text_jp: COSME_1412

name: Yuffie
text: I talked to your mom! She said it’s a shame the training ground’s going to waste.
text_jp:
お母さんと話したよ
せっかくの訓練場がもったいないって

name: Yuffie
text: So I figured I’d play with Aponi myself!
text_jp: だから　アタシがアポニと遊ぼうと思ってさ

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1416
text_jp: COSME_1416

name: Shani
text: Stay away!
text_jp: 来ないで！

name: Aponi
text: Kweh...
text_jp: クエ……

name: Cloud
text: I’m borrowing Aponi.
text_jp: アポニを借りるぞ

name: Shani
text: COSME_1420
text_jp: COSME_1420

name: Yuffie
text: Alrighty then, first dibs! Yuffie-chan’s gonna take the lead~!
text_jp:
んじゃ　いちばん乗り
ユフィちゃんが　いただきま～す！

name: NPC
text: Would you like to challenge "Hoop de Chocobo"?
text_jp: 『フープ・デ・チョコボ』に挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: Yes
text_jp: 挑戦する

name: NPC
text: No
text_jp: やめる

name: Shani
text: Can’t you just leave me alone?
text_jp: ほっといてくれない？

name: Shani
text: You don’t have any business with me, right?
text_jp: 私に用はないでしょ

name: Yuffie
text: Here I go~!
text_jp: 行っくよ～！

name: Yuffie
text: So exciting!
text_jp: ワクワク！

name: Yuffie
text: Suu~ Haa~
text_jp: すぅ～　はぁ～

name: Yuffie
text: Yahoo~!
text_jp: ひゃっほ～！

name: Yuffie
text: Ahhya~!
text_jp: あっひゃ～！

name: Yuffie
text: Phew~!
text_jp: ふぅ～！

name: Yuffie
text: All done!
text_jp: おしまいっと

name: Yuffie
text: How’s that!
text_jp: ど～だっ！

name: Yuffie
text: That one doesn’t count!
text_jp: いまの　ナシナシ！

name: Yuffie
text: Huh~?
text_jp: あっれ～？

name: Yuffie
text: No good, huh~
text_jp: ダメかあ～

name: NPC
text: Would you like to try again?
text_jp: もういちど　挑戦しますか？

name: NPC
text: Yes
text_jp: はい

name: NPC
text: No
text_jp: いいえ

name: Shani
text: If you can’t even clear a training course like this, that says it all, doesn’t it?
text_jp:
こんな訓練すらクリアできないようじゃ
たかが知れてるね

name: Yuffie
text: What~? I’m not giving up that easily!
text_jp:
なに～？
アタシ　あきらめないかんね

name: Yuffie
text: Heeheehee! I might just have a knack for chocobo racing!
text_jp:
イッシシシ！
アタシ　チョコボレーサーの才能あるかも

name: Shani
text: I’ve done way tougher training than this, you know.
text_jp:
私は　もっともっと
難しい訓練もやってたんだから

name: Shani
text: If you think you’ve got talent, then clear the other training grounds too!
text_jp:
才能があるっていうなら
ほかの訓練場もクリアしてみせなさいよ

name: Aponi
text: Kweh Kweh~...
text_jp: クエッ　クエ～……

name: Yuffie
text: Grr~! Fine, I’ll take on your challenge!
text_jp:
ぐぬぬ～
受けてやろーじゃん　その挑戦！

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1449
text_jp: COSME_1449

name: Shani
text: COSME_1450
text_jp: COSME_1450

name: Yuffie
text: Hey, Shani, you actually want to ride Aponi, don’t you? If that’s the case—
text_jp:
ねえ　シシカ
本当はアポニに乗りたいんでしょ？　それなら

name: Shani
text: I’m not riding anymore!
text_jp: もう　乗らない！

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1453
text_jp: COSME_1453

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1454
text_jp: COSME_1454

name: NPC
text: What would you like to ask?
text_jp: なにを聞きますか？

name: NPC
text: Why she won’t ride chocobos
text_jp: チョコボに乗らない理由

name: NPC
text: About Aponi
text_jp: アポニについて

name: NPC
text: Nothing to ask
text_jp: 聞くことはない

name: Shani
text: I caused a collision during a race.
text_jp: 私　レースで接触事故を起こしたの

name: Shani
text: The moment I thought I’d fallen, all I could see were legs tangled up in front of me.
text_jp:
落ちたって思った次の瞬間
目の前で　たくさんの脚がもつれあって

name: Shani
text: Whenever I think back to that moment, I...
text_jp: あのときのことを思い出すと　私……

name: Shani
text: Aponi and I have been together since we were little.
text_jp:
アポニとは　小さい頃から
ずっといっしょだった

name: Shani
text: He knows my riding style so well, we’d never had a single accident before.
text_jp:
私の乗り方をよく知ってるから
事故なんか　いちどもなかったのに

name: Shani
text: Just leave me alone.
text_jp: 私のことは　ほっといて

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1465
text_jp: COSME_1465

name: Yuffie
text: Oh, alright then! Guess I’ll just play here myself~!
text_jp:
あっそ　じゃあ
ここもアタシが遊ばせてもらお～っと

name: Shani
text: I’ve got nothing more to say.
text_jp: もう話すこと　ないから

name: Shani
text: Leave me alone.
text_jp: ほっといて

name: Yuffie
text: Well, that’s about it~! Could’ve done even better if I wanted to!
text_jp:
まっ　こんなとこかな～
なんなら　も～っとうまくやれたけどね

name: Shani
text: Forcing him to listen won’t work.
text_jp: 力ずくで言うこと聞かせようとしても　ダメ

name: Shani
text: Before we take off, I make a promise with Aponi: "We’ll definitely make it there together."
text_jp:
飛ぶまえに　アポニと約束するの
『ふたりで絶対　あそこに行くよ』って

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Yuffie
text: Hmm~ Well then, show me how it’s done! Ride Aponi yourself!
text_jp:
ふ～ん　じゃあ　お手本見せてよ
自分でアポニに乗ってさ

name: Aponi
text: Kweh Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ　クエッ！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1475
text_jp: COSME_1475

name: Shani
text: That’s mean! Forget it, I’m leaving.
text_jp:
イジワル！
もういい　帰る

name: Yuffie
text: Oops~
text_jp: あっちゃ～

name: Cloud
text: Looks like that backfired.
text_jp: 逆効果だったようだな

name: Aponi
text: Kweh~...
text_jp: クエ～……

name: Yuffie
text: Ugh, sorry about that! C’mon, let’s go after Shani!
text_jp:
ああもう　ゴメンって
ほら　シシカを追いかけよ！

name: Kamaria
text: Did something happen with Shani?
text_jp: シシカと　なにかあったのかい？

name: Kamaria
text: I don’t know who she takes after, but that girl’s stubborn as can be. She’s such a handful!
text_jp:
だれに似たのか　あの子も強情でねえ
まったく世話が焼けるったら

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Shani
text: Why are you chasing me? I can’t ride Aponi anymore!
text_jp:
どうして追ってくるの
私はもう　アポニには乗れないんだから！

name: Aponi
text: Kweh...
text_jp: クエ……

name: Shani
text: COSME_1486
text_jp: COSME_1486

name: Shani
text: COSME_1487
text_jp: COSME_1487

name: Shani
text: Aponi...I’m no good anymore.
text_jp:
アポニ……
私　もうダメなの

name: Yuffie
text: You’re not no good!
text_jp: ダメじゃない！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1490
text_jp: COSME_1490

name: Yuffie
text: Watch this—I’ll pull off an amazing jump and prove Aponi’s the best!
text_jp:
見てて　アタシがすっごいジャンプ決めて
アポニは最高って証明するから

name: Shani
text: Aponi...
text_jp: アポニ……

name: Yuffie
text: Even I managed to do this much!
text_jp: アタシでも　こんなにできたよ

name: Yuffie
text: All thanks to this little guy! Aponi’s the best, right?
text_jp:
ぜんぶ　この子のおかげ
アポニ　最高じゃない？

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Shani
text: I already know that.
text_jp: そんなの　知ってる

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1497
text_jp: COSME_1497

name: Shani
text: COSME_1498
text_jp: COSME_1498

name: Cloud
text: If something’s up, just say it.
text_jp: なにかあるなら　話してみろ

name: Shani
text: COSME_1500
text_jp: COSME_1500

name: Shani
text: That day, I...I got cocky, thinking it’d be a breeze.
text_jp:
あの日　私
今日は楽勝だなって　油断してた

name: Shani
text: And during the race, I started thinking about how I’d spend the prize money.
text_jp:
それで　レース中に
賞金の使い道なんか考えちゃって

name: Shani
text: Because of that, at the corner’s entrance, I couldn’t sync with Aponi.
text_jp:
そのせいで　コーナーの入口で
アポニと呼吸が合わなくて

name: Shani
text: I lost my balance and fell.
text_jp: バランスを崩して　落ちちゃったの

name: Shani
text: Aponi tried to protect me, and ended up getting hurt because of it.
text_jp:
アポニが　かばってくれて
そのせいでアポニもケガしちゃって

name: Aponi
text: Kweh Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ　クエッ！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1507
text_jp: COSME_1507

name: Shani
text: COSME_1508
text_jp: COSME_1508

name: Shani
text: I’m terrified it’ll happen again. I can’t ride anymore.
text_jp:
また同じことが起こったらって思ったら　怖くて
もう　乗れないよ

name: Aponi
text: Kweh Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ　クエッ！

name: Yuffie
text: Mr. Fix-It Cloud, translate for us!
text_jp:
なんでも屋のクラウドさん
通訳　おねがい！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1512
text_jp: COSME_1512

name: Cloud
text: Huh?
text_jp: えっ？

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1514
text_jp: COSME_1514

name: Aponi
text: Kweh Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ　クエッ！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1516
text_jp: COSME_1516

name: Aponi
text: COSME_1517
text_jp: COSME_1517

name: Aponi
text: COSME_1518
text_jp: COSME_1518

name: Aponi
text: COSME_1519
text_jp: COSME_1519

name: Aponi
text: COSME_1520
text_jp: COSME_1520

name: Cloud
text: "That was the worst accident ever."
text_jp: 『あれは　最悪の事故だった』

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1522
text_jp: COSME_1522

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1523
text_jp: COSME_1523

name: Cloud
text: "But why not take it as a lesson learned?"
text_jp:
『でも　あの事故を
　教訓にすればいいではないか』

name: Cloud
text: "Let’s both be careful so it never happens again."
text_jp:
『二度と同じあやまちをおかさないように
　お互い　気をつけよう』

name: Cloud
text: "Heal up quick so we can ride together."
text_jp: 『はやくケガを治して　いっしょに走ろう』

name: Yuffie
text: COSME_1527
text_jp: COSME_1527

name: Yuffie
text: That’s what he said!
text_jp: だって！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1529
text_jp: COSME_1529

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1530
text_jp: COSME_1530

name: Shani
text: Aponi...
text_jp: アポニ……

name: Shani
text: COSME_1532
text_jp: COSME_1532

name: Shani
text: COSME_1533
text_jp: COSME_1533

name: Aponi
text: Kweh Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ　クエッ！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1535
text_jp: COSME_1535

name: Shani
text: COSME_1536
text_jp: COSME_1536

name: Shani
text: COSME_1537
text_jp: COSME_1537

name: Shani
text: COSME_1538
text_jp: COSME_1538

name: Kamaria
text: Mhm mhm!
text_jp: うんうん！

name: Shani
text: I’ll work hard on my recovery, so you can borrow Aponi in the meantime.
text_jp:
私　治療をがんばるから
そのあいだ　アポニを貸してあげる

name: Yuffie
text: Huh? For real?
text_jp: えっ　いいの？

name: Shani
text: While I can’t ride, I can’t let Aponi sit idle too.
text_jp:
私が乗れないあいだ
アポニまで休ませるわけにはいかないもの

name: Shani
text: I want a trustworthy racer to train him.
text_jp: 信頼できるレーサーに鍛えてもらいたいの

name: Aponi
text: Kweh!
text_jp: クエッ！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1545
text_jp: COSME_1545

name: Shani
text: Mom, I’m sorry. I’m gonna try again.
text_jp:
お母さん　ごめんね
私　またがんばる

name: Kamaria
text: I’ve been waiting to hear that!
text_jp: その言葉　待ってたよ

name: Shani
text: Once I’m healed, it’s a race against me!
text_jp: ケガが治ったら　私と勝負だよ

name: Yuffie
text: Heeheehee! Bring it o~n!
text_jp: シッシッシ　受けて立～つ！

name: Shani
text: COSME_1550
text_jp: COSME_1550

name: Kamaria
text: COSME_1551
text_jp: COSME_1551

name: Shani
text: To build trust with a chocobo, first, look into their eyes—
text_jp:
『チョコボとの信頼関係構築においては
　まず　相手の目を見つめ』――

name: Shani
text: I’ve already done that...What’s next?
text_jp: それはもうやってるし……それから？

name: Shani
text: Aponi’s super clingy, so give him lots of attention for me too, okay?
text_jp:
アポニは　すっごい甘えん坊なの
私のぶんも　たくさん構ってあげてね

name: Shani
text: How’s Aponi doing? If you push him too hard, I won’t forgive you!
text_jp:
アポニの様子はどう？
無理させたら　承知しないんだからね

name: Shani
text: I’ve started practicing again little by little.
text_jp: 最近　すこしずつ練習を再開したの

name: Shani
text: It’ll take time before I can race again, but I’m absolutely not giving up!
text_jp:
レースに出られるまで時間はかかると思うけど
絶対　あきらめないから！

name: Kamaria
text: Feel free to use the training ground however you like!
text_jp: 訓練場は　好きに使ってくれて構わないよ

name: Kamaria
text: Shishika’s all fired up now. Thanks to you folks—appreciate it!
text_jp:
シシカはやる気満々だ
あんたたちのおかげだね　ありがとう

name: Kamaria
text: Oh, welcome! How’s Aponi holding up?
text_jp:
おや　いらっしゃい
アポニは元気にしてるかい？

name: Kamaria
text: Make sure to say hi to Shani too.
text_jp: シシカにも声を掛けてやっておくれ

name: Kamaria
text: She might not show it, but she looks forward to you all stopping by!
text_jp:
なんだかんだ　あんたたちが来るのを
楽しみにしてるんだよ

name: Cesar
text: The omens themselves aren’t unusual.
text_jp: 予兆自体は珍しいことではありません

name: Cesar
text: The question is whether the "Shooting Star" will appear.
text_jp:
問題は
『駆け星』が現れるかどうかです

name: Stargazer
text: However, as of yet, we’ve seen no sign of the Shooting Star.
text_jp:
しかし　いまだ
駆け星の姿は確認できておりませんよ

name: Stargazer
text: If the Shooting Star doesn’t show up soon...
text_jp:
もしこのまま
駆け星が現れなければ……

name: Stargazer
text: Let us have faith in the power of the stars.
text_jp: 星の力を信じましょう

name: Cesar
text: Should we report this to Elder Bugenhagen?
text_jp: ブーゲンハーゲン様にお伝えすべきか

name: Stargazer
text: We can’t see it from here.
text_jp: ここからは　見えないな

name: Stargazer
text: Oh, what in the world is going on?
text_jp: ああ　いったいどうしたことか

name: Stargazer
text: We are one with the stars...
text_jp: 我らは星とともにある……

name: Aerith
text: Did something happen?
text_jp: なにか　あったんですか？

name: Cesar
text: Oh, Nanaki’s friends! Allow me to introduce myself—I’m Cesar, a mentor.
text_jp:
ああ　ナナキのご友人がた
あらためまして　私はメンターのセサルと申します

name: Cesar
text: The thing is...
text_jp: 実は……

name: Cesar
text: A monster long said to be an "omen of calamity" has been sighted around the valley.
text_jp:
古くから『災いの予兆』と伝えられてきた
モンスターが　谷の周辺で目撃されたのです

name: Aerith
text: Calamity?
text_jp: わざわい？

name: Cesar
text: Omens of calamity have been observed many times before.
text_jp: 災いの予兆は　これまでも度々観測されてきました

name: Cesar
text: But each time, our planet has triumphed over disaster.
text_jp:
しかし　我々の星は
そのたびに災いに打ち勝ってきたのです

name: Cesar
text: This Shooting Star is proof of the planet’s victory. If the planet overcomes the calamity,
text_jp:
この駆け星こそ　星の勝利のあかし
星が災いに打ち勝てば

name: Cesar
text: it’s said that faintly glowing stars will rain down upon the land in broad daylight.
text_jp:
白日のもと　淡く光り輝く星が
大地に降り注ぐと伝えられております

name: Aerith
text: I can’t see the Shooting Star.
text_jp: かけぼし　見えないね

name: Cesar
text: Indeed...
text_jp: ええ……

name: Cesar
text: However, these photos were all taken from locations far from here.
text_jp:
しかし　この写真はいずれも
ここから離れた場所で撮られたもの

name: Cesar
text: It’s possible the Shooting Star has already descended upon our valley.
text_jp:
あるいはすでに　駆け星は我らの谷に
降り注いでいるのかもしれません

name: Aerith
text: Should we go look for it?
text_jp: 探しに行ってみる？

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1586
text_jp: COSME_1586

name: Cloud
text: You won’t settle down unless we do, right?
text_jp: 行かないと　落ち着かないだろ

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1588
text_jp: COSME_1588

name: Cesar
text: Oh, if you’d do that, it’d put our minds at ease too.
text_jp:
おお　そうしてくださると
我々の心も休まります

name: Cesar
text: The omens were spotted in three locations. The Shooting Star likely appears near those spots.
text_jp:
災いの予兆が目撃されたのは３箇所
駆け星もおそらく　その近辺に現れるはずです

name: Stargazer
text: Here, take these documents and the recording device.
text_jp:
どうぞ　こちらの資料と
記録装置をお持ちください

name: Stargazer
text: Capture the Shooting Star in the same composition and bring us good news.
text_jp:
同じ構図で駆け星の姿を収め
我々に良き報せを

name: Cesar
text: May you be with the stars.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Cesar
text: For fixed-point observation, please try to match the composition of the photos as closely as possible.
text_jp:
定点観測の側面からも　写真の構図は極力
資料と同じになるようお願いします

name: Cesar
text: We believe in the power of the stars. The Shooting Star must surely descend upon this valley.
text_jp:
我々は　星の力を信じております
駆け星は必ずや　この谷に降り注ぐはず

name: Cesar
text: May you be with the stars.
text_jp: 星とともにあらんことを

name: Aerith
text: Oh! An omen of calamity?
text_jp: あっ　災いの予兆？

name: Aerith
text: Cloud, look at that!
text_jp: クラウド　あれ！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1599
text_jp: COSME_1599

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1600
text_jp: COSME_1600

name: Aerith
text: Oh, picture time!
text_jp: あっ　写真写真！

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Aerith
text: Did you check the reference photos properly?
text_jp: 資料の写真　ちゃんと見た？

name: Aerith
text: Something’s off.
text_jp: なんか　ちがう

name: Aerith
text: Should we try a different spot?
text_jp: 撮る場所　変えてみる？

name: Aerith
text: It’s a liiittle off?
text_jp: すこ～し　ずれてる？

name: Aerith
text: Hmm, not bad...but
text_jp: う～ん　悪くはない……けど

name: Aerith
text: A bit more, maybe?
text_jp: もうちょっと　かな

name: Aerith
text: Yeah, it’s nicely shot!
text_jp: うん　キレイに撮れてる

name: Aerith
text: Perfect composition!
text_jp: 構図　ぴったし！

name: Aerith
text: Wow, it’s just like the reference!
text_jp: おお　資料とおんなじだね！

name: NPC
text: Is this photo okay?
text_jp: この写真でいいですか？

name: NPC
text: Yes
text_jp: はい

name: NPC
text: Retake
text_jp: 撮り直す

name: Aerith
text: Huh~ Cloud, you can do stuff like this too!
text_jp:
ふ～ん　クラウド
こんなこともできるんだ

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1616
text_jp: COSME_1616

name: Cloud
text: Let’s check out the other spots.
text_jp: ほかの場所も探してみよう

name: Cloud
text: No sign of the Shooting Star.
text_jp: 駆け星は見えないな

name: Aerith
text: Well, it’s not quite a substitute, but...
text_jp: そのかわりと言っては　なんですが

name: Aerith
text: Whoa, there it is! Cloud, quick, quick!
text_jp:
わっ　出た！
クラウド　はやくはやく

name: Cloud
text: Yeah...
text_jp: ああ……

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1622
text_jp: COSME_1622

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1623
text_jp: COSME_1623

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1624
text_jp: COSME_1624

name: Aerith
text: Cloud~?
text_jp: クラウド～？

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1626
text_jp: COSME_1626

name: Aerith
text: Yup, got it!
text_jp: うん　撮れたね

name: Cloud
text: One more to go. Let’s move.
text_jp: 次が最後だな　行くぞ

name: Cloud
text: Begone, calamity.
text_jp: 災いは消えろ

name: Cloud
text: Taking the shot.
text_jp: 撮るぞ

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1631
text_jp: COSME_1631

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1632
text_jp: COSME_1632

name: Aerith
text: Cloud, so many Shooting Stars! It’s a shame to see them just through a lens.
text_jp:
クラウド　駆け星　たっくさん！
レンズ越しじゃ　もったいない

name: Aerith
text: You sneakily took a pic earlier, didn’t you?
text_jp: さっき　隠し撮りしたでしょ

name: Cloud
text: I took it. Fair and square.
text_jp: 撮った　堂々とな

name: Aerith
text: Oh~ really?
text_jp: ふ～ん？

name: Aerith
text: Next time, let’s take one together, okay?
text_jp: 今度はクラウドもいっしょに　ね？

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1638
text_jp: COSME_1638

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1639
text_jp: COSME_1639

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1640
text_jp: COSME_1640

name: Aerith
text: Yeah, looks good!
text_jp: うん　いいね

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1642
text_jp: COSME_1642

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1643
text_jp: COSME_1643

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1644
text_jp: COSME_1644

name: Cloud
text: Aerith.
text_jp: エアリス

name: Aerith
text: COSME_1646
text_jp: COSME_1646

name: Cloud
text: Uh, no...
text_jp: あ　いや……

name: Cloud
text: Let’s snap the photo and head back.
text_jp: 写真撮って　帰ろう

name: Aerith
text: Yeah, you’re right.
text_jp: うん　そうだね

name: Aerith
text: Shall we head back to Cesar’s?
text_jp: セサルさんのとこ　戻ろっか

name: Cesar
text: Oh, so the Shooting Star did appear!
text_jp:
おお　やはり
駆け星は現れましたか

name: Cesar
text: Hmm, this...Are you sure it was taken at the same spot as the reference?
text_jp:
う～ん　これは……
本当に資料と同じ場所で撮影されたのですか？

name: Cesar
text: Well, regardless, it’s definitely the Shooting Star.
text_jp:
まあ　しかし
駆け星なのは間違いないようだ

name: Cesar
text: I see.
text_jp: なるほど

name: Cesar
text: Some scenes differ a bit from the reference, but it’ll do.
text_jp:
資料とはいささか違う情景も混ざってますが
まあ　いいでしょう

name: Cesar
text: Hmm, a composition identical to past observations. This will be a record for posterity!
text_jp:
ううむ　かつての観測と寸分違わぬ構図
これは後世に残る資料となりますよ

name: Cesar
text: COSME_1657
text_jp: COSME_1657

name: Cesar
text: Indeed, our planet is beautiful and strong.
text_jp: やはり　我々の星は美しく強い

name: Cesar
text: No calamity is worth fearing.
text_jp:
どのような災いも
恐るるに足らぬということですね

name: Stargazer
text: Look at this! There are more Shooting Stars than we’ve observed before.
text_jp:
見てください
以前観測したものより　駆け星の数が多い

name: Stargazer
text: This could be proof that our planet’s power is growing.
text_jp:
これは　我々の星の力が
高まっている証拠かもしれません

name: Cesar
text: Oh, you’re right!
text_jp: おお　確かに

name: Cesar
text: And the positions of these stars—if you connect them with lines...
text_jp:
それに　この星の位置
それぞれを線で結んでいくと

name: Stargazer
text: Could this pattern be...?
text_jp: まさか　この印は……

name: Stargazer
text: This is a groundbreaking discovery!
text_jp: これは　新説の発見ですよ！

name: Cloud
text: What did you wish for back there?
text_jp: あのときは　なにを祈ったんだ

name: Aerith
text: Huh? Well, you know, "Shooting Stars, protect us from calamity."
text_jp:
えっ？　だってほら
『駆け星よ　災いから守りたまえ』って

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, that’s right.
text_jp: ああ　そうだな

name: Aerith
text: You had a scary look on your face earlier.
text_jp: さっき　こわい顔してたね

name: Cloud
text: No I didn’t.
text_jp: そんなことはない

name: Aerith
text: I can’t see the Shooting Star.
text_jp: 駆け星　見えないね

name: Cesar
text: We simply trust in the stars and press forward. Thanks to you, everyone seems reassured.
text_jp:
我らはただ　星の力を信じ進むのみ
あなたがたのおかげで　みなも安心できたようです

name: Cesar
text: The stars will protect us from any calamity. We must be grateful to be born on this planet.
text_jp:
星は　どんな災いからも我々を守ってくださる
この星に生まれたことを感謝しなければ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm...Now where did I put that?
text_jp:
う～む……
あれは　どこにやったかのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: I could’ve sworn I stashed it around here.
text_jp: このあたりにしまっておいたはずじゃが

name: Bugenhagen
text: Haa, I’m getting old, aren’t I?
text_jp: はあ　わしも老いたのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Haa~te now...
text_jp: は～てのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Maybe it’s not here, but over there?
text_jp: ここではなく　あっちじゃったかの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Phew, I’m at a loss.
text_jp: ふう　お手上げじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Oh, Nanaki!
text_jp: おお　ナナキか

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps, what’re you up to?
text_jp: じっちゃん　なにしてるの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Well, I was thinking it’s been a while since I last did some fieldwork!
text_jp:
いやあ　わしも久しぶりに
フィールドワークに出ようかと思っての

name: Bugenhagen
text: I was looking for the tools I need...Hmm, now where did I put that?
text_jp:
必要な道具を探してたんじゃが……
はて　あれはどこにやったか

name: Red XIII
text: Geez~
text_jp: もう～

name: Red XIII
text: If it’s fieldwork, I’ll go. I’d worry if you went alone, Gramps.
text_jp:
フィールドワークなら　オイラが行くよ
じっちゃんひとりじゃ心配だし

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho! Don’t treat me like an old man. I’ve still got plenty—
text_jp:
ホッ！　年寄り扱いするでない
わしだってまだまだ――

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho!
text_jp: ホッ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hoho, hoho~ ho...
text_jp: ホホ　ホホ～　ホー……

name: Red XIII
text: See? Leave the investigation to us. You rest, Gramps.
text_jp:
ほらね　調査はオイラたちにまかせて
じっちゃんは休んでてよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho...hmph, well, I can only ask this while you’re in the valley.
text_jp:
ホー……ホウ　まあ
おまえたちが谷にいる間しか頼めんしのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Guess I’ll take you up on it this time.
text_jp: 今回は　甘えるとするかの

name: Red XIII
text: Sure, just tell me anything.
text_jp: うん　なんでも言ってよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho, truth is, there’s something bothering me.
text_jp:
ホッホッホ
実は　気に掛かっていることがあるのじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: These are the records from when I once investigated the life spots around here.
text_jp:
わしがかつて　このあたりの
ライフスポットを調べた時の調査記録じゃ

name: Cloud
text: Different from what I know.
text_jp: 俺が知ってるのとは違う

name: Bugenhagen
text: Indeed, the Lifestream is something that constantly moves and flows.
text_jp:
うむ　ライフストリームとは
絶えず動き　流れるもの

name: Bugenhagen
text: The places where energy bursts forth shift positions in a regular cycle.
text_jp:
エネルギーが噴出する場所も
一定の周期で位置を変える

name: Bugenhagen
text: But recently, the valley survey team gave me a troubling report.
text_jp:
じゃが　最近
谷の調査隊から気になる報告があっての

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1699
text_jp: COSME_1699

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1700
text_jp: COSME_1700

name: Bugenhagen
text: Well, we’ll know more once the investigation’s done.
text_jp: まあ　詳しいことは調査が済んでからじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: First, could you head to this spot and check the surrounding mako frequency with the meter?
text_jp:
まずはこの場所へ行き　魔晄測定器で
周辺の魔晄周波数を調べてもらえるかの

name: Red XIII
text: Got it. I’m on it.
text_jp: わかった　行ってくる

name: Bugenhagen
text: The life spot locations are noted in the survey data. Don’t miss the markers.
text_jp:
ライフスポットの場所は　調査資料に記されておる
目印を見落とさぬようにな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho, I’m counting on you, Nanaki.
text_jp: ホーホウ　まかせたぞ　ナナキ

name: Bugenhagen
text: This room needs tidying up soon too. Last time I cleaned was...hmm, when was that?
text_jp:
この部屋も　そろそろ片付けんといかんのう
まえに掃除をしたのは……はて　いつだったか

name: Red XIII
text: Huh, there’s a fence. Can’t investigate like this.
text_jp:
あれ　柵がある
これじゃ調べられないよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho, my apologies. I forgot to give you the key.
text_jp:
ホーホホウ　すまんのう
鍵を渡すのを忘れておったわい

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps, you came all the way here?
text_jp: じっちゃん　来ちゃったの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Don’t be so harsh. I just had to see it with my own eyes.
text_jp:
そう邪険にするでない
やはり　この目で直接見たくなっての

name: Bugenhagen
text: So this spot’s already dried up, huh? Got the mako meter with you?
text_jp:
ここは　すでに枯れておったか
測定器はあるかの？

name: Cloud
text: Yeah.
text_jp: ああ

name: Cloud
text: 5...8...No good. Barely any reaction.
text_jp:
５……８……
ダメだな　ほとんど反応してない

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, I see.
text_jp: ふむ　そうか

name: Bugenhagen
text: Just to be sure, let’s check the other spots too.
text_jp: 念のため　ほかの場所も確認するとしよう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Could you head to these two life spots next?
text_jp:
次は　この２箇所のライフスポットに
向かってみてくれるかの？

name: Bugenhagen
text: I’ll follow after you once the timing’s right.
text_jp:
わしは　頃合いを見計らって
おぬしらを追いかけるでの

name: Red XIII
text: Trouble! The life spot’s under attack!
text_jp: たいへん　ライフスポットが襲われてるよ！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1719
text_jp: COSME_1719

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1720
text_jp: COSME_1720

name: Red XIII
text: It’s been wrecked...
text_jp: 壊されちゃった……

name: Red XIII
text: Let’s hurry. I’m worried about the other spots.
text_jp: 急ごう　ほかの場所も心配だよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Good work, good work.
text_jp: ご苦労　ご苦労

name: Red XIII
text: This one’s a bust too, huh~
text_jp: ここも　ダメかな～

name: Cloud
text: 10...no, 400? The readings are all over the place.
text_jp:
１０……いや　４００か？
振れ幅が大きい

name: Cloud
text: This "Gz" unit—how do you even pronounce it?
text_jp:
この　『Ｇｚ』という単位は
なんて読めばいいんだ

name: Red XIII
text: "Gezel". It’s Gramps’ name!
text_jp: 『ゲーゼル』　じっちゃんの名前だよ！

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps was the first to discover that the Lifestream has a steady wavelength.
text_jp: ライフストリームに一定の波があるのを じっちゃんが最初に発見したんだ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ahem!
text_jp: おっほん！

name: Bugenhagen
text: ...That’s beside the point.
text_jp: ......そんなことは　どうでもよい

name: Bugenhagen
text:
Now, there are still more life spots left.
Dawdle too long, and the sun’ll set.
text_jp:
さあ　まだまだライフスポットは残っておる
ぐずぐずしてると　日が暮れてしまうぞ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Here’s the survey record for the next destination. Keep at it, I’m counting on you.
text_jp:
これが　次の目的地の調査記録じゃ
引き続き　頼んだぞ

name: Red XIII
text: Gotta protect the life spot!
text_jp: ライフスポット　守らなきゃ！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1734
text_jp: COSME_1734

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1735
text_jp: COSME_1735

name: Red XIII
text: Sorry, Gramps~
text_jp: じっちゃん　ごめ～ん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Looks like the investigation didn’t go well. Well, can’t be helped.
text_jp:
調査はうまくいかなかったようじゃの
まあ　仕方あるまい

name: Bugenhagen
text: Here’s the survey record for the next destination. Keep at it, I’m counting on you.
text_jp:
これが　次の目的地の調査記録じゃ
引き続き　頼んだぞ

name: Red XIII
text: All done, Gramps!
text_jp: 終わったよ　じっちゃん！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho, great work, Nanaki.
text_jp: ホッホ　大手柄じゃ　ナナキ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1741
text_jp: COSME_1741

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, just before it fades out, or perhaps a sign of awakening?
text_jp:
ふむ　力尽きる直前か
はたまた　目覚めの予兆か

name: Red XIII
text: This...it’s kinda like a Weapon’s voice, huh?
text_jp: これは……ウェポンの声に似てるね

name: Bugenhagen
text: I see, indeed. If that’s the case, then perhaps...
text_jp:
なるほどのう
であるならば　やはり……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Now, let’s hurry to the remaining life spots.
text_jp:
さて　残りのライフスポットへ
先を急ぐとしよう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Here’s the survey record for the next destination. Keep at it, I’m counting on you.
text_jp:
これが　次の目的地の調査記録じゃ
引き続き　頼んだぞ

name: Red XIII
text: Something’s off. Be careful!
text_jp: 様子が変だ　気をつけて！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1748
text_jp: COSME_1748

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1749
text_jp: COSME_1749

name: Red XIII
text: We didn’t make it in time...
text_jp: 間に合わなかった……

name: Bugenhagen
text: No time to mope, Nanaki.
text_jp: 落ち込んでおるヒマはないぞ　ナナキ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Just one left now. Stay sharp.
text_jp:
残すは　あとひとつじゃ
油断せぬようにな

name: Red XIII
text: That’s...
text_jp: あれって……

name: Cloud
text: Feelers?
text_jp: フィーラーか

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho, looks like we’ve got an unusual visitor.
text_jp: ホーウ　変わったお客人がいるようじゃの

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps, if there’s something controlling fate, would you believe it?
text_jp:
じっちゃん
運命を支配する者がいるとしたら　信じる？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho, fate’s just something tacked on after the fact—a trick.
text_jp:
ホーホウ　運命など
あとから取ってつけたまやかしに過ぎん

name: Bugenhagen
text: How we live now is up to us.
text_jp: いまをどう生きるかは　わしら次第じゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Right, Cloud?
text_jp: そうじゃろう　クラウド

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1760
text_jp: COSME_1760

name: Cloud
text: Yeah, that’s right.
text_jp: ああ　そうだな

name: Bugenhagen
text: 7000 spike, 83 huh?

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, it’s more active than ever before, it seems.
text_jp:
ふむ　かつてないほど
活性化しているようじゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Has the Lifestream’s flow changed with the passage of time?
text_jp:
時の流れにつれ
ライフストリームの流れが変わったのか

name: Bugenhagen
text: Or perhaps...
text_jp: あるいは……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Was it twisted and amplified by someone or something?
text_jp:
何者かにより　ねじ曲げられ
増幅されたのか

name: Bugenhagen
text: Just one left now. Stay sharp.
text_jp:
残すは　あとひとつじゃ
油断せぬようにな

name: Red XIII
text: Huh, no monsters here.
text_jp: あれ　ここはモンスターがいないね

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, looks like this one’s already dried up.
text_jp: ふむ　もう枯れてしまっておるようじゃの

name: Bugenhagen
text: Cloud, hand me the mako meter.
text_jp: クラウド　魔晄測定器をこちらへ

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1771
text_jp: COSME_1771

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1772
text_jp: COSME_1772

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ngh, this is...!
text_jp: ぬう　これは……！

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps, get back!
text_jp: じっちゃん　さがってて！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho!
text_jp: ホーホウホウ！

name: Bugenhagen
text: You folks being here saved me.
text_jp: おぬしらがいてくれて　助かったわい

name: Red XIII
text: Phew, seriously.
text_jp: はあ　ホントだよ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Thanks to you, I’ve learned a lot.
text_jp: おかげで　色々なことがわかった

name: Bugenhagen
text: As you said, it seems all sorts of things are happening to the planet right now.
text_jp:
おぬしらの言うように　どうやらいま
星には様々なことが起きているようじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Though we only managed to check two spots.
text_jp:
まあ　調べられたのは
たったの２箇所じゃがのう

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1781
text_jp: COSME_1781

name: Bugenhagen
text: We didn’t pin down the cause, but the monsters’ activity is undeniable.
text_jp:
原因がわからずじまいだったが　モンスターが
活性化しているのは　間違いないようじゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Now, what should we talk about?
text_jp: さて　なにについて話そうかの

name: NPC
text: What should we talk about?
text_jp: なにについて話そうかの？

name: NPC
text: The life spot anomalies
text_jp: ライフスポットの異常について

name: NPC
text: Weapons
text_jp: ウェポンについて

name: NPC
text: The Lifestream amplification
text_jp: ライフストリームの増幅について

name: NPC
text: Nothing to ask
text_jp: 聞くことはない

name: Bugenhagen
text: Life spots naturally shift locations with the planet’s flow.
text_jp:
ライフスポットとは元来　星の流れにあわせ
絶えず場所を変えていくもの

name: Bugenhagen
text: But drying up in such a short cycle has never happened before.
text_jp:
じゃが　これほどまでに短い周期で枯れ果てるなど
かつてなかったことじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: The reason’s unclear, but it seems the planet’s life cycle is undergoing rapid change.
text_jp:
理由は定かではないが　星の命の営みはいま
急激な変化を迎えているようじゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Weapons, huh...I knew the name from old texts.
text_jp:
ウェポンか……
古い文献に登場するから　その名は知っておった

name: Bugenhagen
text: But I thought it was a symbol, a metaphor, not something real.
text_jp:
だが　なにかの象徴　たとえであって
実在するとは考えていなかった

name: Bugenhagen
text: So I dismissed your eyewitness accounts right off the bat.
text_jp:
だから　おまえたちの目撃談も
即座に否定してしまったというわけじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: No...that’s not it. I was afraid.
text_jp:
いや……違うな
わしは　恐れていたのじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: The existence of Weapons, born in the planet’s crisis, and by extension, facing the planet’s fate.
text_jp:
星の危機に生まれるというウェポンの存在
ひいては　この星の行く末を受け止めることを

name: Bugenhagen
text: I brushed off your pleas harshly. I owe you an apology, here and now.
text_jp:
おぬしらの訴えを邪険にあつかったこと
あらためて詫びよう　このとおりじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: You can’t overcome fear without facing it.
text_jp: 恐怖に向き合わねば　恐怖を克服することはできん

name: Bugenhagen
text: It’s time I accept the signs of Weapons as truth too.
text_jp:
ウェポンの予兆　わしも真実として
受け止めねばならぬ時がきたようじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: The sinister presence lingering at the life spots...
text_jp: ライフスポットにただよう　邪悪な気配

name: Bugenhagen
text: It seems something beyond the scope of planetology is at play.
text_jp:
どうやら　星命学の領域では計り知れない
なにかが起きているようじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: You folks seem to have some ideas about it.
text_jp: おぬしらは　なんぞ心当たりがあるようじゃの

name: Red XIII
text: Yeah...
text_jp: うん……

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! That’s fine, Nanaki.
text_jp:
ホーホウホウ！
ナナキよ　それでよい

name: Bugenhagen
text: If you start speculating, you lose sight of the truth and eventually stray.
text_jp:
憶測で物事を語り始めれば
真実を見る目は失われ　やがては道を誤る

name: Bugenhagen
text: That matter might need a bit more observation for now.
text_jp:
あれについては　いましばらく
観察が必要そうじゃのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: In any case, against the great planet, what one person or one life can do is next to nothing.
text_jp:
いずれにしても偉大な星に対し　我々ひとりの人間
ひとつの命ができることなど　ないに等しい

name: Bugenhagen
text: The planet is all the billions of lives that have lived on it, after all.
text_jp:
星とは　これまでこの星に生きた
幾億もの命　そのすべてだからのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: But that also means the planet is a collection of each individual person and life.
text_jp:
しかしそれは同時に　星もひとりひとりの人間
ひとつひとつの命の集合体だということでもある

name: Bugenhagen
text: Even small ripples, spreading and resonating, can become a great force in time.
text_jp:
小さな波紋も　広がり　響きあえば
やがて大きな力となるじゃろう

name: Bugenhagen
text: First, pour all your effort into what you can do, what you must achieve.
text_jp:
まずは　己にできること
成し遂げるべきことに　全力を注ぐことじゃ

name: Bugenhagen
text: I’ll face this planet with all I’ve got once more. If I learn anything, I’ll let you know.
text_jp:
わしも今いちど　全力でこの星と向き合うとしよう
なにかわかれば　おぬしらにも伝えるでの

name: Red XIII
text: Yeah, don’t overdo it, Gramps.
text_jp:
うん　無理はしないでね
じっちゃん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho, hohoho!
text_jp: ホーホー　ホホホーウ！

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1815
text_jp: COSME_1815

name: Bugenhagen
text: Oh, who’s this at a time like this?
text_jp: おっと　こんなときに誰かのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Looks like it’s from the lookout. Let’s see...
text_jp: 見張り番からのようじゃ　なになに……

name: Bugenhagen
text: What?! What a thing!
text_jp: むむ　なんということじゃ！

name: Red XIII
text: What’s wrong, Gramps?
text_jp: どうしたの　じっちゃん

name: Bugenhagen
text: The survey team patrolling the valley reported sighting Gi tribe ghosts.
text_jp:
谷を巡回していた調査隊から
ギ族の亡霊を目撃したと報告があったそうじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1821
text_jp: COSME_1821

name: Red XIII
text: The cave was sealed, right?
text_jp: 洞窟は　封印したんだよね

name: Bugenhagen
text: It was. I confirmed it myself.
text_jp: した　この目で確認したぞ

name: Red XIII
text: Then how?
text_jp: それなら　どうして

name: Bugenhagen
text: They’re ghosts, after all. Our logic can’t measure them.
text_jp:
なにしろ　相手は亡霊じゃ
わしらの理屈では計りしれん

name: Bugenhagen
text: Nanaki and friends, lend me your strength.
text_jp: ナナキと仲間たちよ　力を貸してくれ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1827
text_jp: COSME_1827

name: Bugenhagen
text: Talk to the lookout for details. I’ll head back to the valley too.
text_jp:
詳しい話は見張り番に
わしも谷へ戻るとしよう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Have you already gone to the lookout?
text_jp: 見張り番の元へは　もう行ったのか？

name: Bugenhagen
text: Hmm, when and how did they slip out of the valley?
text_jp:
ううむ　いったいいつ
どうやって谷から抜け出したのか

name: Bugenhagen
text: I’m counting on you for this ghost business.
text_jp: 亡霊の一件　頼んだぞ

name: Bugenhagen
text: Oh, you’re here! Found anything interesting since then?
text_jp:
おお　来ておったか
その後　なにか面白い発見はあったかのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: See the world, hear it, touch it.
text_jp: 世界を見て　聞いて　触れて

name: Bugenhagen
text: Everything becomes a piece of something greater. Hope you find such encounters.
text_jp:
どんな物事も　なにかの大きな糧となる
そんな出会いが見つかるとよいな

name: Bugenhagen
text: Seems the world’s getting hectic lately, huh?
text_jp: なにやら　世間が慌ただしくなってきたようだのう

name: Bugenhagen
text: Too much greed breeds distortion. Shinra and war are inseparable, I suppose.
text_jp:
強すぎる欲はゆがみを招く
神羅と戦争は切っても切れんものなのじゃろう

name: Lookout
text: Oh, Nanaki!
text_jp: ああ　ナナキ！

name: Lookout
text: The survey team spotted Gi tribe ghosts outside the valley.
text_jp:
調査隊が　谷の外で
ギ族の亡霊を目撃したらしいんだ

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps told me. Is the survey team okay?
text_jp:
じっちゃんから聞いた
調査隊の人たちは無事なの？

name: Lookout
text: Yeah, they were near the valley lift by chance. They ditched the vehicle, though.
text_jp:
ああ　たまたま谷に繋がる昇降機の近くにいてね
車はそのまま乗り捨ててきたらしいが

name: Red XIII
text: I’ll go check it out. It’d be bad if the valley got attacked!
text_jp:
オイラ　行ってくるよ
谷が襲われたら　大変だ！

name: Lookout
text: Please do, but be careful.
text_jp: 頼む　でも気をつけるんだぞ

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1843
text_jp: COSME_1843

name: Lookout
text: The survey team saw the Gi near the valley bottom, down by the lift.
text_jp:
調査隊がギ族を目撃したのは
昇降機でおりた　谷底あたりらしい

name: Lookout
text: Take care out there.
text_jp: 気をつけて行けよ

name: Lookout
text: Haven’t had anything like this in a long time.
text_jp: こんなこと　長いことなかったのにな

name: Red XIII
text: Over there! Let’s hurry!
text_jp: あそこだ　急ごう！

name: Gi Specter
text: This presence...Seto?
text_jp: この気配　セトか？

name: Red XIII
text: No, I’m not.
text_jp: 違うよ　オイラは

name: Gi Specter
text: Hateful Seto, traitor Seto!
text_jp: 憎きセト　裏切り者のセト！

name: Gi Specter
text: You’ll pay for centuries of resentment!
text_jp: 積年の恨み　思い知らせてくれる

name: Gi Specter
text: Urgh, I won’t let it end like this!
text_jp: ぐっ　このまま終わらせはせぬぞ

name: Cloud
text: What now?
text_jp: どうする

name: Red XIII
text: Let’s chase it.
text_jp: 追いかけよう

name: Gi Specter
text: Heh, perfect. I’ll sink you right here!
text_jp:
ほう　ちょうど良い
ここで沈めてくれるわ！

name: Gi Specter
text: ...My strength’s still lacking, huh?
text_jp: ……やはり力が足りぬか

name: Gi Specter
text: Oh, power surges within me...It won’t go like before, Seto!
text_jp:
おお　力がみなぎる……
先ほどのようには行かぬぞ　セト！

name: Gi Specter
text: Curse you, wretched...
text_jp: おのれ　忌々しい……

name: Red XIII
text: Wait, you’ve got it wrong!
text_jp: 待って　あんたたち誤解してるよ

name: Gi Specter
text: Silence, Seto!
text_jp: 黙れ　セト！

name: Gi Specter
text: To reclaim the Black Materia, we sought your aid.
text_jp:
黒マテリア奪還の悲願を果たさんと
我々は　おまえに助けを請うた

name: Red XIII
text: Huh? When was this?
text_jp: ええっ　それいつの話？

name: Gi Specter
text: Don’t play dumb, Seto!
text_jp: とぼけるな　セト！

name: Gi Specter
text: Damn you, Seto...
text_jp: おのれ　セトめ……

name: Red XIII
text: I’m not Seto. I’m Nanaki.
text_jp: オイラはセトじゃない　ナナキだ

name: Red XIII
text: Hey, tell me properly. About Seto...my dad, and the Gi tribe.
text_jp:
ねえ　ちゃんと聞かせてよ
セト……オイラのチチと　ギ族の話を

name: Gi Specter
text: You...I see. Not Seto, but Seto’s child—
text_jp:
おまえは……そうか
セトではなく　セトの子――

name: NPC
text: What do you want to ask?
text_jp: なにを聞きますか？

name: NPC
text: About Seto
text_jp: セトについて

name: NPC
text: About the Gi tribe’s wish
text_jp: ギ族の悲願について

name: NPC
text: About Seto’s betrayal
text_jp: セトの裏切りについて

name: NPC
text: Nothing to ask
text_jp: 聞くことはない

name: Gi Specter
text: That day, Seto came to the cave alone, trying to reason with us as we attacked.
text_jp:
セトはあの日　ひとりであの洞窟へとやってきた
攻め入る我らを説得しようとな

name: Gi Specter
text: It was our first meeting, but he was a magnificent beast with a splendid mane.
text_jp:
奴とまみえたのはそれが初めてであったが
見事なたてがみを持つ　美しい獣であった

name: Gi Specter
text: We recognized Seto’s courage and sincerity and decided to entrust him with our wish.
text_jp:
我らはセトの勇気と誠意を認め
我らの悲願を託すことにしたのだ

name: Gi Specter
text: Our wish was to retrieve the Black Materia and fade away.
text_jp:
我らの願いは
黒マテリアを取り戻し　消えること

name: Gi Specter
text: But the moment we told him, Seto turned on us.
text_jp:
だが　それを告げた途端
セトは手のひらを返した

name: Gi Specter
text: Seto’s betrayal filled us with grief and rage.
text_jp:
セトの裏切りに
我らは嘆き悲しみ　怒りをたぎらせた

name: Gi Specter
text: As our furious arrows struck him, Seto declared to us:
text_jp:
荒れ狂う我らの矢をその身に受けながら
セトは　我らに言い放った

name: Gi Specter
text: "I’ll listen anytime you want to talk. Shoot as many arrows as you like."
text_jp:
話であれば　いつでも聞こう
矢を射たくば　いくらでも受けよう

name: Gi Specter
text: "But I’ll never let you invade the valley."
text_jp: だが　決して谷に攻め入らせはせんと

name: Gi Specter
text: Seto’s resolve never wavered.
text_jp: セトの決意は　揺るがなかった

name: Gi Specter
text: Even as poison coursed through him and his body turned to stone, he stubbornly blocked our onslaught.
text_jp:
毒が全身にまわり　体が石になり果ててもなお
かたくなに我らの猛攻をはばみ続けた

name: Gi Specter
text: Eventually, we succumbed to despair and sank back into the dark depths, stagnant.
text_jp:
やがて　我らは絶望に力尽き
再び暗き地の底に沈み　よどんだ

name: Gi Specter
text: Unable to fade, yet finding no solace.
text_jp:
消えることも叶わず
さりとて慰められることもなく

name: Red XIII
text: Hey, what my dad...what Seto couldn’t do, could you let me take it on?
text_jp:
ねえ　チチが……セトができなかったこと
オイラに引き継がせてくれないかな

name: Gi Specter
text: Hmm...
text_jp: うーむ……

name: Red XIII
text: Gi Nattak asked me too—to retrieve the Black Materia.
text_jp:
ギ・ナタタクにも頼まれたんだ
黒マテリアを　取り戻してほしいって

name: Red XIII
text: I’ll find a way for all the Gi tribe to rest in peace.
text_jp:
オイラ　ギ族のみんなが
安らかに眠れる方法を探す

name: Red XIII
text: So please wait in the cave until then.
text_jp: だから　それまで洞窟で待っててほしいんだ

name: Gi Specter
text: Those words...they’re not a lie, are they?
text_jp: その言葉　嘘ではあるまいな

name: Red XIII
text: COSME_1892
text_jp: COSME_1892

name: Red XIII
text: It might take a little time, though.
text_jp: すこし　時間はかかるかもしれないけどね

name: Gi Specter
text: Hmm...
text_jp: うむ……

name: Gi Specter
text: Oh, finally, finally...
text_jp: おお　ついに　ついに……

name: Gi Specter
text: Don’t break your promise, Seto’s son, Nanaki.
text_jp:
約束　たがえるでないぞ
セトの息子　ナナキよ

name: Cloud
text: You sure? They won’t forget.
text_jp: いいのか　連中は忘れないぞ

name: Red XIII
text: Dad knew.
text_jp: チチは　わかってたんだ

name: Red XIII
text: The Gi tribe’s suffering, unable to return to the planet...and that the Black Materia can’t be handed over.
text_jp:
星に帰れないギ族の苦しみも……
ギ族に黒マテリアを渡しちゃダメだってことも

name: Red XIII
text: That’s why, even as his body turned to stone, he faced the Gi tribe’s wrath alone.
text_jp:
だから　自分の体が石にされようとも
ギ族の怒りを　たったひとりで受け止めた

name: Red XIII
text: We’ll definitely find the Black Materia.
text_jp: 黒マテリアは　必ずオイラたちで見つけ出す

name: Red XIII
text: But we’ll never give it to anyone—not even the Gi.
text_jp: でも　絶対に誰にも　ギ族にも渡さない

name: Red XIII
text: Instead, on this journey, I’ll find a way to save the Gi tribe.
text_jp:
そのかわり　オイラはこの旅で
ギ族を救う方法を見つけるよ

name: Red XIII
text: Seeing, hearing, touching the world’s wonders—I’ll do it, no matter what!
text_jp:
世界の色んなものを見て　聞いて　触れて
必ず……！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho ho! That’s the spirit of a valley warrior!
text_jp:
ホーホーホウ！
それでこそ　谷の戦士じゃ

name: Red XIII
text: Gramps...
text_jp: じっちゃん

name: Bugenhagen
text: The power of a wish strengthens people.
text_jp: 願う力は　人を強くする

name: Bugenhagen
text: Nanaki, never forget that feeling you have now.
text_jp:
ナナキよ
いまのその気持ち　決して忘れるでないぞ

name: Bugenhagen
text: If you do, the answer will reveal itself in time.
text_jp: さすれば　おのずと答えは見つかるはずじゃ

name: Red XIII
text: Yeah!
text_jp: うん！

name: Bugenhagen
text: Ho ho, looks like the survey team can resume patrols now.
text_jp:
ホーホウ
これで調査隊も巡回に戻れそうじゃな

name: Bugenhagen
text: I’m worn out from all this walking. Guess I’ll head back soon.
text_jp:
久しぶりにあちこち出歩いて疲れたわい
そろそろ戻るとするかのう

name: Lookout
text: Heard from Lord Bugenhagen. The Gi were safely sealed again, huh?
text_jp:
ブーゲンハーゲン様から聞いたよ
ギ族は無事　封印できたようだね

name: Lookout
text: The survey team’s patrols will restart soon. Thanks a bunch.
text_jp:
調査隊の巡回も　じきに再開するそうだ
ありがとうな

name: Lookout
text: Welcome to Cosmo Canyon, the holy land of planetology.
text_jp:
ようこそ
星命学の聖地　コスモキャニオンへ

name: Lookout
text: Learn well about the planet.
text_jp: 星について　しっかり学んでくれ

name: Lookout
text: Hey, welcome to Cosmo Canyon!
text_jp: やあ　コスモキャニオンにようこそ

name: Lookout
text: May the planet’s blessing be with Nanaki’s friends.
text_jp:
ナナキの友達に
星の加護がありますように

name: Lookout
text: Lately, more folks are visiting the valley. Hope no trouble comes up.
text_jp:
最近　谷を訪れる人が増えていてね
厄介事が起きないといいんだが

name: Yuffie
text: Hello~? Anyone there~?
text_jp: もしも～し　誰かいませんか～？

name: Zhijie
text: COSME_1921
text_jp: COSME_1921

name: Yuffie
text: Wha—wha—Zhijie! What’re you doing out here?
text_jp:
えっえっ　ジージェ！
こんなとこで　なにしてんの？

name: Zhijie
text: COSME_1923
text_jp: COSME_1923

name: Zhijie
text: Loud as ever, huh, Yuffie?
text_jp: あいかわらず騒がしいな　ユフィ

name: Cloud
text: You know him?
text_jp: 知り合いか？

name: Yuffie
text: Yup, this is Zhijie.
text_jp: ああ　こちらジージェ

name: Yuffie
text: He helped out the main Avalanche crew. Like an info broker or something?
text_jp:
本家のアバランチに協力してた
じょーほー屋？　みたいなひと

name: Zhijie
text: COSME_1928
text_jp: COSME_1928

name: Yuffie
text: And these are Yuffie-chan’s minions!
text_jp:
んで　こっちが
ユフィちゃんの手下たち！

name: Cloud
text: COSME_1930
text_jp: COSME_1930

name: Zhijie
text: I see, that’s how it connects.
text_jp: なるほどね　そう繋がったか

name: Yuffie
text: Huh? Say something?
text_jp: うん　なんか言った？

name: Zhijie
text: Nah, just glad you’re doing well.
text_jp: いやいや　元気そうでなによりだ

name: NPC
text: What do you want to ask?
text_jp: なにを聞きますか？

name: NPC
text: About the plate collapse
text_jp: プレート落下について

name: NPC
text: About the anti-Shinra coalition
text_jp: 反神羅連絡会について

name: NPC
text: About the main Avalanche
text_jp: 本家アバランチについて

name: NPC
text: No questions
text_jp: 質問はない

name: Zhijie
text: When I heard rumors Shinra planned to crush Sector 7, I was skeptical, honestly.
text_jp:
神羅が七番街を潰す計画を立てているって
ウワサを聞いた時は正直　半信半疑だったんだ

name: Zhijie
text: After splitting from Yuffie and the others at the pillar,
text_jp: 支柱でユフィたちと別れたあと

name: Zhijie
text: I warned the Avalanche crew and told everyone I knew to evacuate Sector 7.
text_jp:
俺は　アバランチの連中に知らせて
知り合いに七番街から逃げるように伝えまわったが

name: Zhijie
text: I should’ve shouted louder, threatened them even, made sure everyone got out.
text_jp:
もっと声を張りあげて　脅してもいいから
全員に避難を呼びかければよかった

name: Zhijie
text: I still see the plate crashing down on the town in my dreams.
text_jp:
落ちてきたプレートが街を押し潰す光景を
いまも夢で見るんだ

name: Zhijie
text: You heard Colonel Glenn’s speech too, huh, Yuffie?
text_jp: ユフィも　グレン大佐の演説を聞いたみたいだな

name: Zhijie
text: Finally, the time’s come for anti-Shinra groups worldwide to unite.
text_jp:
ようやく　世界中の反神羅グループが
ひとつになる時がきたってわけだ

name: Zhijie
text: And Wutai’s gonna be at the center of it.
text_jp: そして　その中心になるのがウータイだ

name: Zhijie
text: I’m ready to stake my life on it too.
text_jp: 俺もその一員として　命を懸けるつもりさ

name: Zhijie
text: I escaped Midgar with Nayo and the main Avalanche folks.
text_jp:
本家アバランチのナヨたちとは
いっしょにミッドガルから逃亡して

name: Zhijie
text: We split up in Cosmo Canyon not long ago.
text_jp: すこしまえに　コスモキャニオンで別れたよ

name: Zhijie
text: They said they’d look for work in the holy land of planetology.
text_jp: 星命学の聖地で　仕事を探すって言ってたな

name: Zhijie
text: Nayo, Billy Bob, Polco—they were pretty down. Hope they’re okay.
text_jp:
ナヨもビリー・ボーもポルコも
かなり落ち込んでたからな　無事だといいが

name: Zhijie
text: Hey, to celebrate this fateful reunion, could you lend me a hand?
text_jp:
そうだ　この運命的な再会を祝して
ちょっと手を貸してもらえないか

name: Zhijie
text: On the way here, a huge monster chased me down.
text_jp: 道中　でかいモンスターに追いかけまわされてね

name: Zhijie
text: I shook it off somehow, but as you can see, my ride’s stalled out.
text_jp:
なんとか振り切ったものの
このとおり　エンストで動けなくなっちまった

name: Zhijie
text: It can’t have gone far. Could you track it down and take it out?
text_jp:
ヤツは　まだそう遠くには行ってないはずだ
探し出して倒してきてくれないか

name: Yuffie
text: Whaaat? Well, I might help out if you ask nice.
text_jp:
ええ～？
まあ　頼まれてあげなくもないけど

name: Yuffie
text: But it’s not gonna be free, nya~!
text_jp: タダってわけには　いかないにゃ～

name: Zhijie
text: I’ll make it worth your while.
text_jp: 報酬は弾むよ

name: Yuffie
text: Hee hee hee, you’ve got a deal!
text_jp: イシシシ　しっかと引き受けた！

name: Cloud
text: Any leads on the monster?
text_jp: モンスターの手がかりは？

name: Zhijie
text: It burrows underground except when it’s attacking prey.
text_jp:
ヤツは　獲物を襲うとき以外は
地中に潜っているんだ

name: Zhijie
text: A "vibration detector" from the moogles’ shop should help you find it.
text_jp:
モーグリたちの店で扱ってる
『震動探知機』があれば　見つけられるだろうな

name: Yuffie
text: Ooh, yes moogle!
text_jp: おお　イエス・モーグリ！

name: Yuffie
text: Wait, where’s this moogle shop at?
text_jp: って　モーグリのお店ってどこよ？

name: Cloud
text: Let’s go look for it.
text_jp: 探してみよう

name: Yuffie
text: But was there an item like that at the Moogle Shop?
text_jp:
でも　そんなアイテム
モーグリショップにあったっけ？

name: Yuffie
text: Maybe there’s still a Moogle out there we haven’t found yet?
text_jp: まだ　見つけてないモーグリがいるのかな

name: Cloud
text: Let’s go look for it.
